original: 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'ityādiśrutīnāṃ sarvātmatvādispaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ viṣayādau samanvayokteḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ,
analyzed: aitadātmyam idam sarvam tat satyam saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi ityādi śrutīnām sarva ātma tva ādi spaṣṭa brahma liḍgānām viṣaya ādau samanvaya ukteḥ pāda saṃgatiḥ
evam sarva sūtrāṇām śruti artha nirṇāyaka tvāt śruti saṃgatiḥ
tad tad adhyāye tad tad pāde ca samāna prameya tvena saṃgatiḥ ūhanīyā
prameyam ca kṛtsna śāstrasya brahma
adhyāyānām tu samanvaya virodha sādhana phalāni

original: tatra prathamapādasya spaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ śrutīnāṃ samanvayaḥ prameyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra prathama pādasya spaṣṭa brahma liḍgānām śrutīnām samanvayaḥ prameyaḥ
dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ aspaṣṭa brahma liḍgānām
asya adhikaraṇasya prātamyāt anna adhikaraṇa saṃgatiḥ apekṣitā
atha adhikaraṇam āracyate śrotavyaḥ iti vihita śravaṇa ātmakam vedānta mīmāṃsā śāstram viṣayaḥ
tat kim ārabdhavyam na vā iti viṣaya prayojana saṃbhava asaṃbhavābhyām saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra nāhaṃ brahmeti bhedagrāhipratyakṣeṇa kartṛtvākartṛtvādiviruddhadharmavattvaliḍgakānumānena ca virodhena brahmātmanoraikyasya viṣayasyāsaṃbhavāt,
analyzed: tatra na aham brahma iti bheda grāhi pratyakṣeṇa kartṛ tva akartṛ tva ādi viruddha dharmavat tva liḍgaka anumānena ca virodhena brahma ātmanoḥ aikyasya viṣayasya asaṃbhavāt
satya bandhasya jñānāt nivṛtti rūpa phala asaṃbhavāt na ārambhaṇīyam iti prāpte siddhāntaḥ atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti
atra śravaṇa vidhi samāna artha tvāya kartavyā iti padam adhyāhartavyam
adhyāhṛtam ca bhāṣyakṛtā brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti
tatra prakṛti pratyaya arthayoḥ jñāna icchayoḥ kartavya tva ananvayāt prakṛtyā phalībhūtam jñānam ajahat lakṣaṇayā ucyate

original: tathā ca brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtrasya śrautor'thaḥ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: tathā ca brahma jñānāya vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti sūtrasya śrauta ūrthaḥ saṃpadyate

tatra anarthasya satya tve jñāna mātrāt nivṛtti ayogāt adhyasta tvam vaktavyam iti bandhasya adhyasta tvam arthāt sūcitam
tat ca śāstrasya viṣaya prayojanavat tva siddhi hetuḥ

original: athavā yadātmano mukhyaṃ sarvāntaratvarūpaṃ pratyaktvaṃ pratītatvaṃ brahmāsmīti vyavahāragocaratvaṃ coktvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ,

original: dehaṃ jānāmīti dehāhaṅkārayorviṣayaviṣayitve 'pi manuṣyo 'hamityabhedādhyāsavadātmāhaṅkārāyorapyabhedādhyāsaḥ syādityata āha--cidātmaka iti

original: tayorjāḍyālpatvābhyāṃ sādṛśyādadhyāse 'pi cidātmanyanavacchinne jaḍālpāhaṅkārādernādhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ /

original: ato buddhyādeḥ pratibhāsataḥ pratyaktve 'pi parāktvādikaṃ mukhyameveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas buddhi ādeḥ pratibhāsataḥ pratyaktve pi parāktva ādikam mukhyam eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: yuṣmatparāktaccāsau pratiyata iti pratyayaścāsau kartṛtvādivyavahāragocaraśca tasyeti vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: yuṣmad parāk tat ca asau pratiyataḥ iti pratyayaḥ ca asau kartṛ tva ādi vyavahāra gocaraḥ ca tasya iti vigrahaḥ
tasya heya tva artham āha viṣasya iti
pim bandhane
visinoti badhnāti iti viṣayaḥ tasya iti arthaḥ
ātmani anātma tad dharma adhyāsaḥ mithyā bhavatu
anātmani ātma tad dharma adhyāsaḥ kim na syāt
aham sphurāmi sukhī ityādi anubhavāt iti āśaṅkya āha tad viparyayeṇa iti
tasmāt anātmanaḥ viparyayaḥ viruddha svabhāvaḥ caitanyam
itthaṃbhāve tṛtīyā

original: caitanyātmanā viṣayiṇastaddharmāṇāṃ ca yo 'haṅkārādau viṣaye 'dhyāsaḥ sa mithyeti nāstīti bhavituṃ yuktam,
analyzed: caitanya ātmanā viṣayiṇaḥ tad dharmāṇām ca yaḥ haṅkāra ādau viṣaye dhyāsaḥ sa mithyā iti na asti iti bhavitum yuktam
adhyāsa sāmagrī abhāvāt
na hi atra pūrva pramāhita saṃskāraḥ sādṛśyam ajñānam vā asti
niravayava nirguṇa sva prakāśa ātmani guṇa avayava sādṛśyasya ca ajñānasya ca ayogāt
nanu ātmanaḥ nirguṇa tve tad dharmāṇām iti bhāṣyam katham iti ced
ucyate buddhi vṛtti abhivyaktam caitanyam jñānam
viṣaya abhedena abhivyaktam sphuraṇam
śubha karma janya vṛtti vyaktam ānandaḥ iti evam vṛtti upādhi kṛta bhedāt jñāna ādīnām ātma dharma tva vyapadeśaḥ

original: taduktaṃ ṭīkāyāṃ-'ānando viṣayānubhavo nityatvaṃ ceti santi dharmā apṛthaktve 'pi caitanyatvāt pṛthagivāvabhāsante'iti /
analyzed: tat uktam ṭīkāyām ānandaḥ viṣaya anubhavaḥ nitya tvam ca iti santi dharmāḥ apṛthaktve caitanya tvāt pṛthak iva avabhāsante iti
atas nirguṇa brahma ātma tva mate

original: ahaṃ karomīti pratīterarthasya cādhyāsatvāyogātpramātvaṃ satyatvaṃ ca ahaṃ nara iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya gauṇatvamiti matamāstheyam /
analyzed: aham karomi iti pratīteḥ arthasya ca adhyāsa tva ayogāt pramā tvam satya tvam ca aham naraḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya gauṇa tvam iti matam āstheyam

original: tathā ca bandhasya satyatayā jñānānnivṛttirūpaphalāsaṃbhavādbaddhamuktayorjīvabrahmaṇoraikyāyogena viṣayāsaṃbhavāt śāstraṃ nārambhaṇīyamiti  #
analyzed: tathā ca bandhasya satya tayā jñānāt nivṛtti rūpa phala asaṃbhavāt baddha muktayoḥ jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikya ayogena viṣaya asaṃbhavāt śāstram na ārambhaṇīyam iti
yukta grahaṇāt pūrvapakṣasya durbala tvam sūcayati
tathā hi kim adhyāsasya nāstitvam ayukta tvāt abhānāt vā kāraṇa abhāvāt vā
ādyaḥ iṣṭaḥ iti āha tathā api iti
etad anurodhāt ādau yadi api iti paṭhitavyam
adhyāsasya asaṅga sva prakāśa ātmani ayukta tvam alaṅkāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha ayam iti
ajñaḥ kartā manuṣyaḥ ham iti pratyakṣa anubhavāt adhyāsasya ābhānam asiddham iti arthaḥ

original: na cedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartṛtvādau prameti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca idam pratyakṣam kartṛ tva ādau pramā iti vācyam
apauruṣeya tayā nirdeṣeṇa
upakrama ādi liṅga avadhṛta tātparyeṇa ca tatvamasi ādi vākyena akartṛ tva brahma tva bodhanena asya bhrama tva niścayāt

original: na ca jyeṣṭhapratyakṣavirodhādāgamajñānasyaiva bādha iti vācyaṃ,
analyzed: na ca jyeṣṭha pratyakṣa virodhāt āgama jñānasya eva bādhaḥ iti vācyam
deha ātma vāda prasaṅgāt
manuṣyaḥ ham iti pratyakṣa virodhena atha ayam aśarīraḥ ityādi śrutyā dehāt anya ātma asiddheḥ
tasmāt idam rajatam iti vat sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyakṣasya bhrama tva śaṅkā kalaṅkitasya na āgamāt prābalyam iti āstheyam

original: kiñca jyeṣṭhatvaṃ pūrvabhāvitvaṃ vā āgamajñānaṃ pratyupajīvyatvaṃ vā?
analyzed: kiñca jyeṣṭha tvam pūrva bhāvi tvam vā āgama jñānam pratyupajīvya tvam vā
ādye na prābalyam
jyeṣṭhasya api rajata bhramasya paścāt bhāvinā śukti jñānena bādha darśanāt
na dvitīyaḥ āgama jñāna utpattau pratyakṣa ādi mūla vṛddha vyavahāre saṃgati graha dvārā
śabda upalabdhi dvārā ca pratyakṣa ādeḥ vyāvahārika prāmāṇyasya upajīvya tve pi tāttvika prāmāṇyasya anapekṣita tvāt
an apekṣita aṃśasya āgamena bādhā asaṃbhavāt iti

original: yattu kṣaṇikayāgasya śrutibalātkālāntarabhāviphalahetutvavat 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ'iti śrutibalātsatyasyāpi jñānānnivṛttisaṃbhavādadhyāsavarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: yat tu kṣaṇika yāgasya śruti balāt kāla antara bhāvi phala hetu tva vat tathā vidvān nāma rūpāt vimuktaḥ iti śruti balāt satyasya api jñānāt nivṛtti saṃbhavāt adhyāsa varṇanam
vyartham iti tat na
jñāna mātra nivartyasya kvāpi satya tva adarśanāt
satyasya ca ātmanaḥ nivṛti adarśanāt ca
ayogya tā niścaye sati satyabandhasya jñānāt nivṛtti śruteḥ bodhaka tva ayogāt

original: na ca setudarśanātsatyasya pāpasya nāśarśanānnāyogyatāniścayā iti vācyaṃ,
analyzed: na ca setu darśanāt satyasya pāpasya na aśarśanāt na ayogya tā niścayāḥ iti vācyam
tasya
bandhasya ca na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti śrutyā jñāna mātrāt nivṛtti pratīteḥ
atas śruta jñāna nivartya tva nirvāha artham adhyasta tvam

original: kiṃ ca jñānaikanivartyasya kiṃ nāma satyatvam,
analyzed: kim ca jñāna eka nivartyasya kim nāma satya tvam
na tāvat ajñāna ajanya tvam
māyām tu prakṛtim iti śruti virodhāt māyā avidyayoḥ aikyāt
nā api svādhiṣṭhāne sva abhāva śūnyatvam asthūlam ityādi niṣedha śruti virodhāt
nā api brahma vat bādhā yogya tvam
jñānāt nivṛtti śruti virodhāt
atha vyavahāra kāle bādha śūnyatvam
tarhi vyavahārikam eva satya tvam iti āgatam adhyasta tvam
tat ca śruti arthe yogyatā jñāna artham varṇanīyam eva
yāgasya apūrva dvāra tva vat
na ca tad anyatva adhikaraṇe tasya varṇanāt paunaruktyam
tatra ukta adhyāsasya eva pravṛtti aṅga viṣaya ādi siddhi artham ādau smāryamāṇa tvāt iti diś
adhyāsam dvedhā darśayati lokavyavahāraḥ iti
lokyate manuṣyaḥ ham iti abhimanyate iti loka ūrtha adhyāsaḥ
tad viṣayaḥ vyavahāraḥ bhimānaḥ iti jñāna adhyāsaḥ darśitaḥ
dvividha adhyāsa svarūpa lakṣaṇam āha anyonyasmin ityādinā adharma dharmiṇoḥ ityantena
jāḍya caitanya ādi dharmāṇām dharmiṇau ahaṅkāra ātmānau

original: tayoratyantaṃ bhinnayoritaretarabhedāgraheṇānyonyasmin anyonyatādātmyaṃ anyonyadharmāṃśca vyatyāsenādhyasya lokavyavahāra iti yojanā /
analyzed: tayoḥ atyantam bhinnayoḥ itaretara bheda agraheṇa anyonyasmin anyonya tādātmyam anyonya dharmān ca vyatyāsena adhyasya lokavyavahāraḥ iti yojanā
atas saḥ yam iti pramāyāḥ na adhyāsa tvam
tat idam arthayoḥ kāla bhedena kalpita bhede pi atyanta bheda abhāvāt iti vaktum atyanta iti uktam

original: na ca dharmitādātmyādhyāse dharmādhyāsasiddheḥ 'dharmāṃśca'iti vyarthamiti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca dharmi tādātmya adhyāse dharma adhyāsa siddheḥ dharmān ca eti vyartham iti vācyam
andha tva ādīnām indriya dharmāṇām dharmya dhyāsa asphuṭa tve pi andhaḥ ham iti sphuṭaḥ dhyāsaḥ iti jñāpana artha tvāt
nanu ātma anātmanoḥ paraspara adhyasta tve śūnyavādaḥ syāt iti āśaṅkya āha satya anṛte mithunīkṛtya iti

original: satyamanidaṃ caitanyaṃ tasyānātmani saṃsargamātrādhyāso na svarūpasya /
analyzed: satyam anidam caitanyam tasya anātmani saṃsarga mātra adhyāsaḥ na svarūpasya

original: anṛtaṃyuṣmadarthaḥ tasya svarūpato 'pyadhyāsāttayormithunīkaraṇamadhyāsa iti na śūnyatetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: anṛtam yuṣmad arthaḥ tasya svarūpataḥ u pi adhyāsāt tayoḥ mithunīkaraṇam adhyāsaḥ iti na śūnyatā iti arthaḥ

original: nanvadhyāsamithunīkaraṇalokavyavahāraśabdānāmekārthatve 'dhyasya midhunīkṛtyeti pūrvakālatvavāciktvāpratyayādeśasya lyapaḥ kathaṃ prayoga iti
analyzed: nanu adhyāsa mithunīkaraṇa lokavyavahāra śabdānām eka artha tve dhyasya midhunīkṛtya iti pūrva kāla tva vācik tva pratyaya ādeśasya lyapaḥ katham prayogaḥ iti
adhyāsa vyakti bhedāt

original: tatra pūrvapūrvādhyāsasyottarottarādhyāsaṃ prati saṃskāradvārā pūrvakālatvena hetutvadyotanārthaṃ lyapaḥ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūrva pūrva adhyāsasya uttara uttara adhyāsam prati saṃskāra dvārā pūrva kāla tvena hetu tva dyotana artham lyapaḥ prayogaḥ
tat eva spaṣṭayati naisargikaḥ iti
pratyagātmani hetu hetumat bhāvena adhyāsa pravāhaḥ na ādiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu pravāhasya a vastu tvāt
adhyāsa vyaktīnām sa ādi tvāt
katham anādi tvam iti ced
ucyate adhyāsa tva avacchinna vyaktīnām madhye nyatamayā vyaktyā vinā anādi kālasya āvartanam kārya anādi tvam iti aṅgīkārāt
etena kāraṇa abhāvāt iti kalpaḥ nirastaḥ
saṃskārasya nimittasya naisargika padena ukta tvāt

original: na ca pūrvapramājanya eva saṃskāro heturiti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca pūrva pramā janyaḥ eva saṃskāraḥ hetuḥ iti vācyam
lāghavena pūrva anubhava janya saṃskārasya hetu tvāt
atas pūrva adhyāsa janyaḥ saṃskāraḥ sti iti siddham
adhyāsasya upādānam āha mithyājñāna nimittaḥ iti

original: mithyā ca tadajñānaṃ ca mithyājñānaṃ tannimittamupādānaṃ yasya sa tannimittaḥ /
analyzed: mithyā ca tat ajñānam ca mithyājñānam tad nimittam upādānam yasya sa tad nimittaḥ
tad upādānakaḥ iti arthaḥ
ajñānasya upādāna tve pi saṃsphurat ātma tatva āvaraka tayā doṣa tvena ahaṅkāra adhyāsa kartuḥ īśvarasya upādhi tvena
saṃskāra kāla karma ādi nimitta pariṇāmi tvena ca nimitta tvam iti dyotayitum nimitta padam
sva prakāśa ātmani asaṅge katham avidyā saṅgaḥ
saṃskāra ādi sāmagrī abhāvāt
iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham mithyāpadam
pracaṇḍa mārtaṇḍa maṇḍale pecaka anubhava siddha andhakāra vat
aham ajñaḥ iti anubha siddham ajñānam durapahnavam
kalpitasya adhiṣṭhāna asparśi tvāt
nitya svarūpa jñānasya avirodhi tvāt ca iti

original: yadvā ajñānaṃ jñānābhāva iti śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ mithyāpadam /
analyzed: yat vā ajñānam jñāna abhāvaḥ iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham mithyāpadam
mithyātve sati sākṣāt jñāna nivartya tvam ajñānasya lakṣaṇam mithyājñāna padena uktam

original: jñānenecchāprāgabhāvaḥ sākṣānnivartyata iti vadantaṃ prati mithyātve satītyuktam /
analyzed: jñānena icchā prāgabhāvaḥ sākṣāt nivartyate iti vadantam prati mithyātve sati iti uktam
brahma nirāsa artham mithyātvam iti
mṛd ādi nirāsa artham anādi iti
avidyā ātmanoḥ saṃbandha nirāsa artham upādāna tve sati iti
saṃprati adhyāsam draḍhayitum abhilapati āham idam mama idam iti
ādhyātmika kārya adhyāseṣu aham iti prathamaḥ dhyāsaḥ
na ca adhiṣṭhāna āropya aṃśa dvaya anupalambhāt na āyasa dhyāsaḥ iti vācyam
ayaḥ dahati iti vat aham upalabhe iti dṛś dṛśya aṃśayoḥ upalambhāt
idam padena bhogyaḥ saṃghātaḥ ucyate
atra aham idam iti anena manupyaḥ ham iti tādātmya adhyāsaḥ darśitaḥ
mama idam śarīram iti saṃsarga adhyāsaḥ

original: nanu dehātmanostādātmyameva saṃsarga iti tayoḥ ko bheda iti cet /
analyzed: nanu deha ātmanoḥ tādātmyam eva saṃsargaḥ iti tayoḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ iti ced
satyam
sat tā aikye sati mithas bhedaḥ tādātmyam
tatra manuṣyaḥ ham iti aikya aṃśa bhānam mama idam iti bheda aṃśa rūpa saṃsarga bhānam iti bhedaḥ

original: evaṃ sāmagrīsattvādanubhavasattvādadhyāso 'stītyato brahmātmaikye virodhābhāvena viṣayaprayojanayoḥ sattvāt śāstramārambhaṇīyamiti siddhāntabhāṣyatātparyam
analyzed: evam sāmagrī sattvāt anubhava sattvāt adhyāsaḥ sti iti atas brahma ātma aikye virodha abhāvena viṣaya prayojanayoḥ sattvāt śāstram ārambhaṇīyam iti siddhāntabhāṣya tātparyam

original: evañca sūtreṇārthātsūcite viṣayaprayojane pratipādya taddhetumadhyāsaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhāvanāpramāṇaiḥ sādhayituṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati--āheti /
analyzed: evam ca sūtreṇa arthāt sūcite viṣaya prayojane pratipādya tad hetum adhyāsam lakṣaṇa saṃbhāvanā pramāṇaiḥ sādhayitum lakṣaṇam pṛcchati āha iti
kiṃlakṣaṇakaḥ dhyāsaḥ iti āha
pūrva vādi iti arthaḥ

original: asya śāstrasya tattvanirṇayapradhānatvena vādakathātvadyotanārthaṃ āheti paroktiḥ /
analyzed: asya śāstrasya tattva nirṇaya pradhāna tvena vāda kathā tva dyotana artham āha iti para uktiḥ
āha etyādi katham punar pratyagātmani iti atas prāk adhyāsa lakṣaṇa param bhāṣyam
tat ārabhya saṃbhāvanā param
tam etam avidyā ākhyam iti ārabhya sarva loka pratyakṣaḥ iti antam pramāṇa param iti vibhāgaḥ
lakṣaṇam āha ucyate smṛti rūpaḥ iti
adhyāse iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
atra paratra avabhāsaḥ iti eva lakṣaṇam
śiṣṭam pada dvayam tad upapādana artham

original: tathāhi avabhāsyata ityavabhāso rajatādyarthaḥ tasyāyogyamadhikaraṇaṃ paratrapadārthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi avabhāsyate iti avabhāsaḥ rajata ādi arthaḥ tasya ayogyam adhikaraṇam paratra padārthaḥ
adhikaraṇasya ayogya tvam āropya atyanta abhāva tvam tadvat tvam vā
tathā ca eka avacchedena sva saṃsṛjyamāne sva atyanta abhāvavati avabhāsya tvam adhyasta tvam iti arthaḥ
idam ca sādi anādi adhyāsa sādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam
saṃyoge tivyāpti nirāsāya eka avacchedena iti
saṃyogasya sva saṃsṛjyamāne vṛkṣe sva atyanta abhāvavati avabhāsya tve pi sva atyanta abhāvayoḥ mūla agra avacchedaka bhedāt na ativyāptiḥ

original: pūrvaṃ svābhāvavati bhūtale paścādānīto ghaṭo bhātīti ghaṭe 'tivyāptinirāsāya svasaṃsṛjyamāna iti padam,
analyzed: pūrvam sva abhāvavati bhū tale paścāt ānītaḥ ghaṭaḥ bhāti iti ghaṭe tivyāpti nirāsāya sva saṃsṛjyamāne iti padam

original: tena svābhāvakāle pratiyogisaṃsargasya vidyamānatocyate iti nātivyāptiḥ /
analyzed: tena sva abhāva kāle pratiyogi saṃsargasya vidyamāna tā ucyate iti na ativyāptiḥ
bhūtvā avacchedena avabhāsya gandhe tivyāpti vāraṇāya sva atyanta abhāvavatī iti padam
śuktau idantva avacchedena rajata saṃsarga kāle tyanta abhāvaḥ sti iti na avyāptiḥ
nanu asya lakṣaṇasya asaṃbhavaḥ
śuktau rajatasya sāmagrī abhāvena saṃsarga asattvāt

original: na ca smaryamāṇasatyarajatasyaiva paratra śuktāvavabhāsyatvenādhyastatvoktiriti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca smaryamāṇa satya rajatasya eva paratra śuktau avabhāsya tvena adhyasta tva uktiḥ iti vācyam
anyathā khyāti prasaṅgāt iti atas āha smṛti rūpaḥ iti

original: smaryate iti smṛtiḥ satyarajatādiḥ tasya rūpamiva rūpamasyeti smṛtirūpaḥ /
analyzed: smaryate iti smṛtiḥ satya rajata ādiḥ tasya rūpam iva rūpam asya iti smṛti rūpaḥ
smaryamāṇa sadṛśaḥ iti arthaḥ
sādṛśa uktyā smaryamāṇāt āropyasya bhedāt
na anyathā khyātiḥ iti uktam bhavati
sādṛśam upapādayati pūrva dṛṣṭa iti
dṛṣṭam darśanam
saṃskāra dvārā pūrva darśanāt avabhāsyate iti pūrva dṛṣaṭa avabhāsaḥ
tena saṃskāra janya jñāna viṣaya tvam smaryamāṇa āropyayoḥ sādṛśyam uktam bhavati
smṛti āropayoḥ saṃskāra janya tvāt
na ca saṃskāra janya tvāt āropasya smṛti tva āpattiḥ iti vācyam
doṣa saṃprayoga janya tvasya api vivakṣita tvena saṃskāra mātra janya tva abhāvāt
atra saṃyoga śabdena adhiṣṭhāna sāmānya jñānam ucyate
ahaṅkāra adhyāse indriya saṃprayoga alābhāt

original: evaṃ ca doṣasaṃprayogasaṃskārabalācchuktyādau rajatamutapannamastīti paratrāvabhāsyatvalakṣamamupapannamiti smṛtirūpapūrvadṛṣṭapadābhyāmupapādim
analyzed: evam ca doṣa saṃprayoga saṃskāra balāt śukti ādau rajatam utapannam asti iti paratra avabhāsya tva lakṣamam upapannam iti smṛti rūpa pūrva dṛṣṭa padābhyām upapādim
anye tu tābhyām doṣa ādi traya janya tvam kārya adhyāsa lakṣaṇam uktam iti āhuḥ
apare tu smṛti rūpaḥ smaryamāṇa sadṛśaḥ
sādṛsyam ca smṛti āropayoḥ pramāṇa ajanya tvāt
abhinava rajata ādehe pūrva dṛṣṭa tva abhāvāt

original: tathā ca pramāṇājanyajñānaviṣayatve sati pūrvadṛṣṭajātīyatvaṃ prātītikādhyāsalakṣaṇaṃ tābhyāmuktam /
analyzed: tathā ca pramāṇa ajanya jñāna viṣaya tve sati pūrva dṛṣṭa jātīya tvam prātītika adhyāsa lakṣaṇam tābhyām uktam
paratra avabhāsa śabdābhyām adhyāsa mātra lakṣaṇam vyākhyātam eva

original: tatra smaryamāṇagaṅgādau abhinavaghaṭe cātivyāptinirāsāya pramāṇetyādi padadvayamityāhuḥ /
analyzed: tatra smaryamāṇa gaṅgā ādau abhinava ghaṭe ca ativyāpti nirāsāya pramāṇa ityādi pada dvayam iti āhuḥ

original: tatrārthādhyāse smaryamāṇasadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsyata iti yojanā /
analyzed: tatra artha adhyāse smaryamāṇa sadṛśaḥ paratra pūrva darśanāt avabhāsyate iti yojanā

original: jñānādhyāse tu smṛtisadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsa iti vākyaṃ yojanīyamiti saṃkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna adhyāse tu smṛti sadṛśaḥ paratra pūrva darśanāt avabhāsaḥ iti vākyam yojanīyam iti saṃkṣepaḥ
nanu adhyāse vādi vipratipatteḥ katham ukta lakṣaṇa siddhiḥ iti āśaṅkya adhiṣṭhāna āropya svarūpa vivāde

original: 'pi paratra parāvabhāsa iti lakṣaṇe saṃvādyuktibhiḥ satyādhiṣṭhāne mithyārthāvabhāsasiddheḥ
analyzed: pi paratra para avabhāsaḥ iti lakṣaṇe saṃvādi uktibhiḥ satya adhiṣṭhāne mithyā artha avabhāsa siddheḥ

original: sarvatantrasiddhānta idaṃ lakṣaṇamiti matvā anyathātmakhyātivādinormatamāha-taṃ keciditi /
analyzed: sarva tantra siddhānte idam lakṣaṇam iti matvā anyathā ātma khyāti vādinoḥ matam āhatam kecid iti

original: kecidanyathākhyātivādino 'nyatra śuktyādāvanyadharmasya svāvayavadharmasya deśāntarastharūpyāderadhyāsa iti vadanti /
analyzed: kecid anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ nyatra śukti ādau anya dharmasya sva avayava dharmasya deśa antara stha rūpya ādeḥ adhyāsaḥ iti vadanti
ātma khyāti vādinaḥ tu bāhya śukti ādau buddhi rūpa ātmanaḥ dharmasya rajatasya adhyāsaḥ
āntarasya rajatasya bahis vat avabhāsaḥ iti vadanti iti arthaḥ
akhyāti matam āha kecid iti

original: yatra yasyādhyāso lokasiddhastayorarthayostaddhiyośca bhedāgrahe sati tanmūlo bhramaḥ,
analyzed: yatra yasya adhyāsaḥ loka siddhaḥ tayoḥ arthayoḥ tad dhiyoḥ ca bheda agrahe sati tad mūlaḥ bhramaḥ
idam rūpyam iti viśiṣṭa vyavahāraḥ iti vadanti iti arthaḥ
taiḥ api viśiṣṭa vyavahāra anyathā anupapattyā viśiṣṭa bhrānteḥ svīkārya tvāt
paratra para avabhāsa saṃmatiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
śūnya matam āha anye tu iti

original: tasyaivādhiṣṭhānasya śuktyāderviparītadharmatvakalpanāṃ viparīto viruddho dharmo yasya tadbhāvastasya rajatāderatyantāsataḥ kalpanāmācakṣata  #
analyzed: tasya eva adhiṣṭhānasya śukti ādeḥ viparīta dharma tva kalpanām viparītaḥ viruddhaḥ dharmaḥ yasya tad bhāvaḥ tasya rajata ādeḥ atyanta asataḥ kalpanām ācakṣata
iti arthaḥ
eteṣu mateṣu paratra para avabhāsa tva lakṣaṇa saṃvādam āha sarvathā api tu iti
anyathā khyāti tva ādi prakāra vivāde pi adhyāsaḥ paratra para avabhāsa tva lakṣaṇam na jahāti iti arthaḥ

original: śuktāvaparokṣasya rajatasya deśāntare buddhau vā sattvāyogāt śūnyatve pratyakṣatvāyogāt,
analyzed: śuktau aparokṣasya rajatasya deśa antare buddhau vā sattva ayogāt śūnyatve pratyakṣa tva ayogāt
śuktau satte bādhā ayogāt mithyātvam eva iti bhāvaḥ
tasya anubhava siddha tvāt iti āha tathā ca iti
bādhā anantara kālīnaḥ yam anubhavaḥ tat pūrvam
śuktikā tva jñāna ayogāt
rajatasya bādhā pratyakṣa siddham mithyātvam vat śabdena ucyate
ātmani nirūpādhike haṅkāra adhyāse dṛṣṭāntam uktvā brahma jīva avāntarabhedasya avidyā ādi upādhikasya adhyāse dṛṣṭāntam āha ekaḥ iti
dvitīya candra sahita vat ekaḥ eva aṅgulyā dvidhā bhāti iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇa prakaraṇa upasaṃhāra arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ
bhavatu adhyāsaḥ śukti ādau
ātmani tu na saṃbhavati iti ākṣipati katham punar iti

original: yatrāparokṣādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ tatrendriyasaṃyuktatvaṃ viṣayatvaṃ ceti vyāptiḥ śuktyādau dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: yatra aparokṣa adhyāsa adhiṣṭhāna tvam tatra indriya saṃyukta tvam viṣaya tvam ca iti vyāptiḥ śukti ādau dṛṣṭā
tatra vyāpaka abhāvāt ātmanaḥ dhiṣṭhāna tvam na saṃbhavati iti abhipretya āha pratyagātmani iti

original: pratīci pūrṇa indriyāgrāhye viṣayasyāhaṅkārādestaddharmāṇāṃ cādhyāsaḥ kathamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratīci pūrṇe indriya agrāhye viṣayasya ahaṅkāra ādeḥ tad dharmāṇām ca adhyāsaḥ katham iti arthaḥ
ukta vyāptim āha sarvaḥ hi iti
purovasthita tvam indriya saṃyukta tvam
nanu ātmanaḥ api adhiṣṭhāna tva artham viṣaya tva ādikam astu iti atas āha yuṣmat iti

original: idaṃpratyayānarhasya pratyagātmano 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate'ityādi śrutimanusṛtya tvamaviṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
analyzed: idam pratyaya anarhasya pratyagātmanaḥ na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate ityādi śrutim anusṛtya tvam aviṣaya tvam bravīṣi
saṃpratyāsa lobhena viṣaya tva aṅgīkāre śruti siddhāntayoḥ bādhaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ
ātmani adhyāsa saṃbhāvanām pratijānīte ucyate iti
adhiṣṭhāna āropyayoḥ ekasmin jñāne bhāsamāna tva mātram adhyāsa vyāpakam
tat ca bhāna prayukta saṃśaya nivṛtti ādi phala bhāktvam
tat eva bhāna bhinnatva ghaṭitam viṣayatvam
tat na vyāpakam
gauravāt iti matvā āhana tāvat iti
ayam ātmā niyamena aviṣayaḥ na bhavati
tatra hetum āha asmat iti
asmapratyayaḥ ham iti adhyāsaḥ tatra bhāsamāna tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: asmadarthacidātmā pratibimbitatyena yatra pratīyate so 'smatpratyayo 'haṅkārastatra bhāsamānatvāditi vārthaḥ /
analyzed: asmadartha cit ātmā yatra pratīyate saḥ smat pratyayaḥ haṅkāraḥ tatra bhāsamāna tvāt iti vā arthaḥ

original: na cādhyāse sati bhāsamānatvaṃ tasminsati sa iti parasparāśraya iti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca adhyāse sati bhāsamāna tvam tasmin sati saḥ iti paraspara āśrayaḥ iti vācyam
anādi tvāt
pūrva abhyāse bhāsamāna ātmanaḥ uttara adhyāsa adhiṣṭhāna tva saṃbhavāt
nanu aham iti ahaṅkāra viṣayaka bhāna rūpasya ātmanaḥ bhāna mānatvam katham
tad viṣaya tvam vinā tad phala bhāktva ayogāt iti atas āha aparokṣa tvāt ca iti
caśabdaḥ śaṅkā nirāsa arthaḥ
sva prakāśa tvāt iti arthaḥ
sva prakāśa tvam sādhayati pratyak iti
ā bāla paṇḍitam ātmanaḥ saṃśaya ādi śūnyatvena prasidhdeḥ sva prakāśa tvam iti arthaḥ
atas sva prakāśa tvena bhāsamāna tvāt ātmanaḥ dhyāsa adhiṣṭhāna tvam saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
yat uktam aparokṣa adhyāsa adhiṣṭhāna tvasya indriya saṃyukta tayā grāhya tvam vyāpakam iti tatra āha na ca ayam iti
tatra hetum āha apratyakṣe pi iti
indriya grāhye pi iti arthaḥ

original: bālā avivekinaḥ talamindranīlakaṭāhakalpaṃ nabho malinaṃ pitamityevamaparokṣamadhyasyanti,
analyzed: bālāḥ avivekinaḥ talam indranīla kaṭāha kalpam nabhaḥ malinam pitam iti evam aparokṣam adhyasyanti
tatra indriya grāhya tvam na asti iti vyabhicārāt na vyāptiḥ
etena ātma anāma anātmanoḥ sādṛśya abhāvāt na adhyāsaḥ iti apāstam
nīla nabhasoḥ tad abhāve pi adhyāsa darśanāt
saṃbhāvanām nigamayati evam iti

original: nanu brahmajñānanāśyatvena sūtritāmavidyāṃ hitvā adhyāsaḥ kimiti varṇyata ityata āha-tametamiti /
analyzed: nanu brahma jñāna nāśya tvena sūtritām avidyām hitvā adhyāsaḥ kim iti varṇyate iti atas āha tam etam iti
ākṣiptam samāhitam ukta lakṣaṇa lakṣitam adhyāsam avidyā kārya tvāt avidyā iti manyante iti arthaḥ
vidyā nivartya tvāt ca asya avidyā tvam iti āha tad vivekena iti
adhyasta niṣedhena adhiṣṭhāna svarūpa nirdhāraṇam vidyām adhyāsa nivartikām āhuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathāpi kāraṇāvidyāṃ tyaktvā kāryāvidyā kimiti varṇyate tatrāha-tatreti /
analyzed: tathā api kāraṇa avidyām tyaktvā kārya avidyā kim iti varṇyate tatra āha tatra iti
tasmin adhyāse ukta nyāyena avidyā ātmake sati iti arthaḥ

original: mūlāvidyayāḥ saṣuptāvanarthatvādarśanāt kāryātmanā tasyā anarthatvajñāpanārthaṃ tadvarṇanamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: mūlāvidyayāḥ saṣuptau anartha tva adarśanāt kārya ātmanā tasyāḥ anartha tva jñāpana artham tad varṇanam iti bhāvaḥ
adhyasta kṛta guṇa doṣābhyām adhiṣṭhānam na lipyate iti akṣara arthaḥ
evam adhyāsasya lakṣaṇa saṃbhāvane uktvā pramāṇam āha tam etam iti

original: taṃ varṇitamevaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasidhyaṃ puraskṛtya hetuṃ kṛtvā laukikaḥ karmaśāstrīyo mokṣaśāstrīyaśceti trividho vyavahāraḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: tam varṇitam evam sākṣi pratyakṣa sidhyam puraskṛtya hetum kṛtvā laukikaḥ karma śāstrīyaḥ mokṣa śāstrīyaḥ ca iti trividhaḥ vyavahāraḥ pravartate iti arthaḥ
tatra vidhi niṣedha parāṇi karma śāstrāṇi ṛgveda ādīni
vidhi niṣedha śūnya pratyak brahya parāṇi mokṣa śāstrāṇi vedānta vākyāni iti vibhāgaḥ

original: evaṃ vyavahārahetutvenādhyāse pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi pramāṇāntaraṃ pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
analyzed: evam vyavahāra hetu tvena adhyāse pratyakṣa siddhe pramāṇa antaram pṛcchati katham punar iti

original: avidyāvānahamityadhyāsavānātmā pramātā sa viṣaya āśrayo yeṣāṃ tāni avidyāvadviṣayāṇīti vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: avidyāvān aham iti adhyāsavān ātmā pramātā sa viṣayaḥ āśrayaḥ yeṣām tāni avidyāvat viṣayāṇi iti vigrahaḥ
tad tad prameya vyavahāra hetu bhūtāyāḥ pramāyāḥ adhyāsa ātmaka pramātṛ āśrita tvāt pramāṇānām avidyā vat viṣaya tvam

original: yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ tathāpi punarapi kathaṃ kenapramāṇenāvidyāvadviṣayatvamiti yojanā /
analyzed: yadi api pratyakṣam tathā api punar api katham kena pramāṇena avidyāvat viṣayatvam iti yojanā
katham pramāṇāni syuḥ
āśraya doṣāt aprāmāṇya āpatteḥ iti ākṣepaḥ
tatra pramāṇa praśne vyavahāra arthāpattim
tad liṅga anumānam ca āha ucyate ityādinā tasmāt iti antena
devadatta kartṛkaḥ vyavahāraḥ
tadīya deha ādiṣu aham mama adhyāsa mūlaḥ tad anvaya vyatireka anusāri tvāt yat ittham tat tathā
yathā mṛd mūlaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti prayogaḥ
tatra vyatirekam darśayati deha iti
devadattasya suṣuptau adhyāsa abhāve vyavahāra abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
ca agrat svapnayoḥ adhyāse sati vyavahāraḥ iti anvayaḥ sphuṭa tvāt na uktaḥ

original: anena liṅgena kāraṇatayādhyāsaḥ sidhyati vyavahārarūpakāryānupapatyā veti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anena liṅgena kāraṇatayā adhyāsaḥ sidhyati vyavahāra rūpa kārya anupapatyā vā iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu manuṣyatvādijātimati dehe 'hamityābhimānamātrādvyavahāraḥ sidhyatu kimindriyādiṣu mamābhimānenetyāśaṅkyāha-nahīti /
analyzed: nanu manuṣya tva ādi jātimati dehe ham ityā abhimāna mātrāt vyavahāraḥ sidhyatu kim indriya ādiṣu mama abhimānena iti āśaṅkya āha nahi iti
indriya padam liṅga ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam
pratyakṣa ādi ityādi pada prayogāt

original: tathā ca pratyakṣaliṅgādiprayukto yo vyavahāro draṣṭā anumātā śrotāhamityādirūpaḥ sa indriyādīni mamatāspadānyagṛhītvā na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca pratyakṣa liṅga ādi prayuktaḥ yaḥ vyavahāraḥ draṣṭā anumātā śrotā aham ityādi rūpaḥ saḥ indriya ādīni mamatā āspadāni a gṛhītvā na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yadvā tāni mamatvenānupādāyayo vyavahāraḥ sa neti yojanā /
analyzed: yat vā tāni mamatvena an upādāya yaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa na iti yojanā

original: pūrvatrānupādānāsaṃbhavakriyayoreko vyavahāraḥ kartā iti ktvāpratyayaḥ sādhuḥ /
analyzed: pūrvatra anupādāna asaṃbhava kriyayoḥ ekaḥ vyavahāraḥ kartā iti ktvāpratyayaḥ sādhuḥ
uttaratra anupādāna vyavahārayoḥ eka ātma kartṛka tvāt
tat sādhu tvam iti bhedaḥ

original: indriyādiṣu mametyadhyāsabhāve 'ndhāderiva draṣṭṛtvādivyavahāro na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: indriya ādiṣu mama iti adhyāsa bhāve ndha ādeḥ iva draṣṭṛ tva ādi vyavahāraḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ
indriya adhyāsena eva vyavahārāt alam deha adhyāsena iti atas āha na ca iti
indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ
śarīram iti arthaḥ

original: nanvastvātmanā saṃyuktaṃ śarīraṃ teṣāmāśrayaḥ kimadhyāsenetyatrāha-na cānadhyastātmabhāveneti /
analyzed: nanu astu ātmanā saṃyuktam śarīram teṣām āśrayaḥ kim adhyāsena iti atra āha na ca anadhyasta ātma bhāvena iti
anadhyastaḥ ātma bhāvaḥ ātma tādātmyam yasmin tanā iti arthaḥ
a saṅgaḥ hi iti śruteḥ

original: ādhyāsika eva dehātmanoḥ saṃbandho na saṃyogādiriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ādhyāsikaḥ eva deha ātmanoḥ saṃbandhaḥ na saṃyoga ādiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu ātmanaḥ deha ādibhiḥ ādhyāsika saṃbandhaḥ mā astu
svatas cetana tayā pramātṛ tva upapatteḥ

original: na ca suṣuptau pramātṛtvāpattiḥ karaṇoparamāditi tatrāha-na caitasminniti /
analyzed: na ca suṣuptau pramātṛ tva āpattiḥ karaṇa uparamāt iti tatra āha na ca etasmin iti

original: pramā yadi nityacinmātraṃ tarhyāśrayatvāyogaḥ karaṇavaiyarthyaṃ ca /
analyzed: pramā yadi nitya cit mātram tarhi āśraya tva ayogaḥ karaṇa vaiyarthyam ca
yadi vṛtti mātram
jagat āndhya prasaṅgaḥ
vṛtteḥ jaḍa tvāt
bodhaḥ pramā

original: tadāśrayatvamasaṅgasyātmano vṛttimanmanastādātmyādhyāsaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tad āśraya tvam asaṅgasya ātmanaḥ vṛttimat manaḥ tādātmya adhyāsam vinā na saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
deha adhyāse
tad dharma adhyāse ca asati iti akṣara arthaḥ

original: tarhyātmanaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ māstu iti vadantaṃ pratyāha-na ceti /
analyzed: tarhi ātmanaḥ pramātṛ tvam mā astu iti vadantam pratyāha na ca iti
tasmāt ātmanaḥ pramātṛ tva ādi vyavahāra artham adhyāsaḥ ṅgīkartavyaḥ iti anumāna arthāpattyoḥ phalam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
pramāṇa sattvāt iti arthaḥ
yat vā pramāṇa praśnam samādhāya ākṣepam pariharati tasmāt iti
aham iti adhyāsasya pramātṛ antargata tvena adoṣa tvāt
avidyā vat āśrayāṇi api pramāṇāni eva iti yojanā
sati pramātari paścāt bhavan doṣaḥ iti ucyate
yathā kāca ādiḥ
avidyā tu pramātṛ antargata tvāt na doṣaḥ
yena pratyakṣa ādīnām aprāmāṇyam bhavet iti bhāvaḥ
nanu yat uktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyavahāraḥ dhyāsa kāryaḥ iti
tat ayuktam viduṣām adhyāsa abhāve pi vyavahāra dṛṣṭeḥ iti atas āha paśu ādibhiḥ ca iti
caśabdaḥ śaṅkā nirāsa arthaḥ

original: kiṃ vidvattvaṃ brahmāsmīti sākṣātkāraḥ uta yauktikamātmānātmabhedajñānam /
analyzed: kim vidvas tvam brahma asmi iti sākṣātkāraḥ uta yauktikam ātma anātma bheda jñānam

original: ādye bādhitādhyāsānuvṛttyā vyavahāra ithi samanvayasūtre vakṣyate /
analyzed: ādye bādhita adhyāsa anuvṛttyā vyavahāraḥ samanvaya sūtre vakṣyate

original: vivekināmapi vyavahārakāle paśvādibhiraviśeṣāt adhyāsavattvena tulyatvādvyavahāro 'dhyāsakārya iti yuktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vivekinām api vyavahāra kāle paśu ādibhiḥ aviśeṣāt adhyāsavat tvena tulya tvāt vyavahāraḥ dhyāsa kāryaḥ iti yuktam iti arthaḥ
atra ayam prayogaḥ vivekinaḥ dhyāsavantaḥ vyavahāravat tvāt
paśu ādi vat iti

original: tatra saṃgrahavākyaṃ vyākurvan dṛṣṭānte hetuṃ sphuṭayati-yathāhīti /
analyzed: tatra saṃgraha vākyam vyākurvan dṛṣṭānte hetum sphuṭayati yathā hi iti
vijñānasya anukūla tvam pratikūla tvam ca iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhana gocara tvam
tat eva udāharati yathā iti
ayam daṇḍaḥ mad aniṣṭa sādhanam
daṇḍa tvāt
anubhūta daṇḍa vat
idam tṛṇam iṣṭa sādhanam
anubhūta tṛṇa vat iti anumāya
adhunā hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tām āha evam iti
vyutpanna cittāḥ api iti anvayaḥ
vivekinaḥ pi iti arthaḥ
phalitam āha atas iti
anubhava balāt iti artaḥ
samānaḥ iti
adhyāsa kāryatvena tulyā iti arthaḥ
nanu asmākam pravṛttiḥ adhyāsāt iti na paśu ādayaḥ bruvanti

original: nāpi pareṣāmetatpratyatraṃ ataḥ sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭānta iti netyāha-paśvādīnāṃ ceti /
analyzed: nā api pareṣām etat pratyatram atas sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti na iti āha paśu ādīnām ca iti
teṣām ātma anātmanoḥ jñāna mātram asti na vivekaḥ
upadeśa abhāvāt
atas sāmagrī sattvāt adhyāsaḥ teṣām prasiddhaḥ iti arthaḥ
nigamayati tad sāmānya iti

original: taiḥ paścādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyavahāravattvaṃ tasya darśanādvivekināmapyayaṃ vyavahāraḥ samāna iti niścīyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ paśca ādibhiḥ sāmānyam vyavahāravattvam tasya darśanāt vivekinām api ayam vyavahāraḥ samānaḥ iti niścīyate iti saṃbandhaḥ
samāna tvam vyavahārasya adhyāsa kārya tvena iti uktam purastāt
tatra ukta anvaya vyatirekau smārayati tad kāḥ iti

original: tasyādhyāsasya kāla eva kālo yasya sa tatkālaḥ /
analyzed: tasya adhyāsasya kālaḥ eva kālaḥ yasya sa tad kālaḥ
yat vā adhyāsaḥ tadā vyavahāraḥ
tad abhāve suṣuptau tad abhāve iti ukta anvaya ādimān iti yāvat
atas vyavahāra liṅgāt vivekinām api deha ādiṣu aham mama abhimānaḥ sti iti anavadyam
nanu jyotiṣṭoma ādi vyavahārasya na adhyāsa janya tvam
tasya deha atirikta ātma jñāna pūrvaka tvāt iti āśaṅkya hetum aṅgīkaroti śāstrīye tu iti

original: tarhi kathaṃ vaidikakarmaṇo 'dhyāsajanyatvasiddhirityāśaṅkya kiṃ tatra dehānyātmadhīmātramapekṣitamuta,
analyzed: tarhi katham vaidika karmaṇaḥ dhyāsa janya tva siddhiḥ iti āśaṅkya kim tatra deha anya ātma dhī mātram apekṣitam uta
ādye tasya adhyāsa ābādhaka tvāt tad siddhiḥ iti āha tathā api iti
na dvitīyaḥ iti āhana vedānta iti

original: kṣutpipāsādigrasto jātiviśeṣavānahaṃ saṃsārīti jñānaṃ karmaṇyapekṣitaṃ na tadviparītātmatattvajñānaṃ,
analyzed: kṣudh pipāsā ādi grastaḥ jāti viśeṣavān aham saṃsārī iti jñānam karmaṇi apekṣitam na tad viparīta ātma tattva jñānam
anupayogāt pravṛtti bādhāt ca iti arthaḥ
śāstrīya karmaṇaḥ dhyāsa janya tvam nigamayati prākva iti
adhyāse āgamam pramāṇayati yathā hi iti
yathā pratyakṣa anumāna arthāpattayaḥ dhyāse pramāṇam tathā āgamaḥ api iti arthaḥ

original: 'brāhmaṇo yajeta''na ha vai snātvā bhikṣeta''aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhyaṇamupanayīta' 'kṛṣṇakeśo
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ yajeta na ha vai snātvā bhikṣeta aṣṭa varṣam brāhyaṇam upanayīta kṛṣṇa keśaḥ
gnīn ādadhīta eti āgamaḥ brāhmaṇa ādi padaiḥ adhikāriṇam varṇa di abhimāninam anuvadan adhyāsam gamayati iti bhāvaḥ

original: evamadhyāse pramāṇasiddhe 'pi kasya kutrādhyāsa iti jijñāsāyāṃ tamudāhartuṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smārayati-adhyaso nāmeti /
analyzed: evam adhyāse pramāṇa siddhe pi kasya kutra adhyāsaḥ iti jijñāsāyām tam udāhartum lakṣaṇam smārayati adhyasaḥ nāma iti
udāharati tat yathā iti

original: tallakṣaṇaṃ yathā spaṣṭaṃ bhavati tathodāhriyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇam yathā spaṣṭam bhavati tathā udāhriyate iti arthaḥ
sva dehāt bhedena pratyakṣāḥ putra ādayaḥ bāhyāḥ tad dharmān sākalya ādīn deha viśiṣṭa ātmani adhyasyati
tad dharma jñānāt svasmin tad tulya dharmān adhyasyati iti arthaḥ
bheda aparokṣa jñāne tad dharma adhyāsa ayogāt
anyathā khyāti anaṅgīkārāt ca iti draṣṭavyam
deha indriya dharmān manaḥ viśiṣṭa ātmani adhyasyati iti āha tathā iti

original: kṛśatvādidharmavato dehāderātmani tādātmyena kalpitatvāttaddharmāḥ sākṣādātmanyadhyastā iti mantavyam /
analyzed: kṛśa tva ādi dharmavataḥ deha ādeḥ ātmani tādātmyena kalpita tvāt tad dharmāḥ sākṣāt ātmani adhyastāḥ iti mantavyam
ajñāta pratyagrūpe sākṣīṇi manaḥ dharma adhyāsam āha tathā antaḥkaraṇa iti
dharma adhyāsam uktvā tadvat eva dharmi adhyāsam āha evam iti
antaḥkaraṇam sākṣiṇi abhedena adhyasya tad dharmān kāma ādīn adhyasyati iti
mantavyam
sva pracārāḥ manaḥ vṛttayaḥ
pratiprātilomyena asat jaṅa duḥkha ātmāka ahaṅkāra ādi vilakṣaṇa tayā saccid sukha ātmaka tvena añcati prakāśate iti pratyak
evam ātmani anātma tad dharma adhyāsam udāhṛtya anātmani ātmanaḥ api saṃsṛṣṭa tvena adhyāsam āha tat ca iti
aham iti adhyāse cit ātmanaḥ bhānam vācyam
anyathā jagat āndhya āpatteḥ
na ca anadhyastasya adhyāse bhānam asti
tasmāt rajata ādau idame iva ātmanaḥ saṃsarga adhyāsaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ
tad viparyayeṇa ipi
tasya adhyāstasya jaḍasya viparyayaḥ dhiṣṭhāna tvam
caitanyam ca tad ātmanā sthitam iti yāvat
tatra ajñāne kevala ātmanā saṃsargaḥ
manasi ajñāna upahitasya deha ādau mana upahitasya iti viśeṣaḥ
evam ātmani buddhi ādi adhyāsāt kartṛ tva ādi lābhaḥ
buddhi ādau ca ātma adhyasāt caitanya lābhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
varṇita adhyāsam upasaṃharati evam ayam iti
anādya vidyā ātmaka tayā kārya adhyāsasya anādi tvam adhyāsāt saṃskāraḥ tatas dhyāsaḥ iti
pravāhataḥ naisargi ga tvam
evam upādānam nimittam ca uktam bhavati
jñānam vinā dhvaṃsa abhāvāt ānantyam

original: taduktaṃ bhagavadgītāsu-'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā'iti /
analyzed: tat uktam bhagavadgītā su na rūpam asya iha tathā upalabhyate na antaḥ na ca ādiḥ na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā iti
hetum uktā svarūpam āha mithyā iti

original: mithyā māyā tayā pratīyata iti pratyayaḥ kāryaprapañcaḥ tatpratītiścetyevaṃsvarūpa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mithyā māyā tayā pratīyate iti pratyayaḥ kārya prapañcaḥ tad pratītiḥ ca iti evaṃsvarūpaḥ iti arthaḥ
tasya kāryam āha kartṛ tva iti
pramāṇam nigamayati sarva iti
sākṣi pratyakṣam eva adhyāsa dharmi grāhakam mānam
anumāna ādikam tu saṃbhāvāna artham iti abhipretya pratyakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ
evam adhyāsam varṇayitvā tad sādhye viṣaya prayojane darśayati asya iti

original: kartṛtvādyanarthahetoradhyāsasya samūlasyātyantikanāśo mokṣaḥ sa kenetyata āha-ātmeti /
analyzed: kartṛ tva ādi anartha hetoḥ adhyāsasya sa mūlasya ātyantika nāśaḥ mokṣaḥ sa kena iti atas āha ātmā iti
brahma ātma aikya sākṣātkārasya pratipattiḥ śravaṇa ādibhiḥ apratibandhena lābhaḥ tasyāḥ iti arthaḥ
vidyāyām kāraṇam āha sarve iti
ārabhyante adhītya vicāryante iti arthaḥ
mokṣaḥ phalam iti uktam bhavati

original: arthāttadvicārātmakaśāstrasyāpi te eva viṣayaprayojane iti jñeyam /
analyzed: arthāt tad vicāra ātmaka śāstrasya api te eva viṣaya prayojane iti jñeyam

original: nanu vedānteṣu prāṇādyupāstīnāṃ bhānādātmaikyameva teṣāmartha iti kathamityata āha-yathā ceti /
analyzed: nanu vedānteṣu prāṇa ādi upāstīnām bhānāt ātma aikyam eva teṣām arthaḥ iti katham iti atas āha yathā ca iti
śarīram eva śārīrakam
kutsita tvāt

original: tannivāsī śārīrako jīvastasya brahmatvavicāro mīmāṃsā tasyāmityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad nivāsī śārīrakaḥ jīvaḥ tasya brahma tva vicāraḥ mīmāṃsā tasyām iti arthaḥ
upāstīnām cit aikāgrya dvāra ātma aikya jñāna artha tvāt tad vākyānām api mahā tātparyam aikye iti vakṣyate
evam adhyāsa uktyā brahma ātma aikye virodha abhāvena viṣaya prayojanavatvāt śāstram ārambhaṇīyam iti
iti prathama varṇakam
vicārasya sākṣāt viṣayāḥ vedāntāḥ
teṣām gata artha tva agata artha tvābhyām ārambha saṃdehe kṛtsnasya vedasya vidhi para tvāt
vidheḥ ca brahma jijñāsā ityādinā pūrva tantreṇa vicārita tvāt

original: avagatārthā eva vedāntā ityavyavahitaviṣayābhāvānnārambha iti prāpte brūte-vedānteti /
analyzed: avagata arthāḥ eva vedāntāḥ iti avyavahita viṣaya abhāvāt na ārambhaḥ iti prāpte brūte vedānta iti
vedānta viṣayaka pūjita vicāra ātmaka śāstrasya vyākhyātum iṣṭasya sūtra saṃdarbhasya idam prathama sūtram iti arthaḥ

original: yadi vidhireva vedārthaḥ syāttadā sarvajño bādarāyaṇo brahmajijñāsāṃ na brūyāt,
analyzed: yadi vidhiḥ eva veda arthaḥ syāt tadā sarvajñaḥ bādarāyaṇaḥ brahma jijñāsām na brūyāt
brahmaṇi māna abhāvāt

original: ato brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvoktyā kenāpi tantreṇānavagatabrahmaparavedāntavicāra ārambhaṇīya iti sūtrakṛddarśayati /
analyzed: atas brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsya tva uktyā kena api tantreṇa anavagata brahma para vedānta vicāraḥ ārambhaṇīyaḥ iti sūtrakṛt darśayati
tat ca vyācikhyāsitasya eti padena bhāṣyakāraḥ babhāṣe
iti dvitīya varṇakam
evam varṇaka dvayena vedānta vicārasya kartavya tāyām viṣaya prayojanavat tvam agata artha tvam
ca iti hetu dvayam sūtrasya arthika artham vyākhyāya akṣara vyākhyām ārabhamāṇaḥ punar api adhikāri bhāva ābhābhyām

original: śāstrārambhasaṃdehe sati athaśabdasyānantaryārthakatvoktyā adhikāriṇaṃ sādhayati-tatrāthaśabda iti /
analyzed: śāstra ārambha saṃdehe sati atha śabdasya ānantarya arthaka tva uktyā adhikāriṇam sādhayati tatra atha śabdaḥ iti
sūtre iti arthaḥ
maṅgala anantara ārambha praśna kārtsnyeṣu atho atha eti atha śabdasya santi
tatra atha yoga anuśāsanam iti atra

original: sūtre yathā athaśabda ārambhārthakaḥ yogaśāstramārabhyata iti
analyzed: sūtre yathā atha śabdaḥ ārambha arthakaḥ yoga śāstram ārabhyate iti

original: tadvadatra kiṃ na syādityata āha-nādhikārārtha iti /
analyzed: tadvat atra kim na syāt iti atas āha na adhikāra arthaḥ iti
ayam āśayaḥ kim jijñāsā padam jñāna icchā param uta vicāra lakṣakam

original: ādye 'thaśabdasyārambhārthatve brahmajñānecchārabhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ syāt sa cāsaṃgataḥ,
analyzed: ādye tha śabdasya ārambha artha tve brahma jñāna icchā ārabhyate iti sūtra arthaḥ syāt sa ca asaṃgataḥ
tasyāḥ an ārabhya tvāt

original: nahi pratyathikaraṇaṃ icchā kriyate kintu tayā vicāraḥ /
analyzed: nahi icchā kriyate kintu tayā vicāraḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
adhyāhṛte ca tena eva ārambha ukteḥ atha śabda vaiyarthyāt
kintu adhikāri siddhi artha mānāntarya artha tā eva yuktā iti adhunā saṃbhāvitam arthāntaram dūṣayati maṅgalasya iti

original: vākyārtho vicārakartavyatā na hi tatra maṅgalasya kartṛtvādinānvayo 'stītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ vicāra kartavyatā na hi tatra maṅgalasya kartṛ tva ādinā anvayaḥ sti iti arthaḥ

original: nanu sūtrakṛtā śāstrādau maṅgalaṃ kāryamityathaśabdaḥ pratyukta iti cet satyaṃ,
analyzed: nanu sūtrakṛtā śāstra ādau maṅgalam kāryam iti atha śabdaḥ pratyuktaḥ iti ced satyam

original: na tasyārtho maṅgalaṃ kintu ca tacchravaṇamuccāraṇaṃ ca maṅgalakṛtyaṃ karoti /
analyzed: na tasya arthaḥ maṅgalam kintu ca tad śravaṇam uccāraṇam ca maṅgala kṛtyam karoti
tad arthaḥ tu ānantaryam eva iti aha artha anatara iti
artha antaram ānantaryam
śrutyā śravaṇena śaṅkha vīṇā ādi nāda śravaṇa vat oṅkāra atha śabdayoḥ śravaṇam maṅgala phalakam
oṅkāḥ ca athaśabdaḥ ca dvau etau brahmaṇaḥ purā
kaṇṭham bhittvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau imau
iti smaraṇāt iti bhāvaḥ
nanu prapañcaḥ mithyā iti prakṛte sati

original: atha mataṃ prapañcaḥ satya ityatra pūrvaprakṛtārthāduttarārthasyārthāstaratvārtho 'thaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: atha matam prapañcaḥ satyaḥ iti atra pūrva prakṛta arthāt uttara arthasya artha āstara tva arthaḥ tha śabdaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tathā atra kim na syāt iti atas āha pūrva iti
phalataḥ phalasya iti arthaḥ

original: brahmajijñāsāyāḥ pūrvaṃ arthaviśeṣaḥ prakṛto nāsti yasmāttasyā arthāntaratvamathaśabdenocyeta /
analyzed: brahma jijñāsāyāḥ pūrvam artha viśeṣaḥ prakṛtaḥ na asti yasmāt tasyāḥ artha antara tvam atha śabdena ucyeta
yatas kutaścid tad ardha antara tvam sūtrakṛtā na vaktavyam
phala abhāvāt

original: yadi phalasya jijñāsāpadoktakartavyavicārasya hetutvena yatpūrvaṃ prakṛtaṃ tadapekṣāstītyapekṣābalātprakṛtahetumākṣipya tator'thāntaratvamucyate,
analyzed: yadi phalasya jijñāsā pada ukta kartavya vicārasya hetu tvena yat pūrvam prakṛtam tad apekṣā asti iti apekṣā balāt prakṛta hetum ākṣipya tatas ṛtha antara tvam ucyate
tadā artha antara tvam ānantarye ntarbhavati hetu phala bhāva jñānāya ānantaryasya avaśyam vācya tvāt
tasmāt idam artha antaram iti ukte tasya hetu tva apratīteḥ
tasmāt idam anantaram iti ukte bhavati eva hetu tva pratītiḥ
na ca aśvāt anantaraḥ gauḥ iti atra hetutva bhāna āpattiḥ iti vācyam
tayoḥ deśataḥ kālataḥ vā vyavadhānena ānantaryasya a mukhya tvāt
atas sāmagrī phalayoḥ eva mukhyam ānantaryam
a vyavadhānāt

original: tasminnukte satyarthāntaratvaṃ na vācyaṃ jñānatvādvaiphalyācceti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin ukte sati artha antara tvam na vācyam jñāna tvāt vaiphalyāt ca iti bhāvaḥ

original: phalasya vicārasya pūrvaprakṛtahetvapekṣāyā balādyadarthāntaratvaṃ tasyānantāryabhedāt na pṛthagathaśabdārthatvamityadhyāhṛtya bhāṣyaṃ yojanīyam
analyzed: phalasya vicārasya pūrva prakṛta hetu apekṣāyāḥ balāt yat artha antara tvam tasya ananta ārya bhedāt na pṛthak atha śabda artha tvam iti adhyāhṛtya bhāṣyam yojanīyam

original: yadvā pūrvaprakṛter'the 'pekṣā yasyā arthāntaratāyāstasyāḥ phalaṃ jñānaṃ taddvārānantaryāvyatirekāttajjñāne tasyāḥ jñānatonatarbhāvānnāthaśabdārthatetyarthaḥ
analyzed: yat vā pūrva prakṛti ṛthe pekṣā yasyāḥ artha antara tāyāḥ tasyāḥ phalam jñānam tad dvāra ānantarya avyatirekāt tad jñāne tasyāḥ
nanu ānantarya arthaka tve pi ānantaryasya avadhiḥ kaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha sati ca iti

original: yanniyamena pūrvavṛttaṃ pūrvabhāvi asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ puṣkalākāraṇamiti yāvat,
analyzed: yat niyamena pūrva vṛttam pūrva bhāvi asādhāraṇa kāraṇam puṣkala akāraṇam iti yāvat
tat eva avadhiḥ iti vaktavyam iti arthaḥ

original: nanvastu dharmavicāra iva brahmavicāre 'pi vedādhyayanaṃ puṣkalakāraṇamityāha-svādhyāyeti /
analyzed: nanu astu dharma vicāraḥ iva brahma vicāre veda adhyayanam puṣkala kāraṇam iti āha svādhyāya iti
samānam brahma vicāre sādhāraṇa kāraṇam na puṣkala kāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena 'yajñena dānena'ityādiśrutyā 'yajñādikarmāṇi jñānāya vidhīyante'iti sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
analyzed: nanu saṃyoga pṛthaktva nyāyena yajñena dānena etyādi śrutyā yajña ādi karmāṇi jñānāya vidhīyante iti sarvāpekṣā adhikaraṇe vakṣyate

original: tathā ca pūrvatantreṇa tadavabodhaḥ puṣkalakāraṇamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
analyzed: tathā ca pūrva tantreṇa tad avabodhaḥ puṣkala kāraṇam iti śaṅkate nanu iti
iha brahma jijñāsāyām sādhāraṇam kāraṇam
ekasya tu ubhaya artha tve saṃyoga pṛthaktvam iti jaiminīsūtram

original: tadarthastu-ekasya karmaṇa ubhayārthatve 'nekaphalasaṃbandhe saṃyogaḥ ubhayasaṃbandhabodhakaṃ vākyaṃ tasya pṛthaktvaṃ bhedaḥ sa hetuḥ /
analyzed: tad arthaḥ tu ekasya karmaṇaḥ ubhaya artha tve neka phala saṃbandhe saṃyogaḥ ubhaya saṃbandha bodhakam vākyam tasya pṛthaktvam bhedaḥ sa hetuḥ

original: tataśacātrāpi jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇāṃ svargādiphalakālāmapi 'yajñena dānena'ityādi vacanāt jñānārthatvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: tatas ca atra api jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmaṇām svarga ādi phala kālām api yajñena dānena etyādi vacanāt jñāna artha tvam ca iti
ṭa pariharatinā ityādinā

original: ayamāśayaḥ--na tāvat pūrvatantrasthaṃ nyāyasahasraṃ brahmajñāne tadvicāre vā puṣkalaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ na tāvat pūrva tantra stham nyāya sahasram brahma jñāne tad vicāre vā puṣkalam kāraṇam
tasya dharma nirṇa mātra hetu tvāt
na api karma nirṇayaḥ
tasya anuṣṭhāna hetu tvāt
na hi dhūma agnyoḥ iva dharma brahmaṇoḥ vyāptiḥ asti
yayā dharma jñānāt brahma jñānam bhavet
yadi api śukti viveka ādi dvārā karmāṇi hetavaḥ
tathā api teṣām na adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tvam
ajñātānām teṣām janma antara kṛtānām api phala hetu tvāt

atas karmāṇi
tad avabodhaḥ

hṛdayasya agre vadyati atha jihvayā atha vakṣasaḥ iti yava dānānām krama jñāna artha atha śabda vat iti āśaṅkya āha yathā iti

original: avadānānāmānantaryaniyamaḥ kramo yathāthaśabdārthastasya vivakṣitatvāt na tatheha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
analyzed: avadānānām ānantarya niyamaḥ kramaḥ yathā atha śabda arthaḥ tasya vivakṣita tvāt na tathā iha dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
eka kartṛka tva abhāvena tayoḥ krama anapekṣaṇāt
atas na tha śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ

yeṣām eka pradhāna śeṣa tā
yathā avadānānām prayāja ādīnām ca
yayoḥ ca śeṣa śeṣi tvam
yathā prayāja darśayoḥ
yasya ca adhikṛta adhikāra tvam

original: yathā apāṃ praṇayanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamāśritya 'godohanena paśukāmasya'iti vihitasya godohanasya /

na evam jijñāsayoḥ śeṣa śeṣi tve śruti liṅgha ādikam mānam asti

iti śruti smṛtibhyām tvayā udāhṛta śruti smṛtyoḥ aśuddha citta viṣaya tva avagamāt

analyzed: yadā na śuddham iti rāgeṇa jñāyate tadā gṛhī bhavet

original: dvādaśādhyāyānāṃ caikadharmajijñāsyakānāṃ kramavattayoḥ kramo vivakṣita iti kramārtho 'thaśabda ityaśaṅkyāha-phaleti /

original: yathā vā kāmacikitsātantrayorjijñāsyabhedānna kramāpekṣā tadvanmīmāṃsayorna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ /

original: viṣayābhimukhyenodetītyabhyudayo viṣayādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ svargādikaṃ tacca dharmajñānahetormīmāṃsayāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /

original: na kevalaṃ phalasya svarūpato bhedaḥ kintu hetuto 'pītyāha-tacceti /

original: brahmajñānaṃ ca svotpattivyatiriktamanuṣṭhānaṃ nāpekṣata ityāha-na ceti /

original: tasmāt 'ato 'nyadārtam'iti śrutyā anātmamātrasyānityatvavivekāt vairāgyalābha iti bhāvaḥ /

original: ata eva 'dharmajijñāsā'ityatrāpi 'sā hi tasya jñātumicchā'iti icchāṃ gṛhītvā ṣaṣṭhīsamāso darśitaḥ /

original: vicāralakṣaṇāyāṃ tu vicārasya kleśātmakatayā prathamaṃ phalākāṅkṣatvāt dharmāya jijñāse caturthasamāsa uktaḥ,

original: tathā vṛttikārairbrahmaṇe jijñāsā ityuktaṃ cedastu jñānatvena brahmaṇaḥ phalatvāditi /

original: nanu 'brahmakṣatramidaṃ brahma āyāti brahma svayambhūrbrahma prajāpatiḥ'iti śrutiṣu loke ca brāhmaṇatvajātau jīve vede kamalāsane ca brahmaśabdaḥ  #
analyzed: nanu brahma kṣatram idam brahma āyāti brahma svayambhūḥ brahma prajāpatiḥ iti śrutiṣu loke ca brāhmaṇa tva jātau jīve vede kamalāsane ca brahma śabdaḥ  /
prayujyate iti āśaṅkā āha atas eva iti
jagat kāraṇatva lakṣaṇa pratipādaka sūtra asāṃgatya prasaṅgāt eva iti arthaḥ
vṛtti antare śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī iti uktam dūṣayati brahmaṇaḥ iti iti
saṃbandha sāmānyam śeṣaḥ
jijñāsā iti atra san pratyavācyāyāḥ icchāyāḥ jñānam karma
tasya jñānasya brahma karma
tatra sakarmaka kriyāyāḥ karma jñānam vinā jñātum aśakya tvāt

original: icchāyā viṣayajñānajanyatvācca prathamāpekṣitaṃ karmaiva ṣaṣṭhyā vācyaṃ na śeṣa ityarthaḥ /

original: nanu pramāṇādikamanyadeva tatkarmāstu brahma tu śeṣitayā saṃbadhyatāṃ tatrāha-jijñāsyāntareti /
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa ādikam anyat eva tad karma astu brahma tu śeṣi tayā saṃbadhyatām tatra āha jijñāsya antara iti

original: śrutaṃ karma tyaktvānyadaśrutaṃ kalpayan 'piṇḍamutsṛjya karaṃ leḍhi'iti nyāyamanusaratīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: śrutam karma tyaktvā anyat aśrutam kalpayan piṇḍam utsṛjya karam leḍhi iti nyāyam anusarati iti bhāvaḥ
gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ śaṅkyate nanu iti
ṣaṣṭhī śeṣā iti vidhānāt

original: ṣaṣṭhyā saṃvandhamātraṃ pratītamapi viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ sakarmakakriyāsaṃnidhānāt karmatve paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhyā saṃvandha mātram pratītam api viśeṣa ākāṅkṣāyām sakarmaka kriyā saṃnidhānāt karma tve paryavasyati iti arthaḥ
abhisaṃdhim a jānan iva uttaram āha evam api iti
karma lābhe pi pratyakṣam kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛti iti sūtreṇa jijñāsā padasya ākāra pratyaya anta tvena

original: kṛdantasya yoge vihitaṃ prathamāpekṣitaṃ ca karmatvaṃ tyaktvā parokṣamaśābdaṃ kalpayata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kṛt antasya yoge vihitam prathama apekṣitam ca karma tvam tyaktvā parokṣam aśābdam kalpayate iti arthaḥ
śeṣa vādī sva abhisaṃdhim uddhāṭayati na vyarthaḥ iti
śeṣa ṣaṣṭhyām brahma saṃbandhinī jijñāsā pratijñātā bhavati

original: tatra yāni brahmāśritāni lakṣaṇapramāṇayuktijñānasādhanaphalāni teṣāmapi vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavati /
analyzed: tatra yāni brahma āśritāni lakṣaṇa pramāṇa yukti jñāna sādhana phalāni teṣām api vicāraḥ pratijñātaḥ bhavati
tad jijñāsāyāḥ api brahma jñāna artha tvena brahma saṃbandhi tvāt

original: karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmakarmaka eva vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavatītyabhisaṃdhinā śeṣaṣaṣṭhītyucyate /
analyzed: karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyām tu brahma karmakaḥ eva vicāraḥ pratijñātaḥ bhavati iti abhisaṃdhinā śeṣaṣaṣṭhī iti ucyate
atas mad prayāsaḥ na vyarthaḥ

original: brahmatatsaṃbandhināṃ sarveṣāṃ vicārapratijñānamarthaḥ phalaṃ yasya tattvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: brahma tad saṃbandhinām sarveṣām vicāra pratijñānam arthaḥ phalam yasya tattvāt iti arthaḥ
tvad prayāsasya idam phalam na yuktam

original: sūtreṇa mukhataḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo vicāre pratijñāte sati tadupakaraṇānāṃ vicārasyārthikapratijñāyā uditatvādityāha siddhāntī-na pradhāneti
analyzed: sūtreṇa mukhatas pradhānasya brahmaṇaḥ vicāre pratijñāte sati tad upakaraṇānām vicārasya ārthika pratijñāyāḥ udita tvāt iti āha pradhāna iti
saṃgṛhītam artham saṃdṛṣṭāntam vyākaroti brahma hi ityādinā
tat vijijñāsasva eti mūla śruti anusārāt ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī iti āha śruti anugamāt ca iti
śruti sūtrayoḥ eka artha tva lābhāt ca iti arthaḥ
jijñāsā padasya avayava artham āha jñātum iti

original: nanvanavagate vastunīcchāyā adarśanāt tasyā mūlaṃ viṣayajñānaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: nanu anavagate vastuni icchāyāḥ adarśanāt tasyāḥ mūlam viṣaya jñānam vaktavyam
brahma jñānam tu jijñāsāyāḥ phalam
tat eva mūlam katham iti āśaṅkya āha avagati iti
āvaraṇa nivṛtti rūpa abhivyaktimat caitanyam avagatiḥ paryantaḥ vadhiḥ yasya akhaṇḍa sākṣātkāra vṛtti jñānasya tat eva jijñāsāyāḥ karma
tat eva phalam

original: mūlaṃ tvāpātajñānamityadhunā vakṣyata iti phalamūlajñānayorbhedānna jijñāsānupapattirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mūlam tu āpāta jñānam iti adhunā vakṣyate iti phala mūla jñānayoḥ bhedāt na jijñāsā anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu gamanasya grāmaḥ karma

original: tatprāptiḥ phalamiti bhedāt karma eva phalamityuktaṃ tatrāha-phaleti /
analyzed: tad prāptiḥ phalam iti bhedāt karma eva phalam iti uktam tatra āha phala iti

original: kriyāntare tayorbhede 'pi icchāyāḥ phalaviṣayatvāt karmaiva phalamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā antare tayoḥ bhede pi icchāyāḥ phala viṣaya tvāt karma eva phalam iti arthaḥ
nanu jñāna avagatyoḥ aikyāt bheda uktiḥ ayuktā iti atas āha jñānena iti

original: jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ avagatistatphalaṃ iti bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: jñānam vṛttiḥ avagatiḥ tad phalam iti bhedaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

avagateḥ phala tvam sphuṭayati brahma iti
hi śabda uktam hetum āha niḥśeṣa iti

avayava artham uktvā sūtra vākya artham āha tasmāt iti
atra san pratyayasya vicāra lakṣaka tvam tavya pratyayena sūcayati

original: athātaśabdābhyāmadhikāriṇaḥ sādhitattvāttena brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: atha atas śabdābhyām adhikāriṇaḥ sādhi tattvāt tena brahma jñānāya vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
iti tṛtīyam varṇakam

punar śabdaḥ varṇaka antara dyotana arthaḥ

original: athajñātaṃ kenāpi tarhi taduddeśena vicāraḥ kartuṃ na śakyate,
analyzed: atha jñātam kena api tarhi tad uddeśena vicāraḥ kartum na śakyate
ajñātasya uddeśa ayogāt

original: tathā ca buddhāvanārūḍhasya vicārātmakaśāstreṇa vedānteśca pratipādanāyogāt /
analyzed: tathā ca buddhau anārūḍhasya vicāra ātmaka śāstreṇa vedānteḥ ca pratipādana ayogāt

original: tatpratipādyatvarūpaḥ saṃbandho nāstīti jñānānutpatteḥ phalamapi nāstītyanārabhyaṃ śāstramityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tad pratipādya tva rūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ nā asti iti jñāna anutpatteḥ phalam api nā asti iti anārabhyam śāstram iti arthaḥ
āpāta prasiddhyā viṣaya ādi lābhāt ārambhaṇīyam iti siddhāntayati ucyate etyādinā
prasiddham tāvat iti arthaḥ
astitvasya aprakṛta tvena asti padasya prasiddhi paratvāt
nanu kena mānena brahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ

original: na ca 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti śrutyā seti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca satyam jñānam anantam brahma eti śrutyā sā iti vācyam

original: brahmapadasya loke saṃgatigrahābhāvena tadghaṭitavākyasyābodhakatvādityāśaṅkyabrahmapadavyutpatyā prathamaṃ tasya nirguṇasya saguṇasya ca prasiddhirityāha-brahmaśabdasya  #
analyzed: brahma padasya loke saṃgati graha abhāvena tad ghaṭita vākyasya abodhaka tvāt iti āśaṅkya brahma pada vyutpatyā prathamam tasya nirguṇasya saguṇasya ca prasiddhiḥ iti āha brahma śabdasya
hi iti

original: asyārthaḥ-śrutau sūtre ca brahmapadasya prayogānyathānupapattyā kaścidartho 'stīti jñāyate,
analyzed: asya arthaḥ śrutau sūtre ca brahma padasya prayoga anyathā anupapattyā kaścid arthaḥ sti iti jñāyate
pramāṇa vākye nirarthaka śabda prayoga adarśanāt
sa ca arthaḥ mahatva rūpaḥ iti vyākaraṇāt niścīyate
vṛddhau iti smaraṇāt
sā ca vṛddhiḥ niravadhika mahat tvam iti saṃkocaka abhāvāt
śrutau ananta padena saha prayogāt ca jñāyate

original: niravadhikamahatvaṃ cāntavattvādidoṣavatve sarvajñatvādiguṇahīnatve ca na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: niravadhika mahat tvam ca antavat tva ādi doṣava tve sarvajña tva ādi guṇa hīna tve ca na saṃbhavati
loke guṇa hīna doṣavatoḥ alpa tva prasiddheḥ

original: ato bṛṃhaṇādbrahmeti vyutpatyā deśakālavastutaḥ paricchedābhāvarūpaṃ nityatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: atas bṛṃhaṇāt brahma iti vyutpatyā deśa kāla vastutaḥ pariccheda abhāva rūpam nitya tvam pratīyate
avidyā ādi doṣa śūnya tvam śuddha tvam
jāḍya rāhityam buddha tvam
bandha kāle pi svatas bandha bhāvaḥ mukta tvam ca pratīyate
evam doṣa śūnyam nirguṇam prasiddham
tathā sarvajña tva ādi gumakam ca tat pada vācyam prasiddham

original: jñeyasya kāryasya vā pariśeṣe 'lpatvaprasaṅgena sarvajñatvasya sarvakāryaśaktimattvasya ca lābhāditi /
analyzed: jñeyasya kāryasya vā pariśeṣe lpatva prasaṅgena sarvajña tvasya sarva kārya śaktimat tvasya ca lābhāt iti
evam tad padāt prasiddheḥ apramāṇa tvena āpāta tvāt ajñāna anivartaka tvāt jijñāsā upapattiḥ iti uktvā tvaṃ padārtha ātmanā api brāhmaṇaḥ prasiddhyā tad upapattiḥ atyāha sarvasya iti
sarvasya lokasya yaḥ yam ātmā tad abhedāt rahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ kā iti atas āha sarvaḥ hi iti

original: ahamasmīti na pratyetīti na kintu pratyetyeva /
analyzed: aham asmi iti na pratyeti iti na kintu pratyeti eva
sā eva saccidātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
ātmanaḥ kutas sattā iti śūnya matam āśaṅkya āha yadi hi iti

original: ātmanaḥ śūnyasya pratītau ahaṃ nāsmīti loko jānīyāt /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ śūnyasya pratītau aham na asmi iti lokaḥ jānīyāt
lokaḥ tu aham asmi iti jānāti tasmāt ātmanoḥ stitva prasiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
ātma prasiddhau api brahmaṇaḥ kim āyātam tatra āha ātmā ca iti
ayam ātmā brahma etyādi śruteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prasiddhi pakṣa uktam doṣam pūrvapakṣeṇa smārayati yadi iti
ajñāta tva abhāvena viṣaya ādi abhāvāt avicārya tvam prāptam iti arthaḥ

original: yathā idaṃ rajatamiti vastutaḥ śuktiprasiddhistadvat ahamasmīti sattvacaitanyarūpatvasāmānyena
analyzed: yathā idam rajatam iti vastutas śukti prasiddhiḥ tadvat aham asmi iti sattva caitanya rūpatva sāmānyena

original: vastuto brahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ neyaṃ pūrṇānandabrahmatvarūpaviśeṣagocarā vādināṃ vivādābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: vastutas brahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ na iyam pūrṇānanda brahma tva rūpa viśeṣa gocarā vādinām vivāda abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: na hi śuktitvaviśeṣadarśane sati rajataṃ raṅgamanyadveti vipratipattirasti /
analyzed: na hi śukti tva viśeṣa darśane sati rajatam raṅgam anyat vā iti vipratipattiḥ asti

original: ato vipratipattyanyathānupapatyā sāmānyataḥ prasiddhāvapi viśeṣasyājñātatvādviṣayādisiddhiriti siddhāntayati na ityādinā /
analyzed: atas vipratipatti anyathā anupapatyā sāmānyataḥ prasiddhau api viśeṣasya ajñāta tvāt viṣaya ādi siddhiḥ iti siddhāntayati na ityādinā

original: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ svatmani saccitpūrṇādipadavācyabhedāt kalpita iti mantavyam /

original: kimātmā dehādirūpaḥ uta tadbhinna iti vipratipattikoṭitvena dehendriyamanobuddhiśūnyānyuktva

original: na veti vivādakoṭitvena yogimatamāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvara iti /

original: niratiśayatvaṃ gṛhītvā īśvaraḥ sarvajñatvādisaṃpanna iti yogino vadanti /

original: yata iti kāraṇanirdeśaḥ asya jagato nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasyānekakartṛbhoktṛsaṃyuktasya

original: anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāva iti janmasthitināśānāmiha grahaṇam /
analyzed: anyeṣām api bhāva vikārāṇām triṣu eva antarbhāvaḥ iti janma sthiti nāśānām iha grahaṇam

original: yāskaparipaṭhitānāṃ tu 'jāyate 'sti' ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe teṣāṃ jagataḥ sthitkāle saṃbhāvyamānatvānmūlakāraṇādutpattisthitināśāṃ jagato na gṛhītāḥ

original: tanmā śaṅkīti yotpattirbrahmastatraiva sthitiḥ pralayaśca ta eva gṛhyante //

original: na yathoktaviśeṣaṇasya jagato yathoktaviśeṣaṇamīśvaraṃ muktvānyataḥ pradhānādacetanādaṇubhyo 'bhāvātsaṃsāriṇo vā utpattyādi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam

original: satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣu jagato janmādikāraṇavādiṣu tadarthagrahaṇadārḍhāyānumānamapi vedāntavākyāvirodhi pramāṇaṃ bhavanna nivāryate,

iti ca puruṣa buddhi sāhāyyam ātmanoḥ

original: na dharmajijñāsāyāmiva śrutyādayo 'nubhavādayaśca yathāsaṃbhavamiha pramāṇaṃ anubhavāvasānatvādbhūtavastuviṣayatvācca brahmajñānasya /

original: kartavye hi viṣaye nānubhavāpekṣāstīti śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyaṃ syātpuruṣādhīnātmalābhatvācca kartavyasya /

original: kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca karma,

analyzed: pūrva ukta sarvajñatva ādi viśeṣaṇakam īśvaram muktvā jagataḥ utpati ādikam na saṃbhavati iti bhāṣyeṇa kartāram vinā kāryam na asti iti vyatirekaḥ uktaḥ
tena yat kāryam tat sa kartṛkam iti vyāptiḥ jñāyate

original: etadeva vyāptijñānaṃ jagati pakṣe kartāraṃ sādhayat sarvajñeśvaraṃ sādhayati kiṃ śrutyeti tārkikāṇāṃ bhrāntimupanyasyati-etadeveti /
analyzed: etat eva vyāpti jñānam jagati pakṣe kartāram sādhayat sarvajña īśvaram sādhayati kim śrutyā iti tārkikāṇām bhrāntim upanyasyati etat eva iti

original: etadevānumānameva sādhanaṃ na śrutiriti manyanta iti yojanā /

original: athavā etadvyāptijñānameva śrutyanugrāhakayuktimātratvenāsmatsaṃmataṃ sadanumānaṃ svatantramiti manyanta ityarthaḥ /

original: yadi śrutīnāṃ svatantramānatvaṃ na syāttarhi 'tattu samanvayāt'ityādinā tāsāṃ tātparyaṃ sūtrakṛnna vicārayet,
analyzed: yadi śrutīnām svatantra mānatvam na syāt tarhi tat tu samanvayāt ityādinā tāsām tātparyam sūtrakṛt na vicārayet

original: tasmāduttarasūtrāṇāṃ śrutivicārārthatvāt janmādisūtre 'pi śrutireva svātantryeṇa vicāryate nānumānamiti pariharati-neti /

original: saṃsāre kṣiptaḥ kenaciddayāparavaśenācāryeṇa nāsi tvaṃ saṃsārī kintu 'tatvamasi'ityupadiṣṭasvarūpaḥ

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-dharmo hi yathā yathā jñāyate tathā tathā kartuṃ śakyate iti yathāśāstraṃ puruṣabuddhyapekṣā vikalpāḥ sarve pramārūpā eva bhavanti,

original: na siddhavastujñānaṃ pauruṣaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇavastujanyaṃ,

original: siddher'the jñānapramātvasya vastvadhīnatve sati brahmajñānamapi vastujanyameva yathārthaṃ na puruṣatantraṃ bhūtārthaviṣatvāt,

original: ataḥ sādhyer'the sarve vikalpāḥ puntantrā na siddher'the iti vailakṣaṇyāt na dharmasāmyaṃ brāhmaṇa iti mananādyapekṣā siddheti bhāvaḥ /

original: pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameva prāptamiti kṛtvā pramāṇāntarasyaiva vicāraprāptāviti śeṣaḥ /

original: kiṃ yatkāryaṃ tadbrahmajamityanumānaṃ brahmasādhakaṃ kiṃ vā yatkāryaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti /

parāñci khāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūḥ iti śruteḥ

original: indriyāgrāhyatve 'pi vyāptigrahaḥ kiṃ na syādataāha-sati hīti /

original: idaṃ kāryaṃ brahmajamiti vyāptipratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇo 'tīndriyatvānna saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /

original: dvitīye kāraṇasiddhāvapi kāraṇasya brahmatvaṃ śrutiṃ vinā jñātumaśakyamityāha--kāryamātramiti /

original: saṃbandhaṃ kṛtaṃ yasmāt śrutimantareṇa jagatkāraṇaṃ brahmeti niścayālābhastasmāt tallābhāya śrutireva prādhānyena vicāraṇīyā,
analyzed: saṃbandham kṛtam yasmāt śrutim antareṇa jagat kāraṇam brahma iti niścaya alābhaḥ tasmāt tad lābhāya śrutiḥ eva prādhānyena vicāraṇīyā

original: anumānaṃ tūpādānatvādisāmānyadvārā mṛdādivat brāhmaṇaḥ svakāryātmakatvādiśrautārthasaṃbhāvanārthaṃ guṇatayā vicāryamityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi
analyzed: anumānam tu upādāna tva ādi sāmānya dvārā mṛd ādi vat brāhmaṇaḥ sva kārya ātmaka tva ādi śrauta artha saṃbhāvanā artham guṇatayā vicāryam iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: iha brahmaṇi lakṣaṇārthatvena vicārayitumiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ kimityarthaḥ /

original: atra hi prathamasūtre viśiṣṭādhikāriṇo brahmavicāraṃ pratijñāya brahmajñātukāmāsya dvitīyasūtre lakṣaṇamucyate /
analyzed: atra hi prathama sūtre viśiṣṭa adhikāriṇaḥ brahma vicāram pratijñāya brahma jñātu kāmā asya dvitīya sūtre lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: tathaiva śrutāvapi mumukṣorbrahmajñātukāmasya jagatkāraṇatvopalakṣaṇānuvādena brahma jñāpyata iti śrautārthakramānusāritvaṃ sūtrasya darśayituṃ  #
analyzed: tathā eva śrutau api mumukṣoḥ brahma jñātu kāmasya jagat kāraṇatva upalakṣaṇa anuvādena brahma jñāpyate iti śrauta artha krama anusāri tvam sūtrasya darśayitum
sa upakramam vākyam paṭhati bhṛguḥ iti

atra yena iti ekatvam vivakṣitam

original: yadekaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadbrahmeti vā yatkāraṇaṃ tadekaṃ bahmeti vā mahāvākyamiti bhedaḥ /
analyzed: yat ekam kāraṇam tat brahma iti vā yat kāraṇam tat ekam bahma iti vā mahāvākyam iti bhedaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi svarūpalakṣaṇamityāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣānnirṇito yataḥśabdārthaḥ satyajñānānanda ityāha--tasya ceti /
analyzed: kim tarhi svarūpa lakṣaṇam iti āśaṅkya vākya śeṣāt nirṇitaḥ yatas śabda arthaḥ satya jñāna ānandaḥ iti āha tasya ca iti

original: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ' 'tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma'ityādi śākhāntarīyavākyānyapyasya viṣaya ityāha-anyānyapīti
analyzed: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ tasmāt etat brahma nāma rūpam annam ca jāyate vijñānam ānandam brahma etyādi śākhāntarīya vākyāni api asya viṣaye iti āha anyāni api iti
evañjatīyaka tvam eva āha nityā iti

original: tadevaṃ sarvāsu śākhāsu lakṣaṇadvayavākyāni jijñāsye brahmaṇi samanvitāni,
analyzed: tat evam sarvāsu śākhāsu lakṣaṇa dvaya vākyāni jijñāsye brahmaṇi samanvitāni
tad dhiyā muktiḥ iti siddham

śāstra yoni tva adhikaraṇam sū
jagat kāraṇatva prardānena sarvajñam brahma iti upakṣiptam tat eva draḍhayan āha
śāstra yoni tvāt

original: mahata ṛgvedādeḥ śāstrasyānekavidyāsthānopabṛṃhitasya pradīpavatsarvārthāvadyotinaḥ sarvajñakalpasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃbrahma /
analyzed: mahataḥ ṛgveda ādeḥ śāstrasya aneka vidyā sthāna upabṛṃhitasya pradīpa vat sarva artha avadyotinaḥ sarvajña kalpasya yoniḥ kāraṇam brahma
nahi īdṛśasya śāstrasya ṛgveda ādi kṣaṇasya sarvajña guṇa anvitasya sarvajñāt anyatas saṃbhavaḥ sti
yat yat vistara artham śāstram yasmāt puruṣa viśeṣāt saṃbhavati

original: yathā vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderjñeyaikadeśārthamapi sa tato 'pyadhikataravijñāna iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
analyzed: yathā vyākaraṇa ādi pāṇini ādeḥ jñeya eka deśa artham api sa tatas pi adhikatara vijñānaḥ iti prasiddham loke
kimu vaktavyam aneka śākhā bheda bhinnasya deva tiryak manuṣya varṇa āśrama di pravibhāga hetoḥ
ṛgveda ādi ākhyasya sarva jñāna ākarasya aprayatnena eva līlā anyayena puruṣa niḥśvāsa vat yasmāt
bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ
asya mahataḥ bhūtasya niḥśvasitam etat yat ṛgvedaḥ bṛha
ityādi śruteḥ

original: tasya mahato bhūtasya niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimattvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: tasya mahataḥ bhūtasya niratiśayam sarvajña tvam sarva śaktimat tvam ca iti

original: athavā yathokta ṛgvedādiśāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇamasya brahmaṇo yathāvatsvarūpādhigame /
analyzed: athavā yathā ukte ṛgveda ādi śāstram yoniḥ kāraṇam pramāṇam asya brahmaṇaḥ yathāvat svarūpa adhigame
śāstrāt eva praṇāṇāt jagataḥ janma ādi kāraṇam brahma adhigamyate iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: śāstramudāhṛtaṃ pūrvasūtre- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityādi /
analyzed: śāstram udāhṛtam pūrva sūtre yatas vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante ityādi
kimartham tarhi idam sūtram

original: yāvatā pūrvasūtra evaivañjātīyakaṃ śāstramudāharatā śāstrayonitvaṃ brahmaṇo darśitam /
analyzed: yāvatā pūrva sūtre eva evañjātīyakam śāstram udāharatā śāstra yoni tvam brahmaṇaḥ darśitam

original: ucyate- tatra pūrvasūtrākṣareṇa spaṣṭaṃ śāstrasyānupādānājjanmādi kevalamanumānamupanyastamityāśaṅkyeta tāmāśaṅkāṃ nirvartayitumidaṃ sūtraṃ  #
analyzed: ucyate tatra pūrva sūtra akṣareṇa spaṣṭam śāstrasya anupādānāt janma ādi kevalam anumānam upanyastam iti āśaṅkyeta tām āśaṅkām nirvartayitum idam sūtram
pravavṛte śāstra yoni tvāt iti
upabṛṃhaṇīyāḥ catvāraḥ vedāḥ tatra

original: purāṇāni sṛṣṭyādipratipādakavākyāni parakṛtipurākalparūpānarthavādāṃśca prādhānyenopabṛṃhayanti prasaṅgādadvaitabhāgaṃ karmabhāgaṃ ca /
analyzed: purāṇāni sṛṣṭi ādi pratipādaka vākyāni parakṛti purākalpa rūpān arthavādān ca prādhānyena upabṛṃhayanti prasaṅgāt advaita bhāgam karma bhāgam ca
nyāya śāstram tu pramāṇa prameya lakṣaṇā nirūpaṇena padārthān vivicya jñāpayat upabṛṃhayati
pūrva uttara mīmāṃse tu tātparya nirṇaya dvāra upayukte
dharma śāstram śrutam anusmṛtim vā vidhi bhāgam upabṛṃhayati
śikṣā sthāna karaṇa ādi nirūpaṇa dvārā svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti vidhi artham upabṛṃhayati
kalpāḥ tu prayoga nirūpaṇa artham upayuktāḥ

original: vyākaraṇaṃ tāvadasminnarthe idaṃ padaṃ sādhviti padārthānvyākaroti /
analyzed: vyākaraṇam tāvat asmin arthe idam padam sādhu iti padārthān vyākaroti

original: niruktaṃ teṣu teṣu padeṣu yaugikamarthaṃ pradarśayati /
analyzed: niruktam teṣu teṣu padeṣu yaugikam artham pradarśayati
chandaḥśāstram veda gatān gāyatrī ādi chandān lakṣaṇa mukhena viśadayati

original: jyotiṣaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ jayeddetāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajetetyādinopāttaṃ kālaviśeṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
analyzed: jyotiṣam paurṇamāsyām jayet deta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeta ityādinā upāttam kāla viśeṣam vyavasthāpayati

original: tathāca tattaddeśavyākhyānāya bahavo maharṣayaḥ purāṇādinibandhapraṇetāro yatra pravṛttāstasya mahattvaṃ vyaktameva /

original: yadvā vedasya nityatvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvahetutā nāstītyākṣepasaṃgatyā vedahetutvamucyate 'asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ  #
analyzed: yat vā vedasya nitya tvāt brahmaṇaḥ sarva hetutā nā asti iti ākṣepa saṃgatyā veda hetu tvam ucyate asya mahataḥ bhūtasya niśvasitam etat yat ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ
sāmavedaḥ tharva aṅgirasaḥ

original: iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ tatkiṃ vedahetutvena brahmaṇaḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sādhayati uta na sādhayati iti saṃdehaḥ /
analyzed: iti vākyam viṣayaḥ tat kim veda hetu tvena brahmaṇaḥ sarvajña tvam sādhayati uta na sādhayati iti saṃdehaḥ

original: tatra vyākaraṇādivadvedasya pauruṣeyatve mūlapramāṇasāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyāpātānna sādhayatīti pūrvapakṣe jagaddhetoścetanatvātsiddhiḥ phalam
analyzed: tatra vyākaraṇa ādi vat vedasya pauruṣeya tve mūlapramāṇa sāpekṣa tvena aprāmāṇya āpātāt na sādhayati iti pūrvapakṣe jagat hetoḥ cetana tvāt siddhiḥ phalam
siddhānte tad siddhiḥ

original: asya vedāntavākyasya spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgasya vedakartari samanvayokteḥ śrutiśāstrādhyāyapādasaṃgatayaḥ /
analyzed: asya vedānta vākyasya spaṣṭa brahma liṅgasya veda kartari samanvaya ukteḥ śruti śāstra adhyāya pāda saṃgatayaḥ
evam āpādam śruti ādi saṃgatayaḥ ūhyāḥ

original: yadvā yathā adhyetāraḥ pūrvakramaṃ jñātvā vedaṃ kurvanti,

original: vedarāśiṃ tadarthāṃśca yugapajjānanneva karotīti na vedasya pauruṣeyatā /

original: yatra hyarthajñānapūrvakaṃ vākyajñānaṃ vākyasṛṣṭau kāraṇaṃ tatra pauruṣeyatā,

atra ca yaugapadyāt na sā

original: ato vedakartā vedamiva tadarthamapi svasaṃbaddhaṃ nāntarīyakatayā janātīti sarvajña iti siddhāntayati-śāstreti /

original: brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ ca iti saṃgatidvayānusāreṇa sūtrayojanāmabhipretya padāni vyācaṣṭe--mahata iti /
analyzed: brahma sarvajñam sarva kāraṇam ca iti saṃgati dvaya anusāreṇa sūtra yojanām abhipretya padāni vyācaṣṭe mahataḥ iti
hetoḥ sarvajña tva siddhaye vedasya viśeṣaṇāni

hita śāsanāt śāstra tvam
śāstra śabdaḥ śabda mātra upalakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti matvā āha aneka iti

original: purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāṇi śikṣākalpavyākaraṇaniruktacchandojyotiṣāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni iti daśa vidyāsthānāni vedārthajñānahetavaḥ /
analyzed: purāṇa nyāya mīmāṃsā dharma śāstrāṇi śikṣā kalpa vyākaraṇa nirukta chandaḥ jyotiṣāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni iti daśa vidyā sthānāni veda artha jñāna hetavaḥ
taiḥ upakṛtasya iti arthaḥ

original: anena manvādibhiḥ parigṛhītatvena vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sūcitam /
analyzed: anena manu ādibhiḥ parigṛhīta tvena vedasya prāmāṇyam sūcitam
a bodhaka tva abhāvāt api prāmāṇyam iti āha pradipa vat iti
sarva artha prakāśana śaktima tve pi acetana tvāt sarvajña kalpa tvam yoniḥ upādānam kartṛ ca

original: nanu sarvajñasya yo guṇaḥ sarvārthajñānaśaktimatvaṃ vedasya tadanvitatve 'pi tadyoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ kuta ityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: nanu sarvajñasya yaḥ guṇaḥ sarva artha jñāna śaktimatvam vedasya tad anvita tve pi tad yoneḥ sarvajña tvam kutas iti atas āha na hi iti

original: upādāne tacchaktiṃ vinā kārye tadayogādvedopādānasya sarvajñatvam,
analyzed: upādāne tad śaktim vinā kārye tad ayogāt veda upādānasya sarvajña tvam

na ca avidyāyāḥ tad āpattiḥ

tatra vyāptim āha yat yat iti
vistaraḥ śabda ādhikyam
anena arthataḥ lpatvam vadan kartṛḥ jñānasya artha ādhikyam sūcayati

original: atraiṣā yojanā--yadyacchāstraṃ yasmādāptātsaṃbhavati sa tataḥ śāstrādadhikārthajñāna
analyzed: atra eṣā yojanā yat yat śāstram yasmāt āptāt saṃbhavati sa tatas śāstrāt adhika artha jñāna

original: iti prasiddhaṃ yathā śabdasādhutvādirjñeyaikadeśor'tho yasya tadapi vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderadhikārthajñātsaṃbhavati /
analyzed: iti prasiddham yathā śabda sādhu tva ādiḥ jñeya eka deśaḥ ūrthaḥ yasya tat api vyākaraṇa ādi pāṇini ādeḥ adhika artha jñāt saṃbhavati
yadi alpa artham api śāstram adhika artha jñāt saṃbhavati tadā asya mahataḥ ityādi śruteḥ yasmāt mahataḥ
paricchinnāt bhūtāt satyāt yoneḥ sakāśāt aneka śākhā ityādi viśiṣṭasya vedasya puruṣa niśvāsa vat aprayatnena eva

original: saṃbhavaḥ tasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimatvaṃ ceti kimu vaktavyamiti /
analyzed: saṃbhavaḥ tasya sarvajña tvam sarva śaktimat tvam ca iti kimu vaktavyam iti
tatra vedasya pauruṣeya tva śaṅkā nirasa artham śruti stha niḥśvasita padārtham āha aprayatnena iti
pramāṇa antareṇa artha jñāna prayāsam vinā nimeṣa ādi nyāyena iti arthaḥ

original: atrānumānena 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ 'iti śrutyuktasarvajñatvadārḍhyāya pāṇinyādivadvedakartari adikārthajñānasattāmātraṃ sādhyate na tvarthajñānasya  #
analyzed: atra anumānena yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti śruti ukta sarvajña tva dārḍhyāya pāṇini ādi vat veda kartari adika artha jñāna sattā mātram sādhyate na tu artha jñānasya
veda hetu tvam niḥśvasita śruti virodhāt
veda jñāna mātreṇa adhyetṛ vat veda kartṛ tva upapatteḥ ca

original: iyān viśeṣaḥ--adhyetā parāpekṣaḥ īśvarastu svakṛtavedānupūrvīsvayameva smṛtyā tathaiva
analyzed: iyān viśeṣaḥ adhyetā para apekṣaḥ īśvaraḥ tu sva kṛta veda ānupūrvī svayam eva smṛtyā tathā eva
kalpa ādau brahma ādipu āvirbhāvayan anāvṛta jñāna tvāt tad artham ati avarjanīya tayā jānāti iti
sarvajñaḥ iti anavadyam
adhunā brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇa anantaram pramāṇa jijñāsāyām varṇaka antaram āha
lakṣaṇa pramāṇayoḥ brahma nirṇaya artha tvāt eka phalaka tvam saṃgatiḥ

original: 'taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣam'iti śrutirbrahmaṇo vedaikavedyatvaṃ brūte na veti śaṃśaye,
analyzed: tam tu aupaniṣadam puruṣam iti śrutiḥ brahmaṇaḥ veda eka vedya tvam brūte na vā iti śaṃśaye

original: kāryaliṅgenaivalāghavāt karturekasya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ siddherna brūte iti prāpte vedapramāṇakatvāt brahmaṇo na pramāṇāntaravedyatvamiti  #
analyzed: kārya liṅgena eva lāghavāt kartuḥ ekasya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ siddheḥ na brūte iti prāpte veda pramāṇaka tvāt brahmaṇaḥ na pramāṇa antara vedya tvam iti

tat vyācaṣṭe yathā uktam iti

original: atra pūrvapakṣe anumānasyaiva vicāryatāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte vedāntānāmiti bhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra pūrvapakṣe anumānasya eva vicārya tā siddhiḥ phalam siddhānte vedāntānām iti bhedaḥ

na ca sarvajña tvāt kartuḥ eka tva saṃbhavaḥ

asya arthaḥ āmnāyasya vedasya kriyā pratipādana para tvāt atadarthānām akriyā arthānām saḥ rodī dityādi vākyānām ānarthaka tvam
