tad bhūtānām kriyā arthena samanvayaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ

original: tatteṣu vedavākyeṣu bhūtānāṃ siddārthapratipādakavākyānāṃ kriyārthena kriyāpratipādakavākyena 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyaṃ,
analyzed: tat teṣu veda vākyeṣu bhūtānām siddārtha pratipādaka vākyānām kriyā arthena kriyā pratipādaka vākyena barhiṣi rajatam na deyam
paśunā yajeta ityādinā saha anvayaḥ

original: tathāca nindyatvādyarthapūraṇenānvaye kṛte kriyāparatvasiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ siddham /
analyzed: tathā ca nindya tva ādi artha pūraṇena anvaye kṛte kriyā paratva siddhyā prāmāṇyam siddham
siddha vastu jñānāt phala bhāvāt eva iti arthaḥ
tat tu samanvayāt
tu śabdaḥ pūrva pakṣa vyāvṛtti arthaḥ

original: tadbrahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti jagadutpatti sthitilayakāraṇaṃ vedāntaśāstrādevāvagamyate /
analyzed: tat brahma sarvajñam sarva śakti jagat utpatti sthiti laya kāraṇam vedānta śāstrāt eva avagamyate
katham samanvayāt

original: sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu vākyāni tātparyeṇaitasyārthasya pratipādakatvena samanugatāni /
analyzed: sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu vākyāni tātparyeṇa etasya arthasya pratipādaka tvena samanugatāni
sat eva somya idam agre āsīt
ekam eva advitāyam
chāndaḥ ātmā vai idam ekaḥ eva agre āsīt
aita tat etat brahma apūrvam anaparam anantaram abāhyam
ayamātamā brahma sarva anubhūḥ
bṛha brahma eva idam amṛtam purastāt
muṇḍaḥ ityādīni

original: naca tadgatānāṃ padānāṃ brahmasvarūpaviṣaye niścite samanvaye 'vagamyamāner'thāntarakalpanā yuktā,
analyzed: na ca tad gatānām padānām brahma sva rūpa viṣaye niścite samanvaye yuktā
śruti hāna anya śruta kalpanā prasaṅgāt
na ca teṣām kartṛ svarūpa pratipādana para tā avasīyate
tat kena kam payet bṛha
ityādi kriyā kāraka phala nirīkaraṇa śruteḥ
na ca pariniṣṭhita vastu svarūpa tve pi pratyakṣa ādi viṣaya tvam brahmaṇaḥ
tat tvam asi chāndaḥ
iti brahma ātma bhāvasya śāstram antareṇa an avagamyamāna tvāt
yat tu heya upādeya rahita tvāt upadeśa ānarthakyam iti
na eṣa doṣaḥ
heya upādeya a śūnya brahma ātmatā avagamāt eva sarva kleśa prāhāṇāt puruṣa artha siddheḥ
devatā ādi pratipādanā asya tu sva vākya gata upāsana artha tve pi na kaścid virodhaḥ
na tu tathā brahmaṇaḥ upāsanā vidhi śeṣi tvam saṃbhavati
ekatve heya upādeya a śūnyatayā kriyā kāraka ādi dvaita vijñāna upamarda īpapatteḥ
nahi eka tva vijñānena unmathitasya dvaita vijñānasya punar saṃbhavaḥ sti
yena upāsanā vidhi śeṣi tvam brahmaṇaḥ pratipadyeta

original: yadyapyanyatra vedavākyānāṃ vīdhisaṃsparśamantareṇa pramāṇatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ,
analyzed: yadi api anyatra veda vākyānām vīdhi saṃsparśam antareṇa pramāṇa tvam na dṛṣṭam

original: tathāpyātmavijñānasya phalaparyantatvānna tadviṣayasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum /
analyzed: tathā api ātma vijñānasya phala paryanta tvāt na tad viṣayasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyam śakyam pratyākhyātum
na ca anumāna gamyam śāstra prāmāṇyam
yena anyatra dṛṣṭam nidarśanam apekṣeta
tasmāt siddham brahmaṇaḥ śāstra pramāṇaka tvam

original: atrāpare pratyavatiphaṣṭhante- yadyapi śāstrapramāṇakaṃ brahma tathāpi pratipattividhiviṣayataiva śāstreṇa brahma samarpyate /
analyzed: atra apare yadi api śāstra pramāṇakam brahma tathā api pratipatti vidhi viṣaya tā eva śāstreṇa brahma samarpyate

original: yathā yūpāhavahanīyādīnyalaukikānyapi vidhiśaṣatayā śāstreṇa samarpyante tadvat /
analyzed: yathā yūpāha vahanīya ādīni alaukikāni api vidhi śaṣa tayā śāstreṇa samarpyante tadvat
kutas etat
pravṛtti nivṛtti prayojana tvāt śāstrasya

original: tathāhi śāstratātparyavida āhuḥ- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' iti /
analyzed: tathā hi śāstra tātparya vidaḥ āhuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hi tasya arthaḥ karma avabodhanam iti
codanā iti kriyāyāḥ pravartakam vacanam
tasya jñānam upadeśaḥ jaisū
tad bhūtānām kriyā arthena samāmnāyaḥ jaisū
āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam a tad arthānām
iti ca
atas puruṣam dvacid viṣaya viśeṣe pravartayat kutaścid viṣaya viśeṣāt nivartayat ca arthavat śāstram
tad śeṣa tayā ca anyat upayuktam
tad sāmānyāt vedāntānām api tathā eva arthavat tvam syāt

original: sati ca vidhiparatve yathā svargādikāmasyāgnihotrādisādhanaṃ vidhīyata evamamṛtatvakāmasya brahmajñānaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: sati ca vidhi paratve yathā svarga ādi kāmasya agnihotra ādi sādhanam vidhīyate evam amṛta tva kāmasya brahma jñānam vidhīyate iti yuktam

original: nanviha jijñāsyavailakṣaṇyamuktam- karmakāṇḍe bhavyo dharmo jijñāsya iha tu bhūtaṃ nityanivṛttaṃ brahma jijñāsyamiti /
analyzed: nanu iha jijñāsya vailakṣaṇyam uktam karmakāṇḍe bhavyaḥ dharmaḥ jijñāsyaḥ iha tu bhūtam nitya nivṛttam brahma jijñāsyam iti
tatra dharma jñāna phalāt anuṣṭhāna apekṣāt vilakṣaṇam brahma jñāna phalam bhavitum arhati
na arhati evam bhavitum
kārya vidhi prayukta tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyamāna tvāt
ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ bṛha iti
yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā asaḥ nu evyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ chāndaḥ
ātmā itya u upāsīta
ātmānam eva lokam upāsata bṛha
brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati muṇḍa

original: ityādividhāneṣu satsu ko 'sāvātmā kiṃ tadbrahma ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpasamarpaṇena
analyzed: ityādi vidhāneṣu satsu kaḥ sau ātmā kim tat brahma iti ākāṅkṣāyām tad svarūpa samarpaṇena

original: sarve vedāntā upayuktāḥ- 'nityaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvagato nityatṛpto nityāśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvo
analyzed: sarve vedāntāḥ upayuktāḥ nityaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva gataḥ nitya tṛptaḥ nitya aśuddha buddha mukta svabhāvaḥ
vijñānam ānandam brahma iti evamādayaḥ
tad upāsanāt ca mokṣaḥ phalam bhaviṣyati iti
kartavya vidhi an anupraveśe vastu mātra kathane hāna upādāna saṃbhavāt
sapta dvīpā vasumatī
rājā asau gacchati ityādi vākya vat vedānta vākyānām ānarthakyam eva syāt

original: nanu vastumātrakathane 'pi rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa ityādau bhrāntijanitabhītinivartanenārthavattvaṃ
analyzed: nanu vastu mātra kathane rajuḥ iyam na ayam sarpaḥ ityādau bhrānti janita bhīti nivartanena arthavat tvam
dṛṣṭam tathā iha api asaṃsāri ātma vastu kathanena saṃsāri tva bhrānti nivartanena arthavat tvam syāt
syāt etat evam
yadi raju sva rūpa śravaṇe iva sarpa bhrāntiḥ
saṃsāri tva bhrāntiḥ brahma svarūpa śravaṇa mātreṇa nivarteta
na tu nivartate
śruta brahmaṇaḥ pi yathāpūrvam sukha duḥkha ādi saṃsāri dharma darśanāt
śrotavyaḥ mantavyaḥ nididhyāsitavyaḥ bṛha
iti ca śravaṇa uttara kālayoḥ manana nididhyāsanayoḥ vidhiḥ darśanāt
tasmāt pratipatti vidhi viṣaya tayā eva śāstra pramāṇakam brahma abhyupagantavyam iti
atra abhidhīyate na
karma brahma vidyā phalayoḥ vailakṣaṇyāt

original: śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca karma śrutismṛtisiddhaṃ dharmākhyaṃ,
analyzed: śārīram vācikam mānasam ca karma śruti smṛti siddham dharma ākhyam
yad viṣayā jijñāsā atha atas dharma jijñāsā jaisū
iti sūtritā
adharmaḥ pi hiṃsā ādiḥ pratiṣedha codanā lakṣaṇa tvāt jijñāsyaḥ parihārāya

original: tayoścodanālakṣaṇayorarthānarthayordharmādharmayoḥ phale pratyakṣe sukhaduḥkhe śarīravāṅmanobhirevopabhujyamāne viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanye brahmādiṣu  #
analyzed: tayoḥ codanā lakṣaṇayoḥ artha anarthayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ phale pratyakṣe sukha duḥkhe śarīra vāc manobhiḥ eva upabhujyamāne viṣaya indriya saṃyoga janye brahma ādiṣu
sthāvara anteṣu prasiddhe
manuṣya tvāt ārabhya brahma anteṣu dehavatsu sukha tāratamyam anuśrūyate
tatas ca tad hetoḥ dharmasya tāratamyam gamyate
dharma tāratamyāt adhikāri tāratamyam
prasiddham ca arthi tva sārmathya ādi kṛtam adhikāri tāratamyam
tathā ca yāga ādi anuṣṭhāyinām eva vidyā samādhi viśeṣāt uttareṇa pathā gamanam
kevalaiḥ iṣṭāpūrta datta sādhanaiḥ dhūma ādi krameṇa dakṣiṇena pathā gamanam
tatra api sukha tāratamyam tad sādhana tāratamyam ca śāstrāt yāvat saṃpātam uṣitvā chāndaḥ
iti asmāt gamyate

original: tathā manuṣyādiṣu nārakasthāvarānteṣu sukhalavaścodanālakṣaṇadharmasādhya eveti gamyate tāratamyena vartamānaḥ /
analyzed: tathā manuṣya ādiṣu nāraka sthāvara anteṣu sukha lavaḥ codanā lakṣaṇa dharma sādhyaḥ eva iti gamyate tāratamyena vartamānaḥ

original: tathordhvagateṣvadhogateṣu ca dehavatsu duḥkhatāratamyardānāttaddhetoradharmasya pratiṣedhacodanākṣaṇasya tadanuṣṭhāyināṃ ca tāratamye gamyate
analyzed: tathā ūrdhva gateṣu adhas gateṣu ca dehavatsu duḥkha tāratamya ṛdānāt tad hetoḥ adharmasya pratiṣedha codanā kṣaṇasya tad anuṣṭhāyinām ca tāratamye gamyate

original: evamavidyādidoṣavatāṃ dharmādharmatāratamyanimittaṃ śarīropādānapūrvakaṃ sukhaduḥkhatāratamyanimittaṃ saṃsārarūpaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddham
analyzed: evam avidyā ādi doṣavatām dharma adharma tāratamya nimittam śarīra upādāna pūrvakam sukha duḥkha tāratamya nimittam saṃsāra rūpam śruti smṛti nyāya prasiddham

original: tathāca smṛtiḥ- 'na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirasti' iti yathāvarṇitaṃ saṃsārarūpamanuvadati /
analyzed: tathā ca smṛtiḥ na ha vai sa śarīrasya sataḥ priya apriyayoḥ apahatiḥ asti iti yathā varṇitam saṃsāra rūpam anuvadati

original: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1)
analyzed: aśarīram vāva santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ chāndaḥ
iti priya apriya sparśana pratiṣedhāt codanā lakṣaṇa dharma kārya tvam mokṣa ākhyasya aśarīra tvasya pratiṣidhyate iti gamyate
dharma kārya tve hi priya apriya sparśana pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate
aśarīra tvam eva dharma kāryam iti ced na
tasya svābhāvika tvāt
aśarīram

original: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati' (kāṭha. 1.2.21)
analyzed: mahāntam vibhum ātmānam matvā dhīraḥ na śocati
a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ śubhraḥ muṇḍa
a saṅgaḥ hi ayam puruṣaḥ bṛha
ityādi śrutibhyaḥ
atas eva anuṣṭheya karma phala vilakṣaṇam mokṣa ākhyam aśarīra tvam nityam iti siddham

original: tatra kiñcitpariṇāmi nityaṃ yasminvikriyamāṇe 'pi tadevedamiti buddhirna vihanyate /
analyzed: tatra kiñcid pariṇāmi nityam yasmin vikriyamāṇe tat eva idam iti buddhiḥ na vihanyate
yathā pṛthivī ādi jagat nitya tva vādinām
yathā ca sāṃkhyānām guṇāḥ
idam tu pāramārthikam
vyoma vat sarva vyāpi
sarva vikriyā rahitam
nitya tṛptam
niravayavam
svayam jyotiḥ svabhāvam

original: yatra dharmādharmī saha kāryeṇa kālatrayaṃ ca nopāvartete /
analyzed: yatra dharma adharmī saha kāryeṇa kāla trayam ca na upāvartete
tat idārīra tvam mokṣa ākhyam
anyatra dharmāt anyatra adharmāt anyatra asmāt kṛta akṛtāt
anyatra bhūtāt ca bhavyāt ca ka
ityādi śrutibhyaḥ
atas tat brahma yasya iyam jijñāsā prastutā
tat yadi kartavyā ūṣa tvena upadiyeta
tena ca kartavyena sādhyaḥ ced mokṣaḥ bhyupagamyeta
anityaḥ eva syāt

original: tatraivaṃ sati yathoktakarmaphaleṣveva tāratamyāvasthiteṣvanityeṣu kaścidatiśayo mokṣa iti prasajyeta,
analyzed: tatra evam sati yathā ukta karma phaleṣu eva tāratamya avasthiteṣu anityeṣu kaścid atiśayaḥ mokṣaḥ iti prasajyeta
nityaḥ ca mokṣaḥ sarvaiḥ mokṣa vādibhiḥ abhyupagamyate
atas na kartavya śeṣa tvena brahma upadeśaḥ yuktaḥ
apica brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati muṇḍa
kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare muṇḍa
ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān
na bibheti kutaścayana taitti
abhayam vai janaka prāptaḥ u si bṛha
tat ātmānam eva aveda iham brahma asmi iti tasmāt tat sarvam abhavat
vājasaneya brāhmaṇa upa
tatra kaḥ mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ eka tvam anupayataḥ

original: ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo brahmavidyānantaraṃ mokṣaṃ darśayantyo madhye kāryāntaraṃ vārayanti /
analyzed: iti evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ brahma vidyā anantaram mokṣam darśayantyaḥ madhye kārya antaram vārayanti
tathā tat vā etat paśayan ṛṣiḥ vāmadevaḥ pratipede ham manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca
iti brahma darśana sarvātmabhāvayoḥ madhye kartavya antara vāraṇāya udāhāryam

original: yathā tiṣṭhangāyatīti tiṣṭhatigāyatyayormadhye tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ nāstīti gamyate /
analyzed: yathā tiṣṭhan gāyati iti tiṣṭhati gāyatyayoḥ madhye tad kartṛkam kārya antaram na asti iti gamyate

original: 'tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākamavidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasi' (pra. 6.8)
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pitā yaḥ smākam avidyāyāḥ param pāram tārayasi pra

original: 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi tvaṃ mā bhagavacchokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāndo. 7.1.3)
analyzed: śrutam hi eva me bhagavat dṛśebhyaḥ tarati śokam ātma vid iti saḥ ham bhagavaḥ śocāmi tvam mā bhagavat śokasya pāram tārayatu chāndaḥ
tasmai mṛdita kaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāram darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ chāndaḥ
iti ca evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ mokṣa pratibandha nivṛtti mātram eva ātma jñānasya phalam darśayanti
tathā ācārya praṇītam nyāya upabṛṃhitam sūtram duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyājñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ
iti
mithyājñāna apāyaḥ ca brahma ātma eka tva vijñānāt bhavati
na ca idam brahma ātma eka tva vijñānam saṃpad rūpam

original: yathā 'anantaṃ vai mano 'nantā viśvedevā anantameva sa tena lokaṃ jayati' (bṛha. 3.1.9) iti /
analyzed: yathā anantam vai manaḥ nantāḥ viśvedevāḥ anantam eva sa tena lokam jayati bṛhaḥ iti
na ca adhyāsa rūpam
yathā manaḥ brahma iti upāsīta chāndaḥ
ādityaḥ brahma iti ādeḥśas chāndaḥ
iti ca manaḥ āditya ādiṣu brahma dṛṣṭa adhyāsaḥ

original: nāpi viśiṣṭakriyāyoganimittaṃ 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' 'prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chāndo. 4.3.1) itivat /
analyzed: na api viśiṣṭa kriyā yoga nimittam vāyuḥ vāva saṃvargaḥ prāṇaḥ vāva saṃvargaḥ chāndo itivat
nāṣu ājya avekṣaṇa ādi karma vat karma aṅga saṃskāra rūpam
saṃpad ādi rūpe hi brahma ātma eka tva vijñāne bhyupagamyamāne tat tvam asi chāndaḥ
aham brahmā asmi bṛha
ayam ātmā brahma bṛha
iti evamādīnām vākyānām brahma ātma eka tva vastu pratipādana paraḥ pada samanvayaḥ pīḍyeta
bhidyate sarva saṃśayāḥ
iti ca evamādīni avidyā nivṛtti phala śravaṇāni uparudhyeran
brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati muṇḍa

original: iti caivamādīni tadbhāvāpattivacanāni saṃpadādipakṣe na sāmañjasyenopapadyeran /
analyzed: iti ca evamādīni tad bhāva āpatti vacanāni saṃpad ādi pakṣe na sāmañjasyena upapadyeran
tasmāt na saṃpad ādi rūpam brahma ātma eka tva vijñānam
atas na puruṣa vyāpāra tantrā brahma vidyā
kim tarhi pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa viṣaya vastu jñānavat vastu tantrā

original: evaṃbhūtasya brahmaṇastaj jñānasya ca na kayācidyuktyā śakyaḥ kāryānupraveśaḥ kalpayitum /
analyzed: evaṃbhūtasya brahmaṇaḥ tat jñānasya ca na kayācid yuktyā śakyaḥ kārya anupraveśaḥ kalpayitum
na ca vidi kriyā karma tvena kārya anupraveśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ
anyat eva tat viditāt atha u a viditāt adhi kena
iti vidi kriyā karma tva pratiṣedhāt

original: 'yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 2.4.13) iti ca /
analyzed: yena idam sarvam vijānāti tam kena vijānīyāt bṛhaḥ iti ca

original: tathopāstikriyākarmatvapratiṣedho 'pi bhavati- yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ityaviṣayatvaṃ brahmaṇa upanyasya,
analyzed: tathā upāsti kriyā karma tva pratiṣedhaḥ u pi bhavati yat vācā anabhyuditam yena vāc abhyudyate iti aviṣaya tvam brahmaṇaḥ upanyasya

original: 'tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate' (kena. 1.4) iti /
analyzed: tat eva brahma tvam viddhi na idam yat idam upāsate kena iti
aviṣaya tve brahmaṇaḥ śāstra yoni tva anupapattiḥ iti ced na
avidyā kalpita bheda nivṛtti para tvāt śāstrasya
nahi śāstram idantayā viṣaya bhūtam brahma pratipipādayiṣati
kim tarhi pratyagātma tvena aviṣaya tayā pratipādaya vidyā kalpitam vedya veditṛ vedana ādi bhedam apanayati
tathā ca śāstram yasya amatam tasya matam
matam yasya na veda saḥ
a vijñātam vijānatām vijñātam a vijānatām kena
na dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram paśyeḥ
na vijñāteḥ vijñātāram vijānīyāḥ bṛha
iti ca evamādi
atas vidyā kalpita saṃsāri tva nivartanena nitya mukta ātma svarūpa samarpaṇāt na mokṣasya anitya tva doṣaḥ
yasya tu utpādyaḥ mokṣaḥ tasya mānasam
vācikam
kāyikam vā kāryam apekṣate iti yuktam

original: tathā vikāryatve ca tayoḥ pakṣayormokṣasya dhruvamanityatvam /
analyzed: tathā vikārya tve ca tayoḥ pakṣayoḥ mokṣasya dhruvam anitya tvam
nahi dadhi ādi vikāryam
utpādyam vā dhaṭa ādi
nityam dṛṣṭam loke
na ca api a tvena api kārya apekṣā
sva ātma svarūpa tve sati an āpya tvāt
svarūpa vyatirikta tve pi brahmaṇaḥ na āpya tvam
sarvagata tvena nitya āpta svarūpa tvāt sarveṇa brahmaṇaḥ
ākāśasya iva
na api saṃskāryaḥ mokṣaḥ
yena vyāpāram apekṣeta

original: saṃskāro hi nāma saṃskāryasya guṇādhānena vā syāddoṣāpanayanena vā /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ hi nāma saṃskāryasya guṇa ādhānena vā syāt doṣa apanayanena vā
na tāvat guṇa ādhānena saṃbhavati
anādheya atiśaya brahma svarūpa tvāt mokṣasya
na api doṣa apanayanena
nitya aśuddha brahma svarūpa tvāt mokṣasya

original: svātmadharma eva saṃsthirobhīto mokṣaḥ kriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate,
analyzed: sva ātma dharmaḥ eva saṃsthiraḥ abhītaḥ mokṣaḥ kriyayā ātmani saṃskriyamāṇe bhivyajyate

original: yathā'darśe nigharṣaṇakriyayā saṃskrayamāṇe bhāsvaratvaṃ dharma iticet / na /
analyzed: yathā ādarśe nigharṣaṇa kriyayā saṃskrayamāṇe bhāsvara tvam dharmaḥ iti ced na
kriyā āśraya tva anupapatteḥ ātmanaḥ
yad āśrayā kriyā tam a vikurvatī na eva ātmānam labhate
yadi ātmā kriyayā vikriyeta anitya tvam ātmanaḥ prasajyeta
avikāryaḥ yam ucyate iti ca evamādīni vākyāni bādhyeran
tat ca aniṣṭam
tasmāt na sva āśrayā kriyā ātmānaḥ saṃbhavati
anya āśrayāyāḥ tu kriyāyāḥ aviṣaya tvāt na tayā ātmā saṃskriyate

original: nanu dehāśrayayā snānācamanayajñopavītādikayā kriyayā dehī saṃskriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ / na /
analyzed: nanu deha āśrayayā snāna ācamana yajñopavīta ādikayā kriyayā dehī saṃskriyamāṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na
deha ādi saṃhatasya eva avidyā gṛhītasya ātmānaḥ saṃskriyamāṇa tvāt
pratyakṣam hi snāna ācamana ādeḥ deha samavāyi tvam

original: tayā dehāśrayayā tatsaṃhata eva kaścidavidyayātmatvena parigṛhītaḥ saṃskriyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: tayā deha āśrayayā tad saṃhataḥ eva kaścid avidyayā ātma tvena parigṛhītaḥ saṃskriyate iti yuktam

original: yathā dehāśrayacikitsānimittena dhātusāmyena tatsaṃhatasya tadabhimānina ārogyaphalaṃ,
analyzed: yathā deha āśraya cikitsā nimittena dhātu sāmyena tad saṃhatasya tad abhimāninaḥ ārogya phalam
aham arogaḥ iti yatra buddhiḥ utpadyate

original: evaṃ snānācamanayajñopavītādinā ahaṃ śuddhaḥ saṃskṛta iti yatra buddhirutpadyate sa saṃskriyate /
analyzed: evam snāna ācamana yajñopavīta ādinā aham śuddhaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ iti yatra buddhiḥ utpadyate sa saṃskriyate
sa ca dehena saṃhataḥ eva

original: tenaiva hyahaṅkartrāhaṃpratyayaviṣayeṇa pratyayinā sarvāḥ kriyā nirvartyante /
analyzed: tena eva hi ahaṅkartrā ahaṃpratyaya viṣayeṇa pratyayinā sarvāḥ kriyāḥ nirvartyante
tad phalam ca saḥ eva aśnāti
tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādvatti an aśnan anyaḥ abhicākāśīti muṇḍa
iti mantra varṇāt
ātma indriya manaḥ yuktam bhoktā iti āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ kāṭhaḥ iti ca
tathā ca ekaḥ devaḥ sarva bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarva vyāpī sarva bhūta antarātmā

original: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca' (śvetā. 6.11) iti /
analyzed: karma adhyakṣaḥ sarva bhūta adhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca śvetāḥ iti
sa paryagāt śukram akāya mantraṇam astra āvis aṃśuddham apāpa viddham
ī iti ca

original: etau mantrāvanādheyātiśayatāṃ nityaśuddhatāṃ ca brahmaṇo darśayataḥ /
analyzed: etau mantrau anādheya atiśaya tām nitya śuddha tām ca brahmaṇaḥ darśayataḥ
brahma bhāvaḥ ca mokṣaḥ
tasmāt na saṃskāryaḥ mokṣaḥ

original: ato 'nyanmokṣaṃ prati kriyānupraveśadvāraṃ na śakyaṃ kenaciddarśayitum /
analyzed: atas prati kriyā anupraveśa dvāram na śakyam kenacid darśayitum

original: tasmāt jñānamekaṃ muktvā kriyāyā gandhamātrasyāpyanupraveśa iha nopapadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt jñānam ekam muktvā kriyāyāḥ gandha mātrasya api anupraveśaḥ iha na upapadyate

original: nanu jñānaṃ nāma mānasī kriyā / na /
analyzed: nanu jñānam nāma mānasī kriyā
vailakṣaṇyāt

original: kriyā hi nāma sā yatra vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate,
analyzed: kriyā hi nāma sā yatra vastu svarūpa nirapekṣā eva codyate
puruṣa citta vyāpāra adhīnā ca

original: yathā yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ manasā dhyāyedvṣaṭkariṣyan iti /
analyzed: yathā yasyai devatāyai haviḥ gṛhītam syāt tām manasā dhyāyet vṣaṭkariṣyan iti
saṃdhyām manasā dyāyet aibrā
iti ca evamādiṣu

original: dhyānaṃ cintanaṃ yadyapi mānasaṃ tathāpi puruṣeṇa kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ,
analyzed: dhyānam cintanam yadi api mānasam tathā api puruṣeṇa kartum a kartum anyathā vā kartum śakyam
puruṣa tantra tvāt
jñānam tu pramāṇa janyam

original: pramāṇaṃ ca yathābhūtavastuviṣayamato jñānaṃ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartumaśakyaṃ,
analyzed: pramāṇam ca yathā bhūta vastu viṣayam atas jñānam kartum akartum anyathā vā kartum aśakyam
kevalam vastu tantram eva tat
na codanā tantram
na api puruṣa tantram
tasmāt mānasa tve pi jñānasya mahat vailakṣaṇyam
yathā ca puruṣaḥ vāva gautama agniḥ
yoṣā vāva gautama agniḥ chāndaḥ
iti atra yoṣit puruṣayoḥ agni buddhiḥ mānasī bhavati
keva codanā janya tvāt kriyā eva sā puruṣa tantrā ca
yā tu prasiddhe gnau agni buddhiḥ na sā codanā tantrā
na api puruṣa tantrā
kim tarhi pratyakṣa vastu tantrā eva iti jñānam eva etat na kriyā
evam sarva pramāṇa viṣaya vastuṣu veditavyam

original: tatraivaṃ sati yathābhūtabrahmātmaviṣayamapi jñānaṃ na codanātantram /
analyzed: tatra evam sati yathā bhūta brahma ātma viṣayam api jñānam na codanā tantram
tad viṣaye liṅ āga ādayaḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ api aniyojya viṣaya tvāt kuṇṭhībhavanti upala ādiṣu prayukta kṣura taikṣṇya ādi vat
aheya anupādeya vastu viṣaya tvāt

original: kimarthāni tarhi 'ātmā vāre draṣyavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ' ityādīni vidhicchāyāni vacanāni /
analyzed: kimarthāni tarhi ātmā vāre draṣyavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ ityādīni vidhi chāyāni vacanāni

original: yo hi bahirmukhaḥ pravartate puruṣaḥ iṣṭaṃ me bhūyādadaniṣṭaṃ mābhūditi,
analyzed: yaḥ hi bahirmukhaḥ pravartate puruṣaḥ iṣṭam me bhūyāt adaniṣṭam mā abhūt iti

original: tamātyantikapuruṣārthavāñchinaṃ svābhāvikakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapravṛttigocarādvimukhīkṛtya pratyagātmasrotastayā pravartayanti 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'

ityādīni
tasya ātma anveṣaṇāya pravṛttasya aheyam anupādeyam ca ātma tattvam upadiśyate
idam sarvam yat ayam ātmā bṛha

original: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt vījñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 4.5.15)
analyzed: yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt tat kena kam paśyet kena kam vijānīyāt vījñātāram are kena vijānīyāt
ayam ātmā brahma bṛha
ityādibhiḥ
yat api akartavya pradhānam ātma jñānam hānāya upādānāya vā na bhavati iti
tat tathā eva iti abhyupagamyate

original: alaṅkāro hyayamasmākaṃ yadbrahmātmāvagatau satyāṃ sarvakartavyatāhāniḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ceti /
analyzed: alaṅkāraḥ hi ayam asmākam yat brahma ātma avagatau satyām sarva kartavya tā hāniḥ kṛtakṛtya tā ca iti
tathā ca śrutiḥ ātmānam ced vijānīyāt ayam asti iti pūruṣaḥ
kim icchan kasya kāmāya śarīram anusaṃjvaret
bṛhaḥ iti
etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata
bhagī iti smṛtiḥ
tasmāt na pratipatti vidhi viṣaya tayā brahmaṇaḥ samarpaṇam

original: yadapi kecidāhuḥ- 'pravṛttinivṛttividhitaccheṣavyatirekeṇa kevalavastuvādī vedabhāgo nāsti' iti tanna,
analyzed: yat api kecid āhuḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti vidhi tad śeṣa vyatirekeṇa kevala vastu vādī veda bhāgaḥ na asti iti tat na
aupaniṣadasya puruṣasya puruṣasya an anya śeṣa tvāt
saṃsārī brahma utpādi ādi caturvidha dravya vilakṣaṇaḥ sva prakaraṇa sthaḥ

original: nāsau nāsti nādhigamyata iti vā śakyaṃ vaditum,
analyzed: na asau na asti na adhigamyate iti vā śakyam vaditum
saḥ eṣa na iti na iti ātmā bṛha
iti āma śabdāt
ātmanaḥ ca pratyākhyātum aśakya tvāt
yaḥ eva nirākartā tasya eva ātma tvāt
nanu ātmā ahaṃpratyaya viṣaya tvāt upaniṣatsu eva vijñāyate iti anupapannam na
tad sākṣi tvena pratyukta tvāt

original: nahyahaṃpratyayaviṣayakartṛvyatirekeṇa tatsākṣī sarvabhūtasthaḥ sama ekaḥ kūṭasthanityaḥ puruṣo vidhikāṇḍe tarkasamaye vā kenacidadhigataḥ
analyzed: na hi aham pratyaya viṣaya kartṛ vyatirekeṇa tad sākṣī sarva bhūta sthaḥ samaḥ ekaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ puruṣaḥ vidhi kāṇḍe tarka samaye vā kenacid adhigataḥ

original: ataḥ sa na kenacitpratyākhyātuṃ śakyo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ vā netum /
analyzed: atas sa na kenacid pratyākhyātum śakyaḥ vidhi śeṣa tvam vā netum

original: asmatvādeva ca sarveṣāṃ na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
analyzed: asmatvāt eva ca sarveṣām na heyaḥ na api upādeyaḥ
sarvam hi vinaśyat vikāra jātam puruṣa antam vinaśyati
puruṣaḥ vināśa hetu ābhāvāt avināśī
vikriyā hetu abhāvāt ca
kūṭastha nityaḥ
atas eva nitya aśuddha buddha mukta svabhāvaḥ

original: tasmāt 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.11)
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣāt na param kiñcid sā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ
tam tvā aupaniṣadam puruṣam pṛcchāmi bṛha

original: iti caupaniṣadatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyopaniṣatsu prādhānyena prakāśyamānatva upapadyate /
analyzed: iti ca aupaniṣada tva viśeṣaṇam puruṣasya upaniṣatsu prādhānyena prakāśyamāna tve upapadyate

original: ato bhūtavastuparo vedabhāgo nāstīti vacanaṃ sāhasamātram /
analyzed: atas bhūta vastu paraḥ veda bhāgaḥ na asti iti vacanam sāhasa mātram

original: yadapi śāstratātparyavidāmanukramaṇam- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' ityevamādi,
analyzed: yat api śāstra tātparya vidām anukramaṇam dṛṣṭaḥ hi tasya arthaḥ karma avabodhanam iti evamādi
tad dharma jijñāsā viṣaya tvāt vidhi pratiṣedha a śāstra abhiprāyam draṣṭavyam
apica āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam atarthānām iti etat ekāntena abhyupagacchatām bhūta upadeśa ānārthakya prasaṅgaḥ
pravṛtti nivṛtti vidhi tad śeṣa vyatirekeṇa bhūtam ced vastu upadiśati bhavya artha tvena
kūṭastha nityam bhūtam na upadiśati iti kaḥ hetuḥ
nahi bhūtam upadiśyamānam kriyā bhavati

original: akriyātve 'pi bhūtasya kriyāsādhanatvātkriyārthaṃ eva bhūtopadeśa iti cet /
analyzed: akriyā tve pi bhūtasya kriyā sādhana tvāt kriyā artham eva bhūta upadeśaḥ iti ced
na eṣa doṣaḥ
kriyā artha tve pi kriyā ativartana śaktimat vastu upadiṣṭam eva
kriyā artha tvam tu prayojanam tasya
na ca etāvatā vastu anupadiṣṭam bhavati

original: yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃ tava tena syāditi /
analyzed: yadi nāma upadiṣṭam kim tava tena syāt iti
ucyate anavagata ātma vastu upadeśaḥ ca tathā eva bhavitum arhati

original: tadavagatyā mithyājñānasya saṃsārahetornivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ kriyata ityavāśiṣṭamarthavattvaṃ kriyāsādhanavastūpadeśena /
analyzed: tad avagatyā mithyājñānasya saṃsāra hetoḥ nivṛttiḥ prayojanam kriyate iti ava śiṣṭam arthavattvam kriyā sādhana vastu upadeśena

original: apica 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' iti caivamādyā nivṛttirupadiśyate /
analyzed: apica brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti ca evamādyā nivṛttiḥ upadiśyate
na ca sā kriyā
na api kriyā sādhanam
akriyā arthānām upadeśaḥ narthakaḥ ced brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ ityādi nivṛtti upadeśānām ānarthakyam prāptam
tat ca aniṣṭam
na ca sva abhāva prāpta hanti artha anurāgeṇa nañaḥ śakyam aprāpta kriyā artha tvam kalpayitum
hanana kriyā nivṛtti audāsīnya vyatirekeṇa
nañaḥ ca eṣa svabhāvaḥ yat sva saṃbandhinaḥ bhāvam bodhayati iti
abhāva buddhiḥ ca audāsīnya kāraṇam
sā ca dagdha indhana agni vat svayam eva upāśāmyati

original: tasmātprasaktakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyameva 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' ityādiṣu pratiṣedhārthaṃ manyāmahe,
analyzed: tasmāt prasakta kriyā nivṛtti audāsīnyam eva brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ ityādiṣu pratiṣedha artham manyāmahe
anyatra prajāpati trāta ādibhyaḥ
tasmāt puruṣa artha anupayogi upākhyāna ādi bhūta arthavāda viṣayam ānarthakya abhidhānam draṣṭavyam

original: yadapyuktaṃ- kartavyavidhyanupraveśamantareṇa vastumātramucyamānamānarthakaṃ syāt 'saptadvīpā vasumatī' tyādivaditi,
analyzed: yat api uktam kartavya vidhi anupraveśam antareṇa vastu mātram ucyamānam ānarthakam syāt saptadvīpā vasumatī tyādi vat iti
tat parihṛtam

original: rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa iti vastumātrakathane 'pi prayojanasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: rajuḥ iyam na ayam sarpaḥ iti vastu mātra kathane pi prayojanasya dṛṣṭa tvāt
nanu yathāpūrvam saṃsāri tvar dānāt na raju sva rūpa kathana vat arthavat tvam iti uktam

original: atrocyate- nāvagatabrahmātmabhāvasya yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ va vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmabhāvavirodhāt /
analyzed: atrā ucyate na avagata brahma ātma bhāvasya yathāpūrvam saṃsāri tvam śakyam darśayitum veda pramāṇa janita brahma ātma bhāva virodhāt

original: nahi śarīrādyātmābhimānino duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmāvagame
analyzed: nahi śarīra ādi ātma abhimāninaḥ duḥkha bhaya ādimat tvam dṛṣṭam iti tasya eva veda pramāṇa janita brahma ātma avagame

original: tadabhimānanivṛttau tadeva mithyājñānanimittaṃ duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ bhavatīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
analyzed: tad abhimāna nivṛttau tat eva mithyājñāna nimittam duḥkha bhaya ādimattvam bhavati iti śakyam kalpayitum

original: nahi dhanino gṛhasthasya dhanābhimānino dhanāpahāranimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva pravrajitasya dhanābhimānarahitasya tadeva dhanāpahranimittaṃ  #
analyzed: nahi dhaninaḥ gṛhasthasya dhana abhimāninaḥ dhana apahāra nimittam duḥkham dṛṣṭam iti tasya eva pravrajitasya dhana abhimāna rahitasya tat eva dhana apahra nimittam
duḥkham bhavati

original: naca kuṇḍalinaḥ kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva kuṇḍalaviyuktasya kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca kuṇḍalinaḥ kuṇḍali tva abhimāna nimittam sukham dṛṣṭam iti tasya eva kuṇḍala viyuktasya kuṇḍali tva abhimāna nimittam sukham bhavati

original: taduktaṃ śrutyā- 'ārīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1) iti /
analyzed: tat uktam śrutyā ārīram vāva santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ chāndaḥ iti
śarīre patite śarīra tvam syāt
na jīvate iti ced na
sa śarīra tvasya mithyā jñāna nimitta tvāt

original: na hyātmanaḥ śarīrātmābhimānalakṣaṇaṃ mithyājñānaṃ muktvānyataḥ saśarīratvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
analyzed: na hi ātmanaḥ śarīra ātma abhimāna lakṣaṇam mithyājñānam muktvā anyatas sa śarīra tvam śakyam kalpayitum
nityam aśarīra tvam akarma nimitta tvāt iti avocāma
tad kṛta dharma adharma nimittam sa śarīra tvam iti ced na
śarīra saṃbandhasya asiddha tvāt dharma adharmayoḥ ātma kṛta tva asiddheḥ
śarīra saṃbandhasya dharma adharmayoḥ tad kṛta tvasya ca itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt andha paramparā eṣā anādi tva kalpanā
kriyā samavāya abhāvāt ca āmtanaḥ kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ
saṃnidhāna mātreṇa rāja prabhṛtīnām dṛṣṭam kartavyam iti ced na
dhana dāna ādi upārjita bhṛtya saṃbandha tvāt teṣām kartṛ tva upapatteḥ

original: na tvātmano dhanadānādivaccharīrādibhiḥ svasvāmisaṃbandhanimittaṃ kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayitum /
analyzed: na tu ātmanaḥ dhana dāna ādi vat śarīra ādibhiḥ sva svāmi saṃbandha nimittam kiñcid śakyam kalpayitum
mithyā abhimānaḥ tu pratyakṣaḥ saṃbandha hetuḥ
etena yajamāna tvam ātmanaḥ vyākhyātam

original: atrāhuḥ- dehādivyatiriktasyātmana ātmīye dehādāvabhimāno gauṇo na mithyeti cenna,
analyzed: atra āhuḥ deha ādi vyatiriktasya ātmanaḥ ātmīye deha ādau abhimānaḥ gauṇaḥ na mithyā iti ced na
prasiddha vastu bhedasya gauṇa tva mukhya tva prasiddheḥ
yasya hi prasiddhaḥ vastu bhedaḥ

original: yathā kesarādimānākṛtiviśeṣo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siṃhaśabdapratyayabhāṅmukhyo 'nyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tataścānyaḥ puruṣaḥ prāyikaiḥ krauryaśauryādibhiḥ  #
analyzed: yathā kesara ādi māna ākṛti viśeṣaḥ nvaya vyatirekābhyām siṃha śabda pratyaya bhāj mukhyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tatas ca anyaḥ puruṣaḥ prāyikaiḥ kraurya śaurya ādibhiḥ
siṃha guṇaiḥ saṃpannaḥ siddhaḥ

original: tasya puruṣe siṃhaśabdapratyayau gauṇau bhavato nāprasiddhavastubhedasya /
analyzed: tasya puruṣe siṃha śabda pratyayau gauṇau bhavataḥ na aprasiddha vastu bhedasya

original: tasya tvanyatrānyaśabdapratyayau bhrāntinimittāveva bhavato na gauṇau /
analyzed: tasya tu anyatra anya śabda pratyayau bhrānti nimittau eva bhavataḥ na gauṇau
yathā manda andhakāre sthāṇuḥ ayam iti agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣe puruṣa śabda pratyayau sthāṇu viṣayau
yathā vā śuktikāyām akasmāt rajatam iti niścitau śabda pratyayau

original: tadvaddehādisaṃghāte 'hamiti nirupacāreṇa śabdapratyayāvātmānātmāvivekenotpadyamānau kathaṃ gauṇau śakyau vaditum /
analyzed: tadvat deha ādi saṃghāte ham iti nirupacāreṇa śabda pratyayau ātma anātma avivekena utpadyamānau katham gauṇau śakyau vaditum
ātma anātma vivekinām api paṇḍitānām aja avi pālānām iva a viviktau śabda pratyayau bhavataḥ
tasmāt deha ādi vyatirikta ātma astitva vādinām deha ādau ahaṃpratyayaḥ mithyā eva na gauṇaḥ
tasmāt mithyā pratyaya nimitta tvāt sa śarīra tvasya
siddham jīvataḥ pi viduṣaḥ śarīra tvam

original: tathāca brahmavidviṣayā śrutiḥ- ' tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayītaivamevedaṃ śarīraṃ śete /
analyzed: tathā ca brahma vid viṣayā śrutiḥ tat yathā ahi nirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayīta evam eva idam śarīram śete

original: athāyamaśarīro 'mṛtaḥ prāṇo brahmaiva teja eva' (bṛha. 4.4.7) iti /
analyzed: atha ayam aśarīraḥ mṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ brahma eva tejaḥ eva bṛhaḥ iti

original: 'sacakṣuracakṣuriva sakarṇo 'karṇa iva savāgavāgiva samanā amanā iva saprāṇo 'prāṇa iva' iti ca /
analyzed: sa cakṣuḥ a cakṣuḥ iva sa karṇo karṇaḥ iva sa vāc avāc iva sa manāḥ amanāḥ iva sa prāṇo prāṇaḥ iva iti ca
smṛtiḥ api ca sthita prajñasya akā bhāṣā bhagī
ityādyā sthitaprajña lakṣaṇāni ācakṣāṇā viduṣaḥ sarva pravṛtti asaṃbandham darśayati
tasmāt na avagata brahma ātma bhāvasya yathāpūrvam saṃsāri tvam

original: yasya tu yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ nāsāvavagatabrahmātmabhāva ityanavadyam /
analyzed: yasya tu yathāpūrvam saṃsāri tvam na asau avagata brahma ātma bhāvaḥ iti anavadyam
yat punar uktam śravaṇāt parācīnayoḥ manana nididhyāsanayoḥ darśanāt vadhi śeṣa tvam brahmaṇaḥ na svarūpa paryavasāyi tvam iti na
avagati artha tvāt manana nididhyāsanayoḥ

original: yadi hyavagataṃ brahmānyatra viniyujyeta bhavettadā vidhiśeṣitvam /
analyzed: yadi hi avagatam brahma anyatra viniyujyeta bhavet tadā vidhi śeṣi tvam
na tu tat asti
manana nididhyāsanayoḥ api śravaṇa vat avagati artha tvāt

original: tasmānna pratapattividhiviṣayatayā śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavatītyataḥ svatantrameva brahma śāstrapramāṇakaṃ vedāntavākyasamanvayāditi  #
analyzed: tasmāt na śāstra pramāṇaka tvam brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavati iti atas svatantram eva brahma śāstra pramāṇakam vedānta vākya samanvayāt iti
siddham

original: evañca sati 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti tadviṣayaḥ pṛthakśāstramārambha upapadyate /
analyzed: evam ca sati atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti tad viṣayaḥ pṛthak śāstram ārambhaḥ upapadyate
pratipatti vidhi para tve hi atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti eva ārabdha tvāt na pṛthak śāstram ārabhyeta

original: ārabhyamāṇaṃ caivamārabhyeta - 'athātaḥ pariśiṣṭadharmajijñāseti' ' athātaḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthayorjijñāsā' (jai. 4.1.1) itivat /
analyzed: ārabhyamāṇam ca evam ārabhyeta atha atas pariśiṣṭa dharma jijñāsā iti atha atas kratu artha puruṣa arthayoḥ jijñāsā itivat

original: brahmātmaikyāvagatistvapratijñāteti tadartho yuktaḥ śāstrārambhaḥ- 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti /
analyzed: brahma ātma aikya avagatiḥ tu apratijñātā iti tad arthaḥ yuktaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti

original: tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmītyetadavasānā eva sarve viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇāni /
analyzed: tasmāt aham brahma asmi iti etad avasānāḥ eva sarve viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi ca itarāṇi pramāṇāni
na hi aheya anupādeya advaita ātma avagatau nirviṣayāṇi apramātṛkāṇi ca pramāṇāni bhavitum arhanti iti
api ca āhuḥ gauṇa mithyā ātmanoḥ sattve putra deha ādi bādhanāt
sat brahma ātmā aham iti evam bodhe kāryam katham bhavet
anveṣṭavya ātma vijñānāt prāk pramātṛ tvam ātmanaḥ

deha ātma pratyayaḥ yadvat pramāṇa tvena kalpitaḥ

original: pūrṇatayā juhūdvārā kratuśeṣatāvādātmano 'pi jñānadvārā karmaśeṣatvāttadarthā vedāntāstadvidhiśeṣā bhaviṣyantītyāśaṅkyāha tatkeneti /

original: tathāca - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
analyzed: tathā ca  māyā hi eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yat mām paśyasi nārada

original: ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak valmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartata evamityādyūhyam /

brahma sākṣātkāraḥ vagatiḥ tad artha tvāt
vidhi śeṣa tvena brahma arpaṇe pi

original: athāta iti tṛtīye śrutyādibhiḥ śeṣaśeṣitve siddhe satyanantaraṃ śeṣiṇaiva śeṣasya prayuktisaṃbhavātkonāma kratave kovā puruṣārtāyeti jijñāsā  #
analyzed: atha atas iti tṛtīye śruti ādibhiḥ śeṣa śeṣi tve siddhe sati anantaram śeṣiṇā eva śeṣasya prayukti saṃbhavāt kaḥ nāma kratave kaḥ vā puruṣa ārtāya iti jijñāsā

gaumā iti

tu abheda anubhavāt na gauṇaḥ kintu mithyā

mithyā ātmanaḥ sattve deha indriya ādi bādhanam ca

original: tathāca lokayātrakāryaṃ sadbrahmāhamiti bodhakāryaṃ- advaitasākṣātkāraśca kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tathā ca lokayātra kāryam sat brahma aham iti bodha kāryam advaita sākṣātkāraḥ ca katham bhavet
anveṣṭavya ātma vijñānāt yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā
saḥ nu eṣṭavyaḥ iti tad vijñānāt pūrvam ātmanaḥ mātṛ tvam pramā prameya pramāṇa vibhāgaḥ ca
tena tad abhāve kāryam na utpadyate iti arthaḥ
ātma niścayāt ā brahma svarūpa sākṣātkārāt iti arthaḥ

original: vedāntāḥ siddhabrahmaparā uta kāryaparā iti niṣphalatvasāpekṣatvayoḥ prasaṅgāprasaṅgābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvasūtre dvitīyavarṇakenākṣepasaṃgatyā  #
analyzed: vedāntāḥ siddha brahma parāḥ uta kārya parāḥ iti niṣphala tva sāpekṣa tvayoḥ prasaṅga aprasaṅgābhyām saṃśaye pūrva sūtre dvitīya varṇakena ākṣepa saṃgatyā
pūrvapakṣam āha katham punar ityādinā
sat eva somya etyādīnām sarva ātma tva ādi spaṣṭa brahma liṅgānām brahmaṇi samanvaya ukteḥ
śruti ādi saṃgatayaḥ
siddhānte tad siddhiḥ iti vivekaḥ
katham iti ākṣepe hetuḥ yāvatā iti

original: yato jaiminisūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyāparatvaṃ darśitamato 'kriyārthatvādvedāntanāmānarthakyaṃ phalavadarthaśūnyatvaṃ prāptamityanvayaḥ
analyzed: yatas jaimini sūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyā paratvam darśitam atas kriyā artha tvāt vedānta nāma ānarthakyam phalavat artha śūnyatvam prāptam iti anvayaḥ
sūtrasya ayam arthaḥ prathama sūtre tāvat vedasya adhyayana karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhi bhāvyasya phalavat artha para tvam uktam

original: 'codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharmaḥ'iti dvitīyasūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇamiti vedaprāmāṇyavyāpakaṃ kāryaparatvamavasitam /
analyzed: codanā lakṣaṇaḥ ūrthaḥ dharmaḥ iti dvitīya sūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇam iti veda prāmāṇya vyāpakam kārya para tvam avasitam

original: tatra'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā'ityādyarthavādānāṃ dharme prāmāṇyamasti na veti saṃśaye
analyzed: tatra vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ ityādi arthavādānām dharme prāmāṇyam asti na vā iti saṃśaye

original: āmnāyaprāmāṇyasya kriyārthatvena vyāptatvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasyāpratīteḥ akriyārthānāṃ
analyzed: āmnāya prāmāṇyasya kriyā artha tvena vyāpta tvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasya apratīteḥ akriyā arthānām
teṣām ānarthakyam niṣphala artha tvam

original: na cādhyayanavidhyupāttānāṃ niṣphale siddher'the prāmāṇyaṃ yuktaṃ,
analyzed: na ca adhyayana vidhi upāttānām niṣphale siddhi arthe prāmāṇyam yuktam
tasmāt anityam eṣām prāmāṇyam ucyate
vyāpaka abhāvāt vyāpyam prāmāṇyam na asti eva iti yāvat

original: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe 'pi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ'iti sūtreṇa siddhāntamāha--kriyāparatvamiti /
analyzed: evam pūrvapakṣe vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt stuti arthena vidhīnām syuḥ iti sūtreṇa siddhāntam āha kriyā paratvam iti
anityam iti prāpte darśitam iti arthaḥ

original: vāyurvai kṣipratamagāminī devatā taddevatākaṃ karma kṣiprameva phalaṃ dāsyati,
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai kṣipratama gāminī devatā tad devatākam karma kṣipram eva phalam dāsyati

original: ityevaṃ vidheyārthānāṃ stutirūpārthena dvāreṇa 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityādi vidhivākyenaikavākyatvādarthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: iti evam vidheya arthānām stuti rūpa arthena dvāreṇa vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta etyādi vidhi vākyena eka vākya tvāt arthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ
stuti lakṣaṇayā sa phala kārya para tvāt pramāṇam arthavādāḥ iti yāvat
nanu adhyayana vidhi gṛhītānām vedāntānām ānarthakyam na yuktam iti atas āha kartṛ iti

original: na vayaṃ vedāntānāmānarthakyaṃ sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya mānābhāvāntaravedyatvānniṣphalatvācca
analyzed: na vayam vedāntānām ānarthakyam sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya māna abhāva antara vedya tvāt niṣphala tvāt ca
siddha brahma paratve teṣām māna antara sāpekṣa tva niṣphala tvayoḥ prasaṅgāt aprāmāṇya āpātāt
kārya śeṣa kartṛ devatā phalānām prakāśana dvārā kārya para tvam vaktavyam iti brūmaḥ
tatra tu antar padārtha vākyānām kartṛ devatā stāvaka tvam
vividiṣā ādi vākyānām phala stāvaka tvam

original: nanu karmaviśeṣamanārabhya prakaraṇāntarādhītānāṃ vedāntānāṃ kathaṃ taccheṣakatvaṃ,
analyzed: nanu karma viśeṣam an ārabhya prakaraṇa antara adhītānām vedāntānām katham tad śeṣaka tvam
māna abhāvāt iti arucyā pakṣa antaram āha aupāsana iti
sat brahma abhedam āropya aham brahma asmi iti upāsīta iti upāsanā vidhiḥ
ādi śabdāt śravaṇa ādayaḥ
tad kārya paratvam vā vaktavyam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu śrutaṃ brahma vihāyāśrutaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ kimarthaṃ vaktavyamiti tatrāha--nahīti /
analyzed: nanu śrutam brahma vihāya aśrutam kārya paratvam kimartham vaktavyam iti tatra āha nahi iti
paritas samantāt niścayena sthitam pariṣṭhitam kṛti anapekṣam
siddham iti yāvat
tasya pratipādanam ajñātasya vedena jñāpanam
tat na saṃbhavati
mā anantara yogya irthe vākyasya saṃvāde sati anuvādaka tvāt
agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti vākya vat
visaṃvāde tu bodhaka tvāt
ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti vākya vat iti arthaḥ
siddhaḥ na veda arthaḥ
māna antara yogya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti uktvā niṣphala tvāt ca tathā iti āha tathā iti
siddha jñāpane heya upādeya agocare phala abhāvāt ca tat na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ
phalam hi sukha vyāptiḥ duḥkha hānidh ca
tat ca pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām sādhyam

original: te copādeyasya pravṛttiprayatnakāryasya heyasyanivṛttiprayatnakāryasya jñānābhyāṃ jāyete,
analyzed: te ca upādeyasya pravṛtti prayatna kāryasya heyasya nivṛtti prayatna kāryasya jñānābhyām jāyete
na siddha jñānāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tarhi siddhabodhivedavādānāṃ sāphalyaṃ kathasityāśaṅya 'āmnāyasya'ityādisaṃgrahavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti-ata eveti /
analyzed: tarhi siddha bodhi veda vādānām sāphalyam katham iti āśaṅya āmnāyasya etyādi saṃgraha vākyam vivṛṇoti atas eva iti
siddha vastu jñānāt phala abhāvāt eva iti arthaḥ

original: 'devairniruddhaḥ so 'gnirarodīt'iti vākyasyāśrujatvena rajatasya nindādvārā 'barhiṣi na deyaṃ'iti sabhalaniṣedhaśeṣatvavat vedāntānāṃ vidhayādiśeṣatvaṃ  #
analyzed: devaiḥ niruddhaḥ saḥ agniḥ arodi iti vākyasya aśru ja tvena rajatasya nindā dvārā barhiṣi na deyam iti sabhala niṣedha śeṣa tva vat vedāntānām
vācyam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu teṣāṃ mantravat svātantryamastu nārthavādavadvidhyekavākyatvamityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntāsiddhimāha-mantrāṇāṃ ceti /
analyzed: nanu teṣām mantra vat svātantryam astu na arthavāda vat vidhi ekavākyatvam iti āśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta asiddhim āha mantrāṇām ca iti

original: prathamādhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇer'thavādacintānantaraṃ mantracintā kṛtā-'iṣe tvā'iti mantre 'chinadmi'ityadhyāhārācchākhācchedanakriyāpratīteḥ,
analyzed: prathama adhyāye pramāṇa lakṣaṇa irthavāda cintā anantaram mantra cintā kṛtā ā iṣe tvā iti mantre chinadmi iti adhyāhārāt śākhā chedana kriyā pratīteḥ

original: 'agnirmūrdhā'ityādau ca kriyāsādhanadevatādipratīteḥ mantrāḥ śrutyādibhiḥ kratau viniyuktāḥ,
analyzed: agniḥ mūrdhā ityādau ca kriyā sādhana devatā ādi pratīteḥ mantrāḥ śruti ādibhiḥ kratau viniyuktāḥ

original: te kimuccāraṇamātreṇādṛṣṭaṃ kurvantaḥ kratāvupakurvanti uta dṛṣṭenaivārthasmaraṇeneti
analyzed: te kim uccāraṇa mātreṇa adṛṣṭam kurvantaḥ kratau upakurvanti uta dṛṣṭena eva artha smaraṇena iti
saṃdehe cintā ādinā api adhyayana kāla avagata mantra arthasya smṛti saṃbhavāt adṛṣṭa arthāḥ mantrāḥ
iti prāpte siddhāntaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ iti loka vedayoḥ vākya arthasya aviśeṣāt mantra vākyānām
dṛṣṭena eva sva artha prakāśanena kratu upakāraka tva saṃbhavāt
dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā anupapatteḥ
phalavat anuṣṭhāna apekṣitena kriyā tad sādhana smaraṇena dvāreṇa mantrāṇām karma aṅga tvam
mantraiḥ eva arthaḥ smartavyaḥ iti niyamaḥ tu adṛṣṭa arthaḥ iti
tathā ca arthavādānām stuti padārtha dvārā pada eka vākya tvam vidhibhiḥ
mantrāṇām tu vākya artha jñāna dvārā taiḥ vākya eka vākya tvam iti vibhāgaḥ
nanu astu karma prakaraṇa stha vākyānām vidhi eka vākya tvam

original: vedāntānāṃ tu siddhe prāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha-na kvaciditi /
analyzed: vedāntānām tu siddhe prāmāṇyam kim na syāt iti tatra āha na kvacid iti
vedāntāḥ vidhi eka vākya tvena eva arthavantaḥ
siddhārtha āvedaka tvāt
mantra arthavāda ādi vat iti arthaḥ
anyatra adṛṣṭā api vedānteṣu kalpyatām iti tatra āha aupapannā vā iti
na iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
siddhe phala abhāva asya ukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tarhi brahmaṇyeva svārthe vidhiḥ kalpyatāṃ kṛtaṃ vedāntānāṃ vidhyanataraśeṣatvenetyata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: tarhi brahmaṇi eva svārthe vidhiḥ kalpyatām kṛtam vedāntānām vidhi anatara śeṣatvena iti atas āha na ca iti
nanu dadhnā juhoti iti siddhe dadhani vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatra āha kriyā iti
dadhnaḥ kriyā sādhanasya prayujyamāna tayā sādhya tvāt vidheya tā
niṣkriya brahmaṇaḥ katham api asādhya tvāt na vidheya tvam iti arthaḥ
bhāṭṭa matam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
svayam eva arucim vadan pakṣa antaram āha atha iti
siddhānta sūtram vyācaṣṭe tuśabdaḥ iti
tat brahma vedānta pramāṇakam iti pratijñāta arthe hetum pṛcchati katham iti
hetum āha sam iti
anvaya tātparya viṣaya tvam tasmāt iti eva hetuḥ

original: tātparyasya samyaktvaṃ akhaṇḍārthaviṣayakatvaṃ sūcayituṃ sam-padaṃ pratijñāntargatameva /
analyzed: tātparyasya samyaktvam akhaṇḍa artha viṣayaka tvam sūcayitum sampadam pratijñā antargatam eva
tathā ca akhaṇḍam brahma vedānta ja pramā viṣayaḥ
vedānta tātparya viṣaya tvāt
yaḥ yad vākya tātparya viṣayaḥ sa tad vākya prameyaḥ
yathā karma vākya prameyaḥ dharmaḥ iti prayogaḥ
vākya arthasya akhaṇḍa tvam asaṃsṛṣṭa tvam
vākyasya ca akhaṇḍa arthaka tvam sva pada upasthitāḥ ye padārthāḥ teṣām yaḥ saṃsarḥ tad gocara pramā janaka tvam
na ca idam aprasiddham

original: prakṛṣṭaprakāśaścandra ityādi lakṣaṇavākyānāṃ loke lakṣaṇayā candrādivyaktimātrapramāhetutvāt /
analyzed: prakṛṣṭa prakāśaḥ candraḥ ityādi lakṣaṇa vākyānām loke lakṣaṇayā candra ādi vyakti mātra pramā hetu tvāt
sarva pada lakṣaṇā ca aviruddhā sarvaiḥ arthavāda padaiḥ ekasyāḥ stuteḥ lakṣya tu aṅgīkārāt

original: tathā satyajñānādipadairakhaṇḍaṃ brahma bhātīti na pakṣāsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā satya jñāna ādi padaiḥ akhaṇḍam brahma bhāti iti na pakṣa asiddhiḥ
nā api hetu asiddhiḥ
upakrama ādi liṅgaiḥ vedāntānām advitīya akhaṇḍa brahmaṇi tātparya nirṇayāt
chāndogya ṣaṣṭhe upakramam darśayati sat eva iti
uddālakaḥ putram uvāca he somya priya darśana
idam sarvam jagat
agre utpatteḥ prāc kāle sat abādhitam brahma eva āsīt
eva kāreṇa jagataḥ pṛthak sattā niṣidhyate
sajātīya vijātīya svagata bheda nirāsa artham ekam eva advitīyam iti pada trayam
evam advitīyam brahma upakramya aitadātmyam idam sarvam iti upasaṃharati
idam upakrama upasaṃhāra aikarūpyam tātparya liṅgam
yathā tat tvam asi
iti nava kṛtvas bhyāsaḥ

original: rūpādihīnādvitīyabrahmaṇo mānāntarāyogyatvadapūrvatvamuktam-'atra vāva kila sat somya na nibhālayase'iti /
analyzed: rūpa ādi hīna advitīya brahmaṇaḥ māna antara ayogya tva dapūrva tvam uktam atra vāva kila sat somya na nibhālayase iti
saṃghāte sthitam pratyak brahma na jānāsi iti arthaḥ

original: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye'iti brahmajñānātphalamuktaṃ viduṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya tāvat eva ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye iti brahma jñānāt phalam uktam viduṣaḥ

original: tasya yāvatkālaṃ deho na vimokṣyate tāvadeva dehapātaparyanto vilambaḥ /
analyzed: tasya yāvatkālam dehaḥ na vimokṣyate tāvat eva dehapāta paryantaḥ vilambaḥ
atha dehapāta anantaram vidvān brahma saṃpatsyate
videha kaivalyam anubhachavanti iti arthaḥ
anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya etya ādi advitīya jñāna artha ūrthavādaḥ
mṛd ādi dṛṣṭān ataiḥ prakṛti atirekeṇa vikāraḥ na asti iti upapattiḥ uktā

original: evaṃ ṣaṅvidhāni tātparyaliṅgāni vyastāni samastāni vā prativedāntaṃ dṛśyanta ityaitareyopakramavākyaṃ paṭhati-ātmā vā iti /
analyzed: evam ṣaṅvidhāni tātparya liṅgāni vyastāni samastāni vā prati vedāntam dṛśyante iti aitareya upakrama vākyam paṭhati ātmā vai iti
bṛhadāraṇyake madhu kāṇḍa upasaṃhāra vākyam satā ātmanaḥ nirviśeṣa tva artham āha tat etat iti
māyābhiḥ bahu rūpam tat brahma
etat aparokṣam
apūrvam kāraṇa śūnyam
anaparam kārya rahitam
anantaram jāti antaram asya na asti iti anantaram
ekarasam iti arthaḥ
a bāhyam a dvitīyam
tasya aparokṣa tvam upapādayati ayam iti
sarvam anubhavati iti sarva anubhūḥ
cit mātram iti arthaḥ
ṛk yajuḥ sāma vākyān uktvā ātharvaṇa vākyam āha brahma eva idam iti

original: yatpurastātpūrvadigvastujātamidamabrahmeva viduṣāṃ bhāti tadamṛtaṃ brahmaiva vastu ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat purastāt pūrva diś vastu jātam idam abrahma iva viduṣām bhāti tat amṛtam brahma eva vastu iti arthaḥ
ādi padena satyam jñānam ityādi vākyāni gṛhyante
nanu astu brahmaṇaḥ tātparya viṣaya tvam

original: vedāntānāṃ kāryamevārthaḥ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha--na ceti /
analyzed: vedāntānām kāryam eva arthaḥ kim na syāt iti tatra āha na ca iti

original: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyeniścīyamāne kāryārthatvaṃ na yuktaṃ 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ'iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vedāntānām brahmaṇi kārya artha tvam na yuktam yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti nyāyāt iti arthaḥ

original: yaduktamarthavādanyāyena vedāntānāṃ kartrādistāvakatvamiti tatrāha--na ca teṣāmiti /
analyzed: yat uktam arthavāda nyāyena vedāntānām kartṛ ādiḥ tāvaka tvam iti tatra āha na ca teṣām iti

original: teṣāṃ karmaśeṣastāvakatvaṃ na bhāti kintu jñānadvārā karma tatsādhananāśakatvameva /
analyzed: teṣām karma śeṣaḥ tāvaka tvam na bhāti kintu jñāna dvārā karma tad sādhana nāśaka tvam eva

original: tattatra vidyākāle kaḥ kartā kena karaṇena kaṃ viṣayaṃ paśyet iti śruterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat tatra vidyā kāle kaḥ kartā kena karaṇena kam viṣayam paśyet iti śruteḥ iti arthaḥ
arthavādānām tu svārthe phala abhāvāt stuti lakṣaṇa tā iti bhāvaḥ

original: yaduktaṃ siddhatvena mānāntaravedyaṃ brahma na vedārtha iti tatrāha--na ca parīti /
analyzed: yat uktam siddha tvena māna antara vedyam brahma na veda arthaḥ iti tatra āhana ca pari iti
tattvam asi iti śāstram antareṇa iti saṃbandhaḥ
dharmaḥ na veda arthaḥ
sādhya tvena pāka vat māna antara vedya tvāt

original: yadi vedaṃ vinā dharmasyānirṇayānna mānāntaravedyatā tadā brahmaṇyapi tulyam /
analyzed: yadi vedam vinā dharmasya anirṇayāt na māna antara vedya tā tadā brahmaṇi api tulyam

original: yaccoktaṃ niṣphalatvādbrahma na vedārtha iti tadanūdya pariharati--yattvityādinā /
analyzed: yat ca uktam niṣphala tvāt brahma na veda arthaḥ iti tat anūdya pariharati yat tu ityādinā
rahita tvāt bhinna tvāt
brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadapyuktam--'upāsanāparatvaṃ vedāntānām'iti tatra kiṃ prāṇapañcāgnyādivākyānāmuta sarveṣāmiti /

tatra ādyam aṅkīkaroti devatā ādi iti

kiñca tad arthasya brahmaṇaḥ tad śeṣa tvam jñānāt prāk ūrdhvam vā

original: ādye, adhyastaguṇavatastasya taccheṣatve 'pi na dvitīya ityāha--natu tatheti /
analyzed: ādye adhyasta guṇavataḥ tasya tad śeṣa tve pi na dvitīyaḥ iti āhana tu tathā iti
prāṇa ādi devatā vat iti arthaḥ
aham brahma asmi

original: ityekatve jñāte sati heyopādeyaśūnyatayā brahmātmanaḥ phalābhāvāt,
analyzed: iti ekatve jñāte sati heya upādeya śūnyatayā brahma ātmanaḥ phala abhāvāt

dṛḍhasya iti śeṣaḥ

original: saṃskārotthaṃ tu bhrāntitvena niścite na vidhinimittam /
analyzed: saṃskāra uttham tu bhrānti tvena niścite na vidhi nimittam
yena iti
upāsanāyām kāraṇasya sattvena iti arthaḥ
veda prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam krīyārthakatvam anuvadati yadi api iti
karmakāṇḍa irthavāda ādīnām iti arthaḥ
tathā ca vyāpaka abhāvāt vedānteṣu vyāpya abhāva anumānam iti bhāvaḥ
vedāntāḥ na sva arthe mānam
akriyā artha tvāt saḥ rodi ityādi vat iti anumāne niṣphala arthaka tvam upādhiḥ iti āha tathā api iti
arthavādānām niṣphala svārtha amāna tve pi iti arthaḥ
tad viṣayasya tad karaṇasya
svārthe brahma ātmani iti śeṣaḥ

original: saphalajñānakaraṇatvena vedāntānāṃ svārthe mānatvasiddherna kriyārthakatvaṃ tadvyāpakamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sa phala jñāna karaṇa tvena vedāntānām svārthe mānatva siddheḥ na kriyā arthaka tvam tad vyāpakam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu mā abhūt veda prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam kriyā arthaka tvam
vyāpyam tu bhaviṣyati
tad abhavāt vedāntānām durjñānam iti
na iti āha na ca iti

original: yena vedaprāmāṇyaṃ svasyānumānagamyatvenānyatra kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapekṣeta tadeva nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yena veda prāmāṇyam svasya anumāna gamya tvena anyatra kvacid dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭāntam apekṣeta tat eva na asti iti arthaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādi vat vedasya svatas prāmāṇya jñānāt na tad vyāpti liṅga ādi apekṣā

original: prāmāṇyasaṃśaye tu phalavadajñātābādhitārthatātparyāt prāmāṇyaniścayo na kriyārthatvena /
analyzed: prāmāṇya saṃśaye tu phalavat ajñāta abādhita artha tātparyāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ na kriyā artha tvena
kūpe patet iti vākye vyabhicārāt iti bhāvaḥ
varṇaka artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
samanvayāt iti arthaḥ

original: vidhivākyānāmapi phalavadajñātārthatvena prāmāṇyaṃ tattulyaṃ vedāntānāmapīti sthitam /

original: evaṃ padānāṃ siddher'the vyutpattimicchatāṃ brahmanāstikānāṃ mataṃ,

brahmaṇaḥ māna antara ayogya tvāt

analyzed: saṃprati sarveṣām padānām kārya anvita arthe śaktim icchatām vidhi śeṣa tvena pratyak brahma

original: vedāntairbodhyate na svātantryeṇeti vadatāṃ vṛttikārāṇāṃ matanirāsāya sūtrasya varṇakāntaramārabhyate /
analyzed: vedāntaiḥ bodhyate na svātantryeṇa iti vadatām vṛtti kārāṇām mata nirāsāya sūtrasya varṇaka antaram ārabhyate

original: tatra vedāntāḥ kimupāsanāvidhiśeṣatvena brahma bodhayanti uta svātantryeṇeti siddhe vyutpattyabhāvabhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha--atrāpara  #

iti

original: asyāḥ ko viṣaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyādivākyairvidhiparaireva brahmasamarpyata ityāha--pratipattīti /

original: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' 'āhavanīye juhoti' 'indraṃ yajeta'iti vidhiṣu ke yūpādaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'yūpaṃ takṣati,
analyzed: yūpe paśum badhnāti āhavanīye juhoti indram yajeta eti vidhiṣu ke yūpa ādayaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyām yūpam takṣati
aṣṭa aśrīkaroti iti takṣaṇa ādi saṃskṛtam dāru yūpaḥ
agnīn ādadhīta eti ādhāna saṃskṛtaḥ gniḥ āhavanīyaḥ
vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ iti vidhi paraiḥ eva vākyaiḥ samarpyante tadvat brahma iti arthaḥ
vidhi para vākyasya api anya artha bodhi tve vākya bhedaḥ syāt iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham apiśabdaḥ

original: mānāntarājñātānyapi śeṣatayocyante na pradhānatveneti na vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: māna antara ajñātāni api śeṣa tayā ucyante na pradhāna tvena iti na vākya bhedaḥ
pradhāna artha bhedasya eva vākya bhedaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
nanu ukta ṣaḍvidha liṅgaiḥ tātparya viṣayasya brahmaṇaḥ kutas vidhi śeṣa tvam iti śaṅkate kutas iti
vṛddha vyavahāreṇa hi śāstra tātparya niścayaḥ

original: vṛddhavyavahāre ca śrotuḥ pravṛttinivṛttī uddiśyāpūrvaprayogo dṛśyate /
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahāre ca śrotuḥ pravṛtti nivṛttī uddiśya apūrva prayogaḥ dṛśyate
atas śāstrasya api te eva prayojane

original: te ca kāryajñānajanye iti kāryaparatvaṃ śāstrasya /
analyzed: te ca kārya jñāna janye iti kārya para tvam śāstrasya
tatas kārya śeṣa tvam brahmaṇaḥ iti āha pravṛtti iti
śāstrasya niyoga para tve vṛddha saṃmatim āhana tathā hi ityādinā
kriyā kāryam
niyogaḥ
vidhiḥ pūrvam iti anarthāntaram
kaḥ veda arthaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyām śābara bhāṣya kṛtā uktam dṛṣṭaḥ hi iti
tasya vedasya
kāryam veda arthaḥ iti atra codanā sūtra stham bhāṣyam āha codanā iti

original: kriyāyā niyogasya jñānadvārā pravartakaṃ vākyaṃ codanetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ niyogasya jñāna dvārā pravartakam vākyam codanā iti ucyate iti arthaḥ
śabarasvāmi saṃmatim uktvā jaimini saṃmatim āha tasya jñānam iti
tasya dharmasya jñāpakam apauruṣeya vidhi vākyam upadeśaḥ
tasya dharmeṇa avyatirekāt iti arthaḥ
padānām kārya anvita arthe śaktiḥ iti atra sūtram paṭhati tad bhūtānām iti

original: tattatra vede bhūtānāṃ siddhārthaniṣṭhānāṃ padānāṃ kriyārthena kāryavācinā liṅgādipadena samāmnāyaḥ sahoccāraṇaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: tat tatra vede bhūtānām siddhārtha niṣṭhānām padānām kriyā arthena kārya vācinā liṅga ādi padena samāmnāyaḥ saha uccāraṇam kartavyam
padārtha jñānasya vākya artha rūpa kārya dhī nimitta tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: kāryānvitārthe śaktāni padāni kāryavācipadena saha padārthasmṛtidvārā kāryameva vākyārthaṃ bodhayantīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kārya anvita arthe śaktāni padāni kārya vāci padena saha padārtha smṛti dvārā kāryam eva vākya artham bodhayanti iti bhāvaḥ
phalitam āha atas iti
yatas vṛddhāḥ evam āhuḥ
atas vidhi niṣedha vākyam eva śāstram
arthavāda ādikam tu tad śeṣa tayā upakṣīṇam
tena karma śāstreṇa sāmānyam śāstra tvam
tasmāt vedāntānām kārya para tvena eva arthava tvam syāt iti

original: nanu vedānteṣu niyojyasya vidheyasya cādarśanātkathaṃ kāryadhīriti /
analyzed: nanu vedānteṣu niyojyasya vidheyasya ca adarśanāt katham kārya dhīḥ iti
tatra āhasati ca iti
nanu dharma brahma jijñāsā sūtra kārābhyām iha kāṇḍa dvaye ṛtha bhedaḥ uktaḥ
eka kārya artha tve śāstra bheda anupapatteḥ

original: tatra kāṇḍadvaye jijñāsyabhede sati phalavailakṣyaṇyaṃ vācyam /
analyzed: tatra kāṇḍa dvaye jijñāsya bhede sati phala vailakṣyaṇyam vācyam

original: tathā ca na muktiphalāya jñānasya vidheyatā,
analyzed: tathā ca na mukti phalāya jñānasya vidheya tā
mukteḥ vidheya kriyā janya tve karma phalāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt aviśeṣe jijñāsya bheda asiddheḥ
atas karma phala vilakṣaṇa tvāt nitya siddha mukteḥ tad vyañjaka jñāna vidhiḥ ayuktaḥ iti āśaṅkate nanu iha iti
mukteḥ karma phalāt vailakṣaṇyam asiddham iti tad artham jñānam vidheyam

original: na ca tarhi saphalaṃ kāryameva vedānateṣvapi jijñāsyamiti tadbhedāsiddhiriti vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tarhi saphalam kāryam eva vedānateṣu api jijñāsyam iti tad bheda asiddhiḥ iti vācyam iṣṭa tvāt
na ca brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsya tva sūtra virodhaḥ
jñāna vidhi śeṣa tvena sūtrakṛtā brahma pratipādanāt iti pariharati na iti
brahmaṇaḥ vidhi prayukta tvam sphuṭayati ātmā vai iti

original: 'brahma veda'ityatra brahmabhāvakāmo brahmavedane kuryāditi vidhiḥ pariṇamyata iti draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: brahma veda iti atra brahma bhāva kāmaḥ brahma vedane kuryāt iti vidhiḥ pariṇamyate iti draṣṭavyam
vedāntān eva arthataḥ darśayati nityaḥ iti
nanu kim vidhi phalam iti tat āha tad upāsanāt iti

original: pratyagbrahmopāsanāt 'brahmavidāpnoti param'iti śāstrokto mokṣaḥ svargavallokāprasiddhaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratyak brahma upāsanāt brahma vidā āpnoti param iti śāstra uktaḥ mokṣaḥ svarga vat loka a prasiddhaḥ phalam iti arthaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ kārtavya upāsanā viṣayaka vidhi śeṣa tva anaṅgīkāre bādhakam āha kartavya iti
vidhi asaṃbaddha siddha bodhe pravṛtti ādi phala abhāvāt vedāntānām vaiphalyam syāt iti arthaḥ
nanu iti śaṅkā spaṣṭa arthā
dṛṣṭānta vaiṣamyeṇa pariharati syāt iti
etad arthavatvam evam ced syāt iti arthaḥ
evam śabda artham āha yat iti

original: kiñca yadi jñānādeva muktistadā śravaṇajanyajñānāntaraṃ mananādividhirna syāt,
analyzed: kiñca yadi jñānāt eva muktiḥ tadā śravaṇa janya jñāna antaram manana ādi vidhiḥ na syāt

śabdānām kārya anvita śakteḥ

original: vedāntā na vidhiparāḥ svārthe phalavatve satiniyojyavidhuratvāt,
analyzed: vedāntāḥ na vidhi parāḥ sva arthe phalava tve sati niyojya vidhura tvāt

original: na kevalaṃ dharmākhyaṃ karma kintu atharmo 'pītyāha--adharmo 'pīti /

original: mokṣastu atīndriyoviśokaḥ śarīrādyabhogyo viṣayādyajanyo 'nātmavitsvaprasiddha iti vailakṣaṇyajñānāya pratyakṣādīni viśeṣaṇāni /

tatas ca

original: gamyate na kevalaṃ kiṃ tu prasiddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /

original: saṃpatati gacchati asmāllokādamuṃ lokamaneneti saṃpātaḥ karma /

original: śatṛśānacāvādeśau bhavata iti vihitaśatṛpratyayasāmarthyāt tiṣṭhangāyati ityukte
analyzed: śatṛ śānacau ādeśau bhavataḥ iti vihita śatṛ pratyaya sāmarthyāt tiṣṭhan gāyati iti ukte

original: tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ madhye nabhātītyetāvatā paśyan pratipede ityasya dṛṣṭāntamāha--yatheti /
analyzed: tad kartṛkam kārya antaram madhye na bhāti iti etāvatā paśyan pratipede iti asya dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti
kim ca jñānāt ajñāna nivṛttiḥ śrūyate
jñānasya vidheya tve karma tvāt avidyā nivartaka tvam na yuktam

original: ato bodhakā eva vedāntā na vidhāyakā ityāha--tvaṃ hīti /
analyzed: atas bodhakāḥ eva vedāntāḥ na vidhāyakāḥ iti āha tvam hi iti

original: bhāradvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayaḥ pippalādaṃ guruṃ pādayoḥ praṇamya ūcire--tvaṃ khalvasmākaṃ pitā /
analyzed: bhāradvāja ādayaḥ ṣaṭ ṛṣayaḥ pippalādam gurum pādayoḥ praṇamya ūcire tvam khalu asmākam pitā

original: yastvamavidyāmahodadheḥ paraṃ punarāvṛttiśūnyaṃ pāraṃ brahma vidyāplavenāsmāṃstārayasi prāpayasi /
analyzed: yaḥ tvam avidyā mahā udadheḥ param punarāvṛtti śūnyam pāram brahma vidyā plavena asmān tārayasi prāpayasi
jñānena ajñānam nāśayasi iti yavat
praśna vākyam uktvā chāndogyam āha śrutam iti
atra tārayatu ityantam upakrama stham
śeṣam upasaṃhāra stham iti bhedaḥ

original: ātmavicchokaṃ taratīti bhagavattulyebhyo mayā śrutameva hi na dṛṣṭaṃ,
analyzed: ātma vid śokam tarati iti bhagavat tulyebhyaḥ mayā śrutam eva hi na dṛṣṭam
he bhagavaḥ
śocāmi

original: taṃ śocantaṃ māṃ bhagavāneva jñānaplavena śokasāgarasya paraṃ pāraṃ prāpayatviti
analyzed: tam śocantam mām bhagavān eva jñāna plavena śoka sāgarasya param pāram prāpayatu iti

original: nāradenoktaḥ sanatkumārastasmai tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāyanāradāya tamasaḥ śokanidānājñānasya
analyzed: nāradena uktaḥ sanatkumāraḥ tasmai tapasā dagdha kilbiṣāya nāradāya tamasaḥ śoka nidāna ajñānasya
jñānena nivṛtti rūpam pāram brahma darśitavān iti arthaḥ
etat yaḥ vedasaḥ vidyā granthim vikirati iti vākyam ādi śabda arthaḥ
evam śruteḥ tatva pramā mukti hetuḥ na karma iti uktam
tatra akṣapāda gautama muni saṃmatim āha tathā ca iti
gauraḥ ham iti mithyājñānasya apāye rāga dveṣa moha ādi doṣāṇām nāśaḥ
doṣa apāyāt dharma adharma svarūpa pravṛtteḥ apāyaḥ
pravṛti apāyāt punar deha prāpti rūpa janma apāyaḥ

original: evaṃ pāṭhakrameṇottarottarasya hetunāśānnāśe sati tasya pravṛttirūpahetoranantarasya kāryasya janmano 'pāyāduḥkhadhvaṃsarūpo 'ravargo bhavatītyarthaḥ
analyzed: evam pāṭha krameṇa uttarottarasya hetu nāśāt nāśe sati tasya pravṛtti rūpa hetoḥ anantarasya kāryasya upāyā duḥkha dhvaṃsa rūpaḥ ravargaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
nanu pūrva sūtre tatva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti ukte sati itara padārtha bhinna ātma tattva jñānam

original: kathaṃ mokṣaṃ sādhayatītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ mithyājñānanivṛttidvāreṇeti vaktumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravṛttam /
analyzed: katham mokṣam sādhayati iti ākāṅkṣāyām mithyājñāna nivṛtti dvāreṇa iti vaktum idam sūtram pravṛttam

original: tathācca bhinnātmajñānānmuktiṃ vadatsūtraṃ saṃmataṃ cet paramatānujñā syādityata āha--mithyeti /
analyzed: bhinna ātma jñānāt muktim vadat sūtram saṃmatam ced paramata anujñā syāt iti atas āha mithyā iti

original: tattvajñānānmuktirityaṃśe saṃmatiruktā bhedajñānaṃ tu 'yatra hi dvaitamivabhavati'iti
analyzed: tattva jñānāt muktiḥ iti aṃśe saṃmatiḥ uktā bheda jñānam tu yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati iti

original: śrutyā bhrāntitvāt 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati'iti śrutyā anarthahetutvācca
analyzed: śrutyāḥ bhrānti tvāt mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati iti śrutyāḥ anartha hetu tvāt ca
na mukti hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu brahma ātma eka tva vijñānam api bheda jñāna vat na pramā
saṃpad ādi rūpa tvena bhrānti tvāt iti atas āha na ca idam ityādinā
alpa ālambana tiraskāreṇa utkṛṣṭa vastu abheda dhyānam saṃpad
yathā manaḥ svavṛtti ānantyāt anantam

original: tata utkṛṣṭā viśvedevā apyanantā ityanantatvasāmyāt viśvedevā eva mana iti sampattayānantaphalaprāptirbhavati tathā cetanatvasāmyājjīve brahmābhedaḥ  #
analyzed: tatas utkṛṣṭāḥ viśvedevāḥ api anantāḥ iti ananta tva sāmyāt viśvedevāḥ eva manaḥ iti sampad tayā ananta phala prāptiḥ bhavati tathā cetana tva sāmyāt jīve brahma abhedaḥ
saṃpad iti na ca iti arthaḥ
ālambanasya prādhānyena dhyānam pratīka upāstiḥ adhyāsaḥ
yathā brahma dṛṣṭyā manasaḥ ādityasya vā

original: tathā ahaṃ brahmeti jñānamadhyāso netyāha -na ceti /
analyzed: tathā aham brahma iti jñānam adhyāsaḥ na iti āha na ca iti
ādeśaḥ upadeśaḥ

original: kriyāviśeṣo viśiṣṭakriyā tathā yogo nimittaṃ yasya dhyānasya tattathā /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭa kriyā tathā yogaḥ nimittam yasya dhyānasya tat tathā
yathā pralaya kāle vāyuḥ agni ādīn saṃvṛṇoti saṃharati iti saṃvargaḥ

original: svāpakāle prāṇo vāgādīnsaṃharatīti saṃhārakriyāyogātsaṃvarga iti dhyānaṃ chāndogye vihitaṃ,
analyzed: svāpa kāle prāṇaḥ vāc ādīn saṃharati iti saṃhāra kriyā yogāt saṃvargaḥ iti dhyānam chāndogye vihitam
tathā vṛddhi kriyā yogāt jīvaḥ brahma iti jñānam iti na iti āhana api iti

original: yathā patnyavekṣitamājyaṃ bhavati iti upāṃśuyājādyaṅgasyājyasya saṃskārakamavekṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ tathā karmaṇi kartṛtvenāṅgasyātmanaḥ saṃskārārthaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā patnī avekṣitam ājyam bhavati iti upāṃśuyāja ādi aṅgasya ājyasya saṃskārakam avekṣaṇam vihitam tathā karmaṇi kartṛ tvena aṅgasya ātmanaḥ saṃskāra artham
brahma jñānam na iti āha na api ājyā iti
pratijñā catuṣṭaye hetum āha saṃpad ādi iti

original: upakramādiliṅgairbrahmātmaikatvavastuni pramitiheturyaḥ samānādhikaraṇavākyānāṃ padaniṣṭhaḥ samanvayastātparyaṃ niścitaṃ tatpīḍyeta /
analyzed: upakrama ādi liṅgaiḥ brahma ātma ekatva vastuni pramiti hetuḥ yaḥ samāna adhikaraṇa vākyānām pada niṣṭhaḥ samanvayaḥ tātparyam niścitam tat pīḍyeta
kim ca eka tva jñānāt ājñānika hṛdayasya antaḥkaraṇasya yaḥ rāga ādi granthiḥ cit mayaḥ tādātmya rūpa ahaṅkāra granthiḥ vā naśyati iti ajñāna nivṛtti phala vākya bādhaḥ
sampad ādi jñānasya aprama tvena ajñāna anivartaka tvāt
kiñca jīvasya brahmatva saṃpadā katham tad bhāvaḥ
pūrva rūpe sthite naṣṭe vā anyasya anya ātma tā yogāt
tasmāt na saṃpad ādi rūpam iti arthaḥ
saṃpad ādi rūpa tva abhāve phalitam āha atas iti
pramā tvāt na kṛti sādhyā kim tarhi nityā eva
na pramāṇa sādhyā iti arthaḥ

original: uktarītyā siddhabrahmarūpamokṣasya kāryasādhyatvaṃ tajjñānasya niyogaviṣayatvaṃ ca kalpayitumaśakyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-evaṃbhūtasyeti /
analyzed: ukta rītyā siddha brahma rūpa mokṣasya kārya sādhya tvam tad jñānasya niyoga viṣaya tvam ca kalpayitum aśakyam kṛtya sādhya tvāt iti āha evaṃbhūtasya iti
nanu brahma kārya aṅgam
kāraka tvāt patnī avekṣaṇa karma kāraka ājya vat iti ced
kim jñāne brahmaṇaḥ karma kāraka tvam uta upāsanāyām
na adya iti āha na ca iti

original: śābdajñānaṃ vidikriyāśabdārthaḥ-viditaṃ kāryaṃ aviditaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmādadhi anyadityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śābda jñānam vidi kriyā śabda arthaḥ viditam kāryam aviditam kāraṇam tasmāt adhi anyat iti arthaḥ

original: yenātmanā idaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ loko jānāti taṃ kena karaṇena jānīyāt /
analyzed: yena ātmanā idam sarvam dṛśyam lokaḥ jānāti tam kena karaṇena jānīyāt
tasmāt aviṣayaḥ ātmā iti arthaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha tathā iti

original: 'yanmanasā na manute'iti śrutyā loko manasā yadbrahma na jānātītyaviṣayatvamuktvā tadevāvedyaṃ brahma tvaṃ viddhi /
analyzed: yat manasā na manute iti śrutyā lokaḥ manasā yat brahma na jānāti iti aviṣaya tvam uktvā tat eva avedyam brahma tvam viddhi
tat tu upādhi viśiṣṭam devatā ādikam iti upāsate janāḥ na idam brahma iti arthaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ śābda bodha aviṣaya tve pratijñā hāniḥ iti śaṅkate aviṣaya tve iti
vedānta janya vṛtti kṛta avidyā nivṛtti phala śāli tayā śāstra pramāṇaka tvam vṛtti viṣaya tve pi sva prakāśa brahmaṇaḥ vṛtti abhivyakta sphuraṇa aviṣaya tvāt aprameya tvam iti
pariharati na iti
paratvāt phala tvāt iti arthaḥ
nivṛtti rūpa brahma tātparyāt iti vā arthaḥ
uktam vivṛṇoti nahi iti
a viṣaya tā a nidantayā
adṛśya tve śrutim āha tathā ca iti

original: yasya brahmāmataṃ caitanyaviṣaya iti niścayastena samyagavagatam /
analyzed: yasya brahmā amatam caitanya viṣayaḥ iti niścayaḥ tena samyak avagatam

original: yasya tvajñasya brahma caitanyaviṣaya iti mataṃ sa na veda /
analyzed: yasya tu ajñasya brahma caitanya viṣayaḥ iti matam sa na veda
uktam eva dārḍhya artham anuvadati avijñātam iti
aviṣaya tayā brahma vijānatām avijñātam adṛśyam iti pakṣaḥ

original: ajñānāṃ tu brahma vijñātaṃ dṛśyamiti pakṣa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānām tu brahma vijñātam dṛśyam iti pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram cākṣuṣa manaḥ vṛtteḥ sākṣiṇam

original: anayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na paśyervijñāterbuddhivṛtterniścayarūpāyāḥ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā na viṣayīkuryādityāha-neti /
analyzed: anayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na paśyeḥ vijñāteḥ buddhi vṛtteḥ niścaya rūpāyāḥ sākṣiṇam tathā na viṣayīkuryāt iti āha na iti

original: nanvavidyādinivartakatvena śāstrasya prāmāṇye 'pi nivṛtterāgantukatvānmokṣasyanityatvaṃ syāditi netyāha-ata iti /
analyzed: nanu avidyā ādi nivartaka tvena śāstrasya prāmāṇye pi nivṛtteḥ āgantuka tvāt mokṣasya anitya tvam syāt iti nā iti āha atas iti
tattva jñānāt iti arthaḥ
dhvaṃsasya nitya tvāt ātma rūpa tvāt ca na anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: utpattivikārāptisaṃskārarūpaṃ caturvidhameva kriyāphalaṃ tadbhinnatvānmokṣasya nopāsanāsādhyatvamityāha-yasya tu ityādinātasmājjñānamekaṃ muktvā  #
analyzed: utpatti vikāra āpti saṃskāra rūpam caturvidham eva kriyā phalam tad bhinna tvāt mokṣasya na upāsanā sādhya tvam iti āha yasya tu ityādinā tasmāt jñānam ekam muktvā
ityantena

original: tathā utpādyatvavat vikāryatve cāpekṣata iti yuktamityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā utpādya tva vat vikārya tve ca apekṣate iti yuktam iti anvayaḥ
dūṣayati tayoḥ iti
sthitasya avasthā antaram vikāraḥ
nanu anitya tva nirāsāya kriyayā sthitasya eva brahmaṇaḥ grāma vat āptiḥ astu
na iti āha na ca iti
brahma jīva abhinnam na vā
ubhayathā api āpta tvāt na kriyā apekṣā iti āha sva ātma ityādinā

original: yathā vrīhīṇāṃ saṃskāryatvena prokṣaṇāpekṣā tathā mokṣasya netyāha-nāpītyādinā /
analyzed: yathā vrīhīṇām saṃskārya tvena prokṣaṇa apekṣā tathā mokṣasya na iti āhana api ityādinā
guṇa ādhānam vrīhīṣu prokṣaṇa ādinā
kṣālana ādinā vastra ādau mala apanayaḥ
śaṅkate sva ātma dharmaḥ iti

original: brahmātmasvarūpa eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalākṛta upāsanayā male naṣṭe 'bhivyajyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ-yatheti /
analyzed: brahma ātma svarūpaḥ eva mokṣaḥ na ādya vidyā mala akṛtaḥ upāsanayā male naṣṭe bhivyajyate iti atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā iti
kiyā ātmani malaḥ satyaḥ kalpitaḥ vā
dvitīye jñānāt eva tad nāśaḥ na kriyayā
ādye kriyā kim ātma niṣṭā anya niṣṭā vā
na ādyaḥ iti āha na kriyā iti
anupapattim sphuṭayati yat iti

original: kriyā hi svāśraye saṃyogādivikāramakurvatī na jāyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā hi sva āśraye saṃyoga ādi vikāram akurvatī na jāyate iti arthaḥ
tat ca vākya bādhanam
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha anyā iti
aviṣaya tvāt
kriyā āśraya dravya asaṃyogi tvāt iti yāvat
darpaṇam tu sa avayavam kriyā āśraya iṣṭakā cūrṇa ādi dravya saṃyogi tvāt saṃskriyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: anyakriyayānyo na saṃskriyata ityatra vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
analyzed: anya kriyayā anyaḥ na saṃskriyate iti atra vyabhicāram śaṅkate nanu iti

original: ātmano mūlāvidyāpratibimbitatvena gṛhītasya naro 'hamiti bhrāntyā dehatādātmyamāpannasya kriyāśrayatvabhrāntyā saṃskāryatvabhramānna vyabhicāra  #
analyzed: ātmanaḥ mūlāvidyā pratibimbita tvena gṛhītasya naraḥ ham iti bhrāntyā deha tādātmyam āpannasya kriyā āśraya tva bhrāntyā saṃskārya tva bhramāt na vyabhicāra
iti āhana iti
kaścid iti
yatra ātmani viṣaye ārogya buddhiḥ utpadyate tasya deha saṃhatasya eva ārogya phalam iti anvayaḥ
nanu deha abhinnasya katham saṃskāraḥ
tasya āmuṣmika phala bhoktṛ tva ayogāt iti atas āha tena iti

original: dehasaṃhatenaivāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbātmanā kartāhamiti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāmādayo manastādātmyādasya santīti pratyayinā kriyāphalaṃ bhujyata  #
analyzed: deha saṃhatena eva antaḥkaraṇa pratibimba ātmanā kartāham iti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāma ādayaḥ manaḥ tādātmyāt asya santi iti pratyayinā kriyā phalam bhujyata
iti arthaḥ
manaḥ viśiṣṭasya āmuṣmika bhoktuḥ saṃskāraḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na kevalasya sākṣiṇa ityatra mānamāha-tayoriti /
analyzed: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛ tvam na kevalasya sākṣiṇaḥ iti atra mānam āha tayoḥ iti

original: pramātṛsākṣiṇormadhye sattvasaṃsargamātreṇa kalpitakartṛtvādimān pramātā pippalaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte,
analyzed: pramātṛ sākṣiṇoḥ madhye sattva saṃsarga mātreṇa kalpita kartṛ tva ādimān pramātā pippalam karma phalam bhuṅkte

original: sa eva śodhitatvenānyaḥ sākṣitayā prakāśata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva śodhita tvena anyaḥ sākṣi tayā prakāśate iti arthaḥ
ātmā dehaḥ
deha ādi yuktam pramātṛ ātmānam iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ sopādhikasya ciddhātormithyāsaṃskāryatvamuktvā nirupādhikasyāsaṃskāryatve mānamāha-eka iti /
analyzed: evam sa upādhikasya ciddhātoḥ mithyā saṃskārya tvam uktvā nirupādhikasya asaṃskārya tve mānam āha ekaḥ iti
sarva bhūteṣu advitīyaḥ ekaḥ devaḥ sva prakāśaḥ
tathā api māyā āvṛta tvāt na prakāśate iti āha gūḍhaḥ iti

original: nanu jīvenāsaṃbandhādbhinnatvādvā devasyābhānaṃ na tu māyāgūhanāditi,
analyzed: nanu jīvena asaṃbandhāt bhinna tvāt vā devasya ābhānam na tu māyā gūhanāt iti
na iti āha sarva vyāpī sarva bhūta antarātmā iti
devasya vibhu tvāt sarva prāṇi pratyak tvāt ca āvaraṇāt eva ābhānam iti arthaḥ
pratyaktve kartṛ tvam syāt iti ced na
karma adhyakṣaḥ
kriyā sākṣī iti arthaḥ
tarhi sākṣyam asti iti dvaita āpattiḥ
na sarva bhūtānām adhiṣṭhānam bhūtvā sākṣī bhavati
sākṣyam adhiṣṭhāne sākṣiṇi kalpitam iti bhāvaḥ
sākṣi śabda artham āha cetā kevalaḥ iti
boddhṛ tve sati akartā sākṣī iti loka prasiddham
cakāraḥ doṣāḥ bhāva samuccaya arthaḥ

original: nirguṇatvānnirdeṣatvācca guṇo doṣanāśo vā saṃskāro notyarthaḥ /
analyzed: nirguṇa tvāt nirdeṣa tvāt ca guṇaḥ doṣa nāśaḥ vā saṃskāraḥ na utyarthaḥ
saḥ iti upakramāt śrukra ādi śabdāḥ puṃstvena vācyāḥ

original: sa eva ātmā pari sarvamagāt vyāptaḥ,
analyzed: saḥ eva ātmā pari sarvam agāt vyāptaḥ
śukraḥ dīptimān
akāyaḥ liṅga śūnyaḥ
avraṇaḥ kṣataḥ

apāpa viddhaḥ puṇya pāpābhyām a saṃspṛṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ
atas iti
utpatti āpti vikāra saṃskārebhyaḥ kriyā phalam na asti
yat mokṣasya kriyā sādhya tve dvāram bhavet iti arthaḥ
nanu mokṣasya asādhya tve śāstra ārambhaḥ vṛthā na
jñāna artha tvāt iti āha tasmāt iti
dvāra abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
vyāghātam śaṅkate nanu iti

original: tathā ca mokṣe kriyānupraveśo nāstīti vyāhṛtamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca mokṣe kriyā anupraveśaḥ na asti iti vyāhṛtam iti bhāvaḥ
mānasam api jñānam na vidhi yogyā kriyā
vastu tad na tvāt
kṛtya sādhya tvāt ca iti āhana iti
vailakṣaṇyam prapañcayati kriyā hi iti

original: yatra viṣaye tadanapekṣayaiva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyeti yojanā /
analyzed: yatra viṣaye tad anapekṣayā eva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyā iti yojanā
viṣaya vastu anapekṣā
kṛti sādhyā ca kriyā iti atra dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti
gṛhītam adhvaryuṇā iti śeṣaḥ
vaṣaṭkariṣyan hotā

original: sandhyāṃ devatāmiti caivamādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyānakriyā vastvānapekṣā,
analyzed: sandhyām devatām iti ca evam ādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyāna kriyā vastu anapekṣā
ca codyate tādṛśī kriyā iti arthaḥ
dhyānam api mānasa tvāt jñāna vat na kriyā iti atra āha dhyānam ityādinā
tathā api kriyā eva iti śeṣaḥ
kṛtya sādhya tvam upādhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: dhyānakriyamuktvā tato vailakṣaṇyaṃ jñānasya sphuṭayati-jñānaṃ tviti /
analyzed: dhyāna kriyam uktvā tatas vailakṣaṇyam jñānasya sphuṭayati jñānam tu iti
atas pramā tvāt na codanā tantram na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ
puruṣaḥ kṛti dvārā tantram hetuḥ yasya tat puruṣa tantram
tasmāt vastu avyabhicārāt apuntantra tvāt ca dhyānāt jñānasya mahān bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
bhedam eva dṛṣṭānta antareṇa āha yathā ca iti
abheda sattve pi vidhitaḥ dhyānam kartum śakyam
na jñānam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu pratyakṣajñānasya viṣayajanyatayā tattantratve 'pi śābdabodhasya tadabhāvādvidheyakriyātvamiti netyāha-evaṃ sarveti /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa jñānasya viṣaya janya tayā tad tantra tve pi śābda bodhasya tad abhāvāt vidheya kriyā tvam iti na iti āha evam sarva iti
śabda anumāna ādi artheṣu api jñānam avidheya kriyā tvena jñātavyam
tatra api mānāt eva jñānasya prāpteḥ vidhi ayogāt iti arthaḥ
tatra evam sati
loke jñānasya avidheya tve sati iti arthaḥ
yathā abhūta tvam abādhita tvam

original: nanu 'ātmānaṃ paśyeta' 'brahma tvaṃ viddhi' 'ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ'iti vijñāne liṅloṭtavyapratyayā vidhāyatāḥ śrūyante,
analyzed: nanu ātmānam paśyeta brahma tvam viddhi ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ iti vijñāne liṅ loṭ tavya pratyayāḥ śrūyante
atas jñānam vidheyam iti atas āha tad viṣayaḥ iti

original: tasmin jñānarūpaviṣaye vidhayaḥ puruṣaṃ pravartayitumaśaktā bhavanti /
analyzed: tasmin jñāna rūpa viṣaye vidhayaḥ puruṣam pravartayitum aśaktāḥ bhavanti

original: aniyojyaṃ kṛtyasādhyaṃ niyojyaśūnyaṃ vā jñānaṃ tadviṣayakatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aniyojyam kṛtya sādhyam niyojya śūnyam vā jñānam tad viṣayaka tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: mamāyaṃ niyoga iti boddhā niyojyo viṣayaśca vidhernāstīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: mama ayam niyogaḥ iti boddhā niyojyaḥ viṣayaḥ ca vidheḥ na asti iti bhāvaḥ
tarhi jñeyam brahma vidhīyatām
na iti āha aheya iti
vastu svarūpaḥ viṣayaḥ tattvāt
brahmaṇaḥ niratiśaya syādhya tvāt na vidheya tvam iti arthaḥ
udāsīna vastu viṣayaka tvāt ca jñānam na vidheyam
pravṛti ādi phala abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
vidhi padānām gatim pṛcchati kimarthāni iti
vidhi chāyāni prasiddha yāga ādi vidhi tulyāni iti arthaḥ
vidhi pratyayaiḥ ātma jñānam parama puruṣa artha sādhanam iti stūyate

original: stutyā ātyantikeṣṭahetutvabhrāntyā yā viṣayeṣu pravṛttirātmaśravaṇādipratibandhikā tannivṛttiphalāni vidhipadānītyāha--svābhāviketi /
analyzed: stutyāḥ ātyantika iṣṭa hetutva bhrāntyā yā viṣayeṣu pravṛttiḥ ātma śravaṇa ādi pratibandhikā tad nivṛtti phalāni vidhi padāni iti āha svābhāvikā iti
vivṛṇoti yaḥ hi ityādinā
tatra viṣayeṣu
saṃghātasya yā pravṛttiḥ tad gocarāt śabda ādeḥ iti arthaḥ
srotaḥ citta vṛtti pravāhaḥ
śravaṇa svarūpam āha tasya iti
anveṣaṇam jñānam
yat idam jagat tat sarvam ātmā eva iti anātma bodhena ātmā bodhyate

original: advitīyādṛśyātmabodhe vidhistapasvī dvaitavanopajīvanaḥ kva stāsyatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: advitīya adṛśya ātma bodhe vidhiḥ tapasvī dvaitavana upajīvanaḥ kva stāsyati iti bhāvaḥ
ātma jñāninaḥ kartavya abhāve mānam āha tathā ca iti

original: ayaṃ svayaṃ paramānandaḥ paramātmāhamasmi iti yadi kaścitpuruṣa ātmānaṃ jānīyāttadā kiṃ phalamicchan,
analyzed: ayam svayam parama ānandaḥ paramātmā aham asmi iti yadi kaścid puruṣaḥ ātmānam jānīyāt tadā kim phalam icchan

etat guhyatamam tattvam
vṛtti kāra mata nirāsam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

ajñātasya phala svarūpasya ātmanaḥ upaniṣad eka vedyasya akārya śeṣa tvāt kṛtsna vedasya kārya para tvam aprasiddham

original: na ca pravṛttinivṛttiliṅgābhyāṃ śrotustadhetuṃ kāryabodhamanumāya vaktṛvākyasya kāryaparatvaṃ

original: niścitya vākyasthapadānāṃ kāryānvite śaktigrahānna siddhasyāpadārthasya vākyārthatvamiti vācyam,
analyzed: niścitya vākya stha padānām kārya anvite śakti grahāt na siddhasya apadārthasya vākya artha tvam iti vācyam

original: putraste jāta iti vākyaśrotuḥ piturharṣaliṅgeneṣṭaṃ putrajanmānumāya putrādipadānāṃ siddhe saṃgatigrahāt,
analyzed: putraḥ te jātaḥ iti vākya śrotuḥ pituḥ harṣa liṅgena iṣṭam putra janma anumāya putra ādi padānām siddhe saṃgati grahāt
siddhasya api vākya artha tvāt iti alam

original: kiñca brahmaṇo nāstītvādeva kṛtsnavedasya kāryaparatvaṃ uta vedānteṣu tasyābhānāt,
analyzed: kiñca brahmaṇaḥ kārya para tvam uta vedānteṣu tasya ābhānāt
atha vā kārya śeṣa tvāt

an anya śeṣa tva artham asaṃsārī ityādi viśeṣaṇam

original: nāstītvābhāve hetuṃ vedāntamānasiddhatvamuktvā hetvantaramātmatvamāha--sa eṣa iti /

original: idaṃ na idaṃ na iti sarvadṛśyaniṣedhena ya ātmā upadiṣṭaḥ sa eṣa ityarthaḥ /

original: yaṃ tīrthakārā api na jānanti tasyālaikikatvaṃ kimu vācyamityāha--nahīti /

original: tatra 'phalavadarthāvabodhanam'iti vaktavye dharmavicāraprakramāt 'karmāvabodhanaṃ'ityuktaṃ naitāvatā vedāntānāṃ brahmaparatvanirāsaḥ /
analyzed: tatra phalavat artha avabodhanam iti vaktavye dharma vicāra prakramāt karma avabodhanam iti uktam na etāvatā vedāntānām brahma para tva nirāsaḥ

original: ata eva 'anupalabdher'the tatpramāṇam'iti sūtrakāro dharmasya phalavadajñātatvenaiva vedārthatāṃ darśayati taccāvaśiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇa iti na vṛddhavākyairvirodha  #
analyzed: atas eva anupalabdhi ṛthe tat pramāṇam iti sūtrakāraḥ dharmasya phala vat ajñāta tvena eva veda artha tām darśayati tat ca avaśiṣṭam brahmaṇaḥ iti na vṛddha vākyaiḥ virodha
iti āha tad dharma iti
niṣedha śāstrasya api nivṛtti kārya para tvam asti
tad sūtra bhāṣya vākya jātam karmakāṇḍasya kārya paratva abhiprāyam iti arthaḥ
vastutas tu liṅ arthe karmakāṇḍasya tātparyam
liṅ arthaḥ ca

original: loke pravartakajñānagocaratvena kḷptaṃ yāgādikriyāgatamiṣṭasādhanatvameva na kriyāto
analyzed: loke pravartaka jñāna gocara tvena kḷptam yāga ādi kriyā gatam iṣṭa sādhana tvam eva na kriyāyāḥ
tiriktam kāryam tasya kūrma loma vat aprasiddha tvāt iti tasya api para abhimata kārya vilakṣaṇe

kim ca vedāntāḥ siddha vastu parāḥ
phalavat bhūta śabda tvāt
dadhi ādi śabda vat iti āha api ca iti
