ādyaḥ āha āmnāyasya iti

original: iti nyāyena etadabhidheyarāhityaṃ niyamenāṅgīkurvatāṃ 'somena yajeta' 'dadhnā juhoti'ityādi vākyeṣu dadhisomādiśabdānāmarthaśūnyatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ
analyzed: iti nyāyena etad abhidheya rāhityam niyamena aṅgīkurvatām somena yajeta dadhnā juhoti ityādi vākyeṣu dadhi soma ādi śabdānām artha śūnyatvam syāt iti arthaḥ
nanu kena uktam abhidheya rāhityam iti āśaṅkya āha pravṛtti iti

original: kāryātirekeṇa bhavyārthatvena kāryaśeṣatvena dadhyādiśabdo bhūtaṃ vakti cet,
analyzed: kārya atirekeṇa bhavya artha tvena kārya śeṣa tvena dadhi ādi śabdaḥ bhūtam vakti ced

original: tarhi satyādiśadabdaḥ kūṭasthaṃ na vaktītyatra ko hetuḥ,
analyzed: tarhi satya ādi śat abdaḥ kūṭastham na vakti iti atra kaḥ hetuḥ
kim kūṭasthasya akriya tvāt uta akriya aśeṣa tvāt vā iti praśnaḥ
nanu dadhi ādeḥ kārya anvayi tvena kārya tvāt upadeśaḥ
na kūṭasthasya akārya tvāt iti ādyam āśaṅkya nirasyati nahi iti
dadhi ādeḥ kārya tve kārya śeṣa tva hāniḥ

original: ato bhūtasya kāryādbhinnasya dadhyādeḥ śabdārthatvaṃ labdhamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas bhūtasya kāryāt bhinnasya dadhi ādeḥ śabda artha tvam labdham iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīyam śaṅkate akriyā tve pi iti
kārya śeṣa paraḥ kūṭasthasya tu akārya śeṣa tvāt na upadeśavaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
bhūtasya kārya śeṣa tvam śabda artha tvāya phalāya vā
na ādyaḥ iti āha na eṣa doṣaḥ iti

original: dadhyādeḥ kāryaśeṣatve satyapi śabdena vastumātramevopadiṣṭaṃ na kāryānvayī śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: dadhi ādeḥ kārya śeṣa tve sati api śabdena vastu mātram eva upadiṣṭam na kārya anvayī śabda arthaḥ
anvita artha mātre śabdānām śaktiḥ iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam aṅgīkaroti kriyā artha tvam tu iti

original: tasya bhūtaviśeṣasya dadhyādeḥ kriyāśeṣatvaṃ phalamuddiśyāṅgīkriyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya bhūta viśeṣasya dadhi ādeḥ kriyā śeṣa tvam phalam uddiśya aṅgīkriyate iti arthaḥ
na tu brahmaṇaḥ iti tuśabda arthaḥ

original: nanu bhūtasya kāryaśeṣatvāṅgīkāre svātantryeṇa kathaṃ śabdārthateti,
analyzed: nanu bhūtasya kārya śeṣa tva aṅgīkāre svātantryeṇa katham śabda artha tā iti

original: phalārthaṃ śeṣatvāṅgīkāramātreṇa śabdārthatvabhaṅge nāsti śeṣatvasya śabdārthatāyāmapraveśādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: phala artham śeṣatva aṅgīkāra mātreṇa śabda artha tva bhaṅge na asti śeṣa tvasya śabda artha tāyām apraveśāt iti arthaḥ
ānarthakyam phala abhāvaḥ iti pakṣam śaṅkate yat iti

original: yadyapi dadhyādi svato niṣphalamapi kriyādvārā saphalatvādupadiṣṭaṃ tathāpi kūṭasthabrahmavādinaḥ kriyādvārābhāvāt tena dṛṣṭāntena ki phalaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi api dadhi ādi svatas niṣphalam api kriyā dvārā saphalatvāt upadiṣṭam tathā api kūṭastha brahma vādinaḥ kriyā dvāra abhāvāt tena dṛṣṭāntena ki phalam

original: bhūtasya sāphalye kriyaiva dvāramiti na niyamaḥ,
analyzed: bhūtasya sāphalye kriyā eva dvāram iti na niyamaḥ

tathā eva
dadhi ādi vat eva iti arthaḥ

original: dadhyādeḥ kriyādvārā sāphalyaṃ brahmaṇastu svata iti viśeṣe satyapi vedāntānāṃ saphalabhūtārthakatvamātreṇa dadhyādyupadeśasāmyamityanavadyam
analyzed: dadhi ādeḥ kriyā dvārā sāphalyam brahmaṇaḥ tu svatas iti viśeṣe sati api vedāntānām saphala bhūta arthaka tva mātreṇa dadhi ādi upadeśa sāmyam iti anavadyam
vedāntānām niṣedha vākya vat siddhārtha paratvam iti āha api ca iti
nañaḥ prakṛti arthena saṃbandhāt hanana abhāvaḥ nañ arthaḥ
iṣṭa sādhana tvam
iṣṭaḥ ca atra naraka duḥkha abhāvaḥ
tad paripālakaḥ hanana abhāvāḥ iti niṣedha vākya arthaḥ
hanana abhāvaḥ duḥkha abhāva hetuḥ iti uktau arthāt hananasya duḥkha sādhanatva dhiyā puruṣaḥ nivartate
na atra niyogaḥ kaścid iti
tasya kriyā tad sādhana dadhi ādi viṣaya tvāt

original: na ca hananābhāvarūpā nañvācyā nivṛttiḥ kriyā,
analyzed: na ca hanana abhāva rūpā nañ vācyā nivṛttiḥ kriyā
abhāva tvāt
na api kriyā sādhanam
abhāvasya bhāva artha ahetu tvāt bhāva artha asattvāt ca iti arthaḥ
atas niṣedha śāstrasya siddhārthe prāmāṇyam iti bhāvaḥ
vipakṣe daṇḍam āha akriyā iti

original: nanu svabhāvato rāgataḥ prāptena hantyarthenānurāgeṇa nañsaṃbandhena hetunā hananavirodhinī saṃkalpakrīyā bodhyate,
analyzed: nanu svabhāvataḥ rāgataḥ prāptena hanti arthena anurāgeṇa nañ saṃbandhena hetunā hanana virodhinī saṃkalpa krīyā bodhyate
sā ca nañ artha rūpā tatraprāptatvāt vidhīyate
ahananam kuryāt iti

original: tathā ca kāryārthakamidaṃ vākyamityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-na ceti /
analyzed: tathā ca kārya arthakam idam vākyam iti āśaṅkya niṣedhati na ca iti

original: audāsīnyaṃ puruṣasya svarūpaṃ tacca hananakriyānivṛttyupalakṣitaṃ nivṛttyaudāsīnyaṃ hananābhāva iti yāvat /
analyzed: audāsīnyam puruṣasya svarūpam tat ca hanana kriyā nivṛtti upalakṣitam nivṛtti audāsīnyam hanana abhāvaḥ iti yāvat

original: tadvyatirekeṇa nañaḥ kriyārthatvaṃ kalpayituṃ na ca śakyamiti yojanā /
analyzed: tad vyatirekeṇa nañaḥ kriyā artha tvam kalpayitum na ca śakyam iti yojanā

original: mukhyārthasyābhāvasya nañarthatvasaṃbhave tadvirodhikriyālakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt niṣedhavākyasyāpi kāryārthakatve vidhiniṣekabhedaviplavāpatteśceti  #
analyzed: mukhya arthasya abhāvasya nañ artha tva saṃbhave tad virodhi kriyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ anyāyya tvāt niṣedha vākyasya api kārya arthaka tve vidhi niṣeka bheda viplava āpatteḥ ca iti
bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tadabhāvavattadanyatadviruddhayorapi nañaḥ śaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
analyzed: nanu tad abhāvavat tad anya tad viruddhayoḥ api nañaḥ śaktiḥ kim na syāt

aneka artha tvasya anyāyya tvāt iti āha nañaḥ ca iti
go ādi śabdānām tu agatyā nānā arthaka tvam

anya viruddhayoḥ tu lakṣya tvam yuktam
śakya saṃbandhāt
brāhmaṇāt anyasmin kṣatriya ādau

original: dharmaviruddhe vā pāpe brahmaṇādyabhāvasya nañśakyasya saṃbandhāt /
analyzed: dharma viruddhe vā pāpe brahmaṇā ādi abhāvasya nañ śakyasya saṃbandhāt

original: prakṛte ca ākhyātayogānnañ prasajyapratiṣedhaka eva na paryudāsalakṣakaḥ iti mantavyam /
analyzed: prakṛte ca ākhyāta yogāt nam prasajya pratiṣedhakaḥ eva na paryudāsa lakṣakaḥ iti mantavyam

original: yadvā nañaḥ prakṛtyā na saṃbandhaḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayārtho 'saparjanatvāt,
analyzed: yat vā nañaḥ prakṛtyā na saṃbandhaḥ prakṛteḥ sa parjana tvāt

original: pradhānasaṃbandhāccāpradhānānāṃ kintu prakṛtyarthaniṣṭhena pratyayārtheneṣṭasādhanatvena saṃbandho nañaḥ,
analyzed: pradhāna saṃbandhāt ca apradhānānām kintu prakṛti artha niṣṭhena pratyaya arthena iṣṭa sādhana tvena saṃbandhaḥ nañaḥ

original: iṣṭaṃ ca svāpekṣayā balavadaniṣṭānanubandhi yattadeva na tātkālikasukhamātraṃ,
analyzed: iṣṭam ca sva apekṣayā balavat aniṣṭa ananubandhi yat tat eva na tātkālika sukha mātram
viṣa saṃyukta anna bhogasya api iṣṭa tva āpatteḥ

original: tathā ca na 'hantavyaḥ'hananaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatve sati iṣṭasādhanaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca na hantavyaḥ hananam balavat aniṣṭa asādhana tve sati iṣṭa sādhanam na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atra ca 'hantavyaḥ'iti hanane viśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ bhrāntiprāptamanūdya netyabhāvabodhane balavadaniṣṭasādhanaṃ hananamiti buddhirbhavati,
analyzed: atra ca hantavyaḥ iti hanane viśiṣṭa iṣṭa sādhanatvam bhrānti prāptam anūdya na iti abhāva bodhane balavat aniṣṭa sādhanam hananam iti buddhiḥ bhavati
hanane tātkālika iṣṭa sādhanatva rūpa viśeṣya satvena viśiṣṭa abhāva abuddheḥ viśeṣaṇa abhāva paryavasānāt

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatvamiti tadabhāvo balavadaniṣṭasādhanatvaṃ nañarthaṃ iti paryavasannam /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam balavat aniṣṭa asādhana tvam iti tad abhāvaḥ balavat aniṣṭa sādhana tvam nañ artham iti paryavasannam
tad buddhiḥ audāsīnya paripālikā iti āha abhāva iti
caḥ pi arthaḥ pakṣa antara dyotī
prakṛti artha abhāva buddhi vat pratyaya artha abhāva buddhiḥ api iti arthaḥ

original: buddheḥ kṣaṇikatvāttadabhāve satyaudāsīnyātpracyutirūpā hananādau pravṛttiḥ syāditi,
analyzed: buddheḥ kṣaṇika tvāt tad abhāve sati audāsīnyāt pracyuti rūpā hanana ādau pravṛttiḥ syāt iti
atra ahasā ca iti

original: yathāgnirindanaṃ dagdhvā śyāmyati evaṃ sā nañarthābhāvabuddhiḥ hananādāviṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntimūlaṃ rāgendhanaṃ dagdhvaiva śāmyatītyakṣarārthaḥ
analyzed: yathā agniḥ indanam dagdhvā śyāmyati evam sā nañ artha abhāva buddhiḥ hananāt āviṣṭa sādhanatva bhrānti mūlam rāga indhanam dagdhvā eva śāmyati iti akṣara arthaḥ
rāga nāśe kṛte pracyutiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yadvā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāganāśe svayameva śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāga nāśe svayam eva śāmyati iti arthaḥ

original: parapakṣe tu hananavirodhikriyā kāryetyukte 'pi hananasyeṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntyanirāsāt pracyutirdurvārā /
analyzed: para pakṣe tu hanana virodhi kriyā kāryā iti ukte hananasya iṣṭa sādhanatva bhrānti anirāsāt pracyutiḥ durvārā
tasmāt tad abhāvaḥ eva nañ arthaḥ iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
bhāva artha abhāvena tad viṣayaka kṛtya bhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ tad śabda arthaḥ
yat vā iti ukta pakṣe nivṛtti upalakṣitam audāsīnyam yasmāt viśiṣṭa abhāva āyattam eva iti vyākhyeyam
svatas siddhasya audāsīnyasya nañ artha sādhya tva upapādana artham nivṛtti upalakṣita tvam iti dhyeyam
tasya baṭoḥ vratam iti anuṣṭheya kriyā vāci vrata śabdena kāryam upakramya na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam iti prajāpati vratam uktam
atas upakrama balāt tatra nañaḥ īkṣaṇa virodhi saṃkalpa kriyā lakṣaṇā aṅgīkṛtā

original: evamagaurasurā adharma ityādau nāmadhātvarthayuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedhavācitvāyogāt anyaviruddhalakṣakatvam /
analyzed: evam agauḥ asurāḥ adharmaḥ ityādau nāma dhātvartha yuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedha vāci tva ayogāt anya viruddha lakṣaka tvam
etebhyaḥ prajāpati vrata ādibhyaḥ nyatrābhāvam eva nañ artham manyāmahe iti arthaḥ

original: duḥkhābhāvaphalake nañarthe siddhe niṣedhaśāstramānatvavadvedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi mānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkha abhāva phalake nañ arthe siddhe niṣedha śāstra māna tva vat vedāntānām brahmaṇi māna tvam iti bhāvaḥ
tarhi akriyā arthānām ānarthakyam iti sūtram kiṃviṣayam iti
tatra āha tasmāt iti
vedāntānām svārthe phalavat tvāt vyartha kathā viṣayam tat iti arthaḥ
yat api ityādi spaṣṭa artham

original: śravaṇajñānamātrātsaṃsārānivṛttāvapi sākṣātkārājjīvata eva muktirdurapahnayeti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
analyzed: śravaṇa jñāna mātrāt saṃsāra anivṛttau api sākṣātkārāt jīvataḥ eva muktiḥ durapahnayā iti sa dṛṣṭāntam āha atra ucyate ityādinā
brahmā aham iti sākṣītkāra virodhāt iti arthaḥ
tattva vidaḥ jīvanmuktau mānam āha tat uktam śrutyā iti
jīvato śarīra tvam viruddham iti śaṅkate śarīre iti

original: ātmano dehasaṃbandhasya bhrāntiprayuktatvāttatvadhiyā tannāśarūpamaśarīratvaṃ jīvato yuktamityāha-netyādinā /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ deha saṃbandhasya bhrānti prayukta tvāt tatva dhiyā tad nāśa rūpam aśarīra tvam jīvataḥ yuktam iti āha na ityādinā

original: asaṅgātmarūpaṃ tvaśarīratvaṃ tatvadhiyā jīvato vyajyata ityāha-nityamiti /
analyzed: asaṅga ātma rūpam tu aśarīra tvam tatva dhiyā jīvataḥ vyajyate iti āha nityam iti
deha ātmanoḥ saṃbandhaḥ satyaḥ iti śaṅkate itad kṛtā iti
tad nāśa artham kārya apekṣā iti bhāvaḥ
ātmanaḥ śarīra saṃbandhe jāte dharma adharma utpattiḥ
tasyām satyām saṃbandha janma iti anyonya āśrayāt ekasya asiddhyā dvitīyasya api asiddhiḥ syāt iti pariharati nā ityādinā
nanu etad deha janya dharma adharma karmaṇaḥ etad deha saṃbandha hetu tve syāt anyonya āśrayaḥ
pūrva deha karmaṇaḥ etad deha saṃbandha utpattiḥ

original: pūrvadehaśca tatpūrvadehakṛtakarmaṇa iti bījāṅkuravadanāditvānnāyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-andheti /
analyzed: pūrva dehaḥ ca tad pūrva deha kṛta karmaṇaḥ iti bīja aṅkura vat anādi tvāt na ayam doṣaḥ iti atas āha andha iti
aprāmāṇikī iti arthaḥ

original: na hi bījāṅkuraḥ tato bījāntaraṃ ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvadātmano dehasaṃbandhaḥ pūrvakarmakṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bīja aṅkuraḥ tatas bīja antaram ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvat ātmanaḥ deha saṃbandhaḥ pūrva karma kṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ
na api asti kaścid āgamaḥ
pratyuta asaṅgaḥ hi ityādi śrutiḥ sarva kartṛ tvam vārayati iti bhāvaḥ
tatra yuktim āha kriyā iti
kūṭasthasya kṛtya yogāt na kartṛ tvam iti arthaḥ

original: svato niṣkriyasyāpi kārakasaṃnidhinā kartṛtvamiti śaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyeṇa nirasyati-neti /
analyzed: svatas niṣkriyasya api kāraka saṃnidhinā kartṛ tvam iti śaṅkām dṛṣṭānta vaiṣamyeṇa nirasyati na iti

original: rājādīnāṃ svakrītabhṛtya kartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ nātmana ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: rāja ādīnām sva krīta bhṛtya kartṛ tvam yuktam na ātmanaḥ iti arthaḥ
deha karmaṇoḥ avidyā bhūmau bīja aṅkura vat āvartamānayoḥ ātmanā saṃbandhaḥ bhrānti kṛtaḥ eva iti āha mithyā iti
nanu yajeta eti vidhi anupapasya ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam eṣṭavyam iti
tatra āha etena iti
bhrānti kṛtena deha ādi saṃbandhena yāga ādi kartṛ tvam ā brahma bodhāt vyākhyātam iti arthaḥ
atra āhuḥ
prābhākarāḥ iti arthaḥ
bhrānti abhāvāt deha saṃbandha ādikam satyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: prasiddho jñāto vastunorbhedo yena tasya gauṇamukhyajñānāśrayatva prasiddherityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ jñātaḥ vastunoḥ bhedaḥ yena tasya gauṇa mukhya jñāna āśraya tva prasiddheḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yasya tasya puṃso gauṇau bhavatā ityanvayaḥ /

original: yadā saṃśayamūlayorna gauṇatvaṃ tadā bhrāntimūlayoḥ kiṃ vācyamityāha-yathā veti /

jīvanmuktau pramāṇam āha tathā ca iti
tat tatra jīvanmuktasya dehe

original: yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak vālmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartate,
analyzed: yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ ahi nirlvayanī sarpa tvac vālmīka ādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyakta abhimānā vartate
evam eva idam viduṣā tyakta abhimānam śarīram tiṣṭhati

original: atha tathā tvacā nirmuktasarpavadevāyaṃ dehastho 'śarīraḥ viduṣo dehe sarpasya tvacīvābhimānābhāvādaśarīratvādamṛtaḥ prāṇitīti prāṇo jīvannapi
analyzed: atha tathā tvacā nirmukta sarpa vat eva ayam deha sthaḥ śarīraḥ viduṣaḥ dehe sarpasya tvaci iva abhimāna abhāvāt aśarīra tvāt amṛtaḥ prāṇiti iti prāṇaḥ jīvan api
kim tat brahma tejaḥ svayam jyotiḥ ānandaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
vastutas cakṣuḥ api bādhita cakṣuḥ ādi anivṛtyā sa cakṣuḥ iva ityādi yojyam
iti anavadyam iti
brahma ātma jñānāt mukti lābhāt siddham vedāntānām prāmāṇyam
hita śāsanāt śāstra tvam ca sthitam iti arthaḥ

original: brahmajñānamuddiśya śravaṇavanmanananididhyāsanayorapyavāntaravākyabhedena vidhyaṅgīkārānna brahmaṇo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ uddeśyajñānalabhyatayā prādhānyādityāha-neti
analyzed: brahma jñānam uddiśya śravaṇa vat manana nididhyāsanayoḥ api avāntaravākya bhedena vidhi aṅgīkārāt na brahmaṇaḥ vidhi śeṣa tvam uddeśya jñāna labhya tayā prādhānyāt iti āhana iti
śravaṇam jñāna karaṇa vedānta gocara tvāt pradhānam
manana nididhyāsanayoḥ prameya gocara tvāt tad aṅga tvam
niyama adṛṣṭasya jñāne upayogaḥ sarva apekṣā nyāyāt iti mantavyam
tarhi jñāne vidhiḥ kimiti tyaktaḥ
tatra āha yadi hi iti

original: yadi jñāne vidhimaṅgīkṛtya vedānatairavagataṃ brahma vidheyajñāne karmakārakatvena viniyujyeta tadā vidhiśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi jñāne vidhim aṅgīkṛtya veda ānataiḥ avagatam brahma vidheya jñāne karma kāraka tvena viniyujyeta tadā vidhi śeṣa tvam syāt
na tu avagatasya viniyukta tvam asti
prāpta avagatyā phala lābhe vidhi ayogāt iti arthaḥ
tasmāt vidhi asaṃbhavāt
atas śeṣa tva asaṃbhavāt
satya ādi vākyaiḥ labdha jñānena ajñāna nivṛtti rūpa phala lābhe sati iti arthaḥ
sūtram yojayati svatantram iti
evam ca sati iti
caḥ va dhāraṇe

original: uktarītyā brahmaṇaḥ svātantrye satyeva bhagavato vyāsasya pṛthakśāstrakṛtiryuktā,
analyzed: ukta rītyā brahmaṇaḥ svātantrye sati eva bhagavataḥ vyāsasya pṛthak śāstra kṛtiḥ yuktā
dharma vilakṣaṇa prameya lābhāt
vedāntānām kārya para tve tu prameya abhedāt na yuktā iti arthaḥ
nanu mānasa dharma vicāra artham pṛthak ārambhaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha ārabhyamāṇam ca iti
atha bāhya sādhana dharma vicāra anantaram

original: ato bāhyadharmasya śuddhidvārā mānasopāsanādharmahetutvātpariśiṣṭo mānasadharmo jijñāsya iti sūtraṃ syāditi /
analyzed: atas bāhya dharmasya śuddhi dvārā mānasa upāsanā dharma hetu tvāt pariśiṣṭaḥ mānasa dharmaḥ jijñāsyaḥ iti sūtram syāt iti
atra dṛṣṭāntam āha atha iti

original: tṛtīyādhyāye śrutyādibhiḥśeṣaśeṣitvanirṇayānantaraṃ śeṣiṇāśeṣasya prayogasaṃbhavāt kaḥ kratuśeṣaḥ ko vā puruṣaśeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: tṛtīya adhyāye śruti ādibhiḥ śeṣa śeṣi tva nirṇaya anantaram śeṣiṇā aśeṣasya prayoga saṃbhavāt kaḥ kratu śeṣaḥ kaḥ vā puruṣa śeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyate iti arthaḥ
evam ārabhyeta
natvā ārabdham
tasmāt avāntara dharma artham ārambhaḥ iti ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ
sva mate sūtra ānuguṇyam asti iti aha brahma iti

original: jaimininā brahma na vicāritamiti tajjijñāsyatvasūtraṇaṃ yuktamityarathaḥ /
analyzed: jaimininā brahma na vicāritam iti tad jijñāsya tva sūtraṇam yuktam iti arathaḥ

original: vedāntārthaścedadvaitaṃ tarhi dvaitasāpekṣavidhyādīnāṃ kā gatirityāśaṅkya jñānātprāgeva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na paścādityāha-tasmāditi /
analyzed: vedānta arthaḥ ced advaitam tarhi dvaita sāpekṣa vidhi ādīnām kā gatiḥ iti āśaṅkya jñānāt prāk eva teṣām prāmāṇyam na paścāt iti āha tasmāt iti
jñānasya prameya pramātṛ bādhaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
brahma na kārya śeṣaḥ
tad bodhāt prāk eva sarva vyavahāraḥ iti atra brahma vidām gāthām udāharati api ca iti

original: sadabādhitaṃ brahma pūrvamātmā viṣayānādatta iti sarvasākṣyahamityevaṃbodhe jāte
analyzed: sat abādhitam brahma pūrvam ātmā viṣayān ādatte iti sarva sākṣī aham iti evaṃbodhe jāte
sati putra deha ādeḥ sattā bādhanāt māyā mātra tva niśyayāt putra dāra ādibhiḥ aham iti svīya duḥkha sukha bhāva tva guṇa yogāt gauṇa ātma abhimānasya

original: naro 'haṃ kartā mūḍha iti mithyātmābhimānasya ca sarvavyavahārahetorasatve kāryaṃ
analyzed: naraḥ ham kartā mūḍhaḥ iti mithyā ātma abhimānasya ca sarva vyavahāra hetoḥ asatve kāryam
vidhi niṣedha ādi vyavahāraḥ katham bhavet hetu abhāvāt na kathañcid bhavet iti arthaḥ
nanu aham brahma iti bodhaḥ bādhitaḥ
ahamarthasya pramātuḥ brahma tva ayoghāt iti āśaṅkyā pramātṛ tvasya ajñāna vilasita antaḥkaraṇa tādātmya kṛta tvāt na bādhaḥ iti aha anveṣṭavyā iti
yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā vijaraḥ vimṛtyuḥ viśokaḥ saḥ nu eṣṭavyā eti śruteḥ

original: jñātavyaparamātmavijñānātprāgevājñānācciddhātorātmānaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ pramātaiva jñātaḥ san pāpmarāgadveṣamaraṇavivarjitaḥ paramātmā syādityarthaḥ
analyzed: jñātavya paramātma vijñānāt prāk eva ajñānāt cit dhātoḥ ātmānaḥ pramātṛ tvam pramātā eva jñātaḥ san pāpma rāga dveṣa maraṇa vivarjitaḥ paramātmā syāt iti arthaḥ

original: pramātṛtvasya kalpitatve tadāśritānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇya kathamityata āha-deheti /

ap tejasoḥ tu viṣaya tvāt acetana tvam
nāma rūpa vyākaraṇa ādau ca prayojya tvena eva nirdeśāt
na ca ātma śabda vat kiñcid mukhya tve kāraṇam asti iti yuktam kūla vat gauṇa tvam īkṣitṛ tvasya

sataḥ tu ātma śabdāt na gauṇam īkṣitṛ tvam iti uktam

analyzed: anena pūrva kalpa anubhūtena jīvena ātmanā mama svarūpeṇa tāḥ anupraviśya tāsām bhogya tvāya nāma ca rūpam ca sthūlam kariṣyāmi iti aikṣata iti anvayaḥ

original: cetanavācitve tu prakaraṇaṃ śetaketupadaṃ ca niścāyakamastītyāha-prakṛtaṃ tviti /

original: 'etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomāḥ'ityarthavādena kalpitaṃ jvalanena sādṛśyam /

original: tathā ca jyotīṃṣi stomā asyeti jyotiṣṭoma ityatra jyotiḥśabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /

original: paramātmasvarūpābhede 'pyupādhibhedenopahitopāsyarūpabhedādupāsananāṃ bhede sati phalabheda iti bhāvaḥ /

original: taṃ paramātmānaṃ yadyadguṇatvena lokā rājānamivopāsate tattadguṇavatvameva teṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavati /

original: iha yādṛśadhyānavān bhavati mṛtvā tādṛśopāsyarūpo bhavati /

original: nanu sarvabhūteṣu niratiśayātmana ekatvādupāsyopāsakayostāratamyaśrutayaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya pariharati-yadyapyeka iti /
analyzed: nanu sarva bhūteṣu niratiśaya ātmanaḥ eka tvāt upāsya upāsakayoḥ tāratamya śrutayaḥ katham iti āśaṅkya pariharati yadi api ekaḥ iti
uktānām upādhīnām śuddhi tāratamyāt aiśvarya jñāna sukha rūpa śaktīnām tāratamya rūpāḥ viśeṣāḥ
bhavanti taiḥ eka rūpasya ātmanaḥ uttarottaram manuṣya ādi hiraṇyagarbha antepu āvirbhāvau atāratamyam śrūyate

original: tasyātmana ātmānaṃ svarūpamāvistarāṃ prakaṭataraṃ yo veda upāste so 'śnute taditi tarappratyayādityarthaḥ /

original: tadeva ca kṛtanirvacanaṃ nāmākṣipuruṣasyāpyatidiśati- 'yannāma tannāma' iti /

analyzed: udgātṛ pratihartṛbhyām udgīthe pratihāre ca kā devatā iti pṛṣṭena cākrāyaṇena ādityaḥ annam ca nirdiśyate

sāmānyam sannidhānam

tasya adhikaraṇasya atideśa tvam eva pūrveṇa saṃgatiḥ iti vibhāgaḥ

original: bhavantīti bhūtānīti vyutpatyā yatkiñcidbhavanadharmakaṃ kāryamātraṃ tasya layodayau
analyzed: bhavanti iti bhūtāni iti vyutpatyā yat kiñcid bhavana dharmakam kārya mātram tasya laya udayau

original: vāyuvikāre prāṇe na yuktāvityuktvā bhūtaśabdasya rūḍhārthagrahe 'pi layāderbrahmanirṇāyakatvamityāha-yadāpīti /
analyzed: vāyu vikāre prāṇe na yuktau iti uktvā bhūta śabdasya rūḍha artha grahe pi laya ādeḥ brahma nirṇāyaka tvam iti āha yadā api iti

original: atha yadā suṣupto jīvaḥ prāṇe brahamaṇyekībhavati tadā enaṃ prāṇaṃ saviṣayavāgadayo 'piyantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atha yadā suṣuptaḥ jīvaḥ prāṇe brahamaṇi ekībhavati tadā enam prāṇam sa viṣaya vāc ādayaḥ piyanti iti arthaḥ

original: atra jīvābhannatve sarvalayādhāratvaliṅgānna mukhyaḥ prāṇa ityāha-tatrāpīti /

original: ekavākyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ tasya balaṃ tadgataṃ liṅgaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: eka vākya tvam vākyaśeṣaḥ tasya balam tad gatam liṅgam tena iti arthaḥ

original: prāṇamevetyavadhāraṇena sarvabhūtaprakṛtitvaliṅgana ca prāṇapadena tatkāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣyamityāha-tadākāśaśabdasyeveti /

original: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi 'ānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' ityānandatvādīni na brahmaṇo 'nyatra samyak saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tathā upasaṃhāre pi ānandaḥ jaraḥ mṛtaḥ iti ānanda tva ādīni na brahmaṇaḥ nyatra samyak saṃbhavati

original: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati no evāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyāneṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokasya unninīṣate /
analyzed: sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyān bhavati na u eva asādhunā karmaṇā kanīyān eṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati tam yam ebhyaḥ lokasya unninīṣate

original: eṣa u bhavāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhyo 'dho ninīṣate' iti,
analyzed: eṣaḥ u bhava asādhu karma kārayati tam yam ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ dhas ninīṣate iti
eṣa loka adhipatiḥ eṣa loka īśaḥ kau iti ca
sarvam etat parasmanin brahmaṇi āśrīyamāṇe nu gantum śakyate na mukhye prāṇe
tasmāt prāṇaḥ brahma
brahma pratipādana paratvena eva padānām anvaya dṛṣṭyāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sa netyādinā dharmādyaspṛṣṭatvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ tadīśitṛtvaṃ ca sarvamuktam /
analyzed: sa na ityādinā dharma ādi a spṛṣṭa tvam tad kārayitṛ tvam tad īśitṛ tvam ca sarvam uktam
prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt

original: divodāsyāpatyaṃ daivodāsiḥ pratardano nāma rājā yuddhena puruṣakāreṇa ca karaṇenendrasya premāspadaṃ gṛhaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: divodāsya apatyam daivodāsiḥ pratardanaḥ nāma rājā yuddhena puruṣakāreṇa ca karaṇena indrasya prema āspadam gṛham jagāma
tam ha indraḥ uvāca
pratardana varam te dadāni iti
sa ha uvāca pratardanaḥ

original: yaṃ tvaṃ martyāya hitatamaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvamevālocya mahyaṃ dehīti /
analyzed: yam tvam martyāya hitatamam manyase tam varam tvam eva ālocya mahyam dehi iti
tatas indraḥ idam āha prāṇaḥ asmi ityādi
mukhyam prāṇam nirasitum prajñā ātma tvam uktam
nirviśeṣa cit mātram nirasyati tam mām iti
idam prāṇasya indri devatā tve liṅgam
mukhya prāṇa tve liṅgam āha atha iti
vāc ādīnām deha dhāraṇa śakti abhāva niścaya anantaram iti arthaḥ

original: prāṇasya dehadhārakatvamutthāpakatvaṃ ca prasiddhamiti vaktuṃ khalvityuktam /
analyzed: prāṇasya deha dhāraka tvam utthāpaka tvam ca prasiddham iti vaktum khalu iti uktam
prāṇasya jīva tve vaktṛ tvam liṅgam āhana vācam iti
ānanta tva ādikam brahma liṅgam āha ante ca iti
anekeṣu liṅgeṣu dṛśyamāneṣu balābala nirṇaya artham idam adhikaramam iti agata artham āha aneka liṅga iti
prakṛta brahma vācaka yad śabda balāt jyotiḥ śrutiḥ brahma parā iti uktam
na tathā iha prāṇa śruti bhaṅge kiñcid balam asti
mithas viruddha aneka liṅgānām aniścāyaka tvāt iti pratyudāharaṇa saṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati tatra iti

original: pūrvaṃ pradhānaprātipadikārthabalāt vibhaktyarthabādhavadvākyārthajñānaṃ prati hetutvena pradhānānekapadārthabalādekavākyatābhaṅga iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatirvāstu
analyzed: pūrvam pradhāna prātipadika artha balāt vibhakti artha bādhavat vākya artha jñānam prati hetu tvena pradhāna aneka padārtha balāt ekavākya tā bhaṅgaḥ iti dṛṣṭānta saṃgatiḥ vā astu
siddhānte pratyak brahma dhīḥ iti vivekaḥ
tathā brahma para tvena padānām anvaya avagamāt iti hetvartham āha tathā hi iti

original: hitatamatvakarmakṣayādipadārthānāṃ saṃbandho brahmaṇi tātparyaniścāyaka upalabhyata ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti-upakrama ityādinā /
analyzed: hitatama tva karma kṣaya ādi padārthānām saṃbandhaḥ brahmaṇi tātparya niścāyakaḥ upalabhyate iti uktam vivṛṇoti upakrame ityādinā

original: yaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvameva prayacchetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yam manyase tam varam tvam eva prayaccha iti arthaḥ
sa yaḥ kaścid mām brahma rūpam veda sākṣāt anubhavati

original: tasya viduṣo loko mokṣo mahatāpi pātakena na ha mīyate naiva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñānāgninā karmatūlarāśerdagdhatvādityāha-sa ya iti
analyzed: tasya viduṣaḥ lokaḥ mokṣaḥ mahatā api pātakena na ha mīyate na eva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñāna agninā karma tūla rāśeḥ dagdha tvāt iti āha sa yaḥ iti
sādhu asādhunī puṇya pāpe

original: sa eṣa vakturātmatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ brahma syāt /

original: yadi jīvamukhyaprāṇayorliṅgādupāstatvaṃ tarhi brahmaṇo 'pi liṅgānāmuktatvādupāsanaṃ syāt /

original: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,

original: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya yogādbrahmapara eva prāṇaśabda ityarthaḥ /

atra tri prakārakasya eka brahma viśeṣa ikasya ekasya upāsanasya vivakṣita tvāt iti arthaḥ
atas na vākyaḥ bhedaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

utthāpayati iti uktha tvam iti prāṇa dharmaḥ

original: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma ityupakramyoktam-'vāgeva'ityādi /

niraṅkuśam sarva niyantṛ tvam īśvarasya śrutam
tasya niyantṛ antara anumāne na anavasthā iti arthaḥ
yat vā īśvarāt bheda kalpanayā jīvasya niyantṛ tva ukteḥ satya bheda abhāvāt na anavasthā iti arthaḥ

tiṣṭhan bṛ iti kāṇvāḥ

original: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityasminstāvatpāṭhe bhavatyātmaśabdaḥ śārīrasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan iti asmin tāvat pāṭhe bhavati ātma śabdaḥ śārīrasya vācakaḥ

na dvau pratyagātmānau saṃbhavataḥ

original: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /

original: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /

original: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' itvavidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ darśayati /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tat itaraḥ itaram paśyati i tu avidyā viṣaye sarve vyavahāram darśayati

original: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ vārayati // 20 //

pradhānam karma

original: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram ātmānam tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryāḥ ityādi śruteḥ ca adṛṣṭa tva ādi dharmāḥ śārīrasya iti āhana iti
apiśabda sūcitam hetum uktvā kaṇṭha uktam hetum āha api ca ubhaye pi iti
bhedena iti sūtrāt tāttvika bheda bhrāntim nirasitum śaṅkate katham iti
nanu atra ekaḥ bhoktā jīvaḥ

original: īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā punariti /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ tu abhoktā iti na virodhaḥ iti śaṅkate kā punar iti
tayoḥ bhedaḥ śruti viruddhaḥ iti pūrvavādī āha na anyaḥ iti
saḥ eva śruti artham āha atra iti

na kevalam aprasakta pratiṣedhaḥ
kintu aviśeṣeṇa draṣṭṛ antara niṣedha śruteḥ antaryāmi antara niṣedha ārthatve bādhaḥ ca iti āha aviśeṣa iti

yaḥ ātmāni tiṣṭhan iti śrutau ca draṣṭṛ bheda uktiḥ ayuktā
na anyaḥ iti vākyaśeṣe bheda nirāsāt iti prāpte

original: bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
analyzed: bhedaḥ upādhi kalpitaḥ śruti sūtrābhyām anūdyate iti samādhatte atra ucyate iti

original: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
analyzed: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kim na syāt atas āha ekaḥ hi iti
gauraveṇa dvayoḥ ahandhī gocaratva asaṃbhāvat ekaḥ eva tad gocaraḥ

tatas ca iti

adṛśya tva adhikaraṇam sū
adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ
atha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate

original: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti  #
analyzed: yat tat a dreśyam a grāhyam a gotram a varṇam a cakṣuḥ śrotram tat a pāṇi pādam nityam vibhum sarva gatam su sūkṣmam tat avyayam yat bhūta yonim paripaśyanti
dhīrāḥ muṇḍa
iti śrūyate

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
analyzed: tatra saṃśayaḥ kim ayam adreśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ bhūtayoniḥ pradhānam syāt uta śārīraḥ āhosvit parameśvaraḥ iti
tatra pradhānam acetanam bhūta yoniḥ iti yuktam
acetanānām eva tad dṛṣṭānta tvena upādānāt

original: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: yathā ūrṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyām oṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti

original: yathā sataḥ puruṣotkeśalomāni tathākṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) iti /
analyzed: yathā sataḥ puruṣa utkeśa lomāni tathā akṣarāt saṃbhavati iha viśvam muṇḍaḥ iti
nanu ūrṇanābhiḥ puruṣaḥ ca cetanau iha dṛṣṭānta tvena upāttau
na iti brūmaḥ

original: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
analyzed: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtra yoni tvam keśa loma yoni tvam ca asti
cetanā dhiṣṭhitam hi acetanam ūrṇanābhi śarīram sūtrasya yoniḥ
puruṣa śarīram ca keśa lomnām iti prasiddham
api ca pūrvatra adṛṣṭa tva ādi abhilāṣa saṃbhave pi draṣṭṛ tva ādi abhilāṣa asaṃbhavāt na pradhānam abhyupagatam
iha tu adṛśya tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ pradhāne saṃbhavanti
na ca atra virudhyamānaḥ dharmaḥ kaścid abhilapyate
nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavid muṇḍa
iti ayam vākya śeṣaḥ cetane pradhāne na saṃbhavanti
katham pradhānam bhūta yoniḥ pratijñāyate iti

original: atrocyate- 'yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate' 'yattadadreśyam' ityakṣaraśabdenādṛśyatvādiguṇakaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śrāvayitvā punarante śrāvayiṣyati- 'akṣarātparataḥ  #
analyzed: atrā ucyate yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate yat tat adreśyam iti akṣara śabdena adṛśya tva ādi guṇakam bhūtayonim śrāvayitvā punar ante śrāvayiṣyati akṣarāt paratas
paraḥ muṇḍa iti

original: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ kṣarāt śrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarva vid saṃbhaviṣyati
pradhānam eva tu akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭam bhūtayoniḥ

original: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
analyzed: yadā tu yoni śabdaḥ nimitta vācī tadā bhūtayoniḥ syāt
dharma adharmābhyām bhūta jātasya upārjanāt iti

original: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti /
analyzed: evam prāpte abhidhīyate yaḥ yam adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvaraḥ eva syāt na anyaḥ iti
katham etat avagamyate
dharma ukteḥ

original: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti /
analyzed: parameśvarasya hi dharmaḥ iha ucyamānaḥ dṛśyate yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid iti

original: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
analyzed: nahi pradhānasya acetanasya śārīrasya vā upādhi paricchinna dṛṣṭeḥ sarvajña tvam sarva vid tvam vā saṃbhavati

original: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam /
analyzed: nanu akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭāt bhūtayoneḥ parasya eva tat sarvajñatvam ca na bhūtayoni viṣayam iti uktam
atra ucyate na evam saṃbhavati

original: yatkāraṇaṃ 'akṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' iti prakṛtaṃ bhūtayonimiha jāyamānaprakṛtitvena
analyzed: yatkāraṇam akṣarāt saṃbhavati iha viśvam iti prakṛtam bhūta yonim iha jāyamāna prakṛti tvena

original: nirdiśyānantaramapi jāyamānaprakṛtitvenaiva sarvajñaṃ nirdiśati- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: nirdiśya anantaram api jāyamāna prakṛti tvena eva sarvajñam nirdiśati yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid yasya jñāna mayam tapaḥ

original: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
analyzed: tasmāt etat brahma nāma rūpam annam ca jāyate iti

original: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
analyzed: tasmāt nirdeśa sāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt prakṛtasya eva akṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajña tvam sarva vid tvam ca dharmaḥ ucyate iti gamyate
akṣarāt paratas paraḥ iti atra api na prakṛtāt bhūtayoneḥ akṣarāt paraḥ kaścid abhidhūyate
katham etat avagamyate

original: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa. 1.2.13)
analyzed: yena akṣaram puruṣam veda satyam provāca tām tattvataḥ brahma vidyām muṇḍa

original: iti prakṛtya tasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneradṛśyatvādiguṇakasya vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt /
analyzed: iti prakṛtya tasya eva akṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ adṛśya tva ādi guṇakasya vaktavya tvena pratijñāta tvāt

original: kathaṃ tarhi 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti vyapadiśyata iti,
analyzed: katham tarhi akṣarāt paratas paraḥ iti vyapadiśyate iti
uttara sūtre tat vakṣyāmaḥ

original: apicātra dve vidye veditavye ukte- 'parā caivāparā ca' iti /
analyzed: apica atra dve vidye veditavye ukte parā ca eva aparā ca iti

original: tatrāparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāṃ vidyāmuktvā bravīti- 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate ityādi /
analyzed: tatra aparām ṛgveda ādi lakṣaṇām vidyām uktvā bravīti atha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate ityādi
tatra parasyāḥ vidyāyāḥ viṣaya tvena akṣaram śrutam

original: yadi punaḥ parameśvarādanyadadṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ parikalpyeta neyaṃ parā vidyā syāt /
analyzed: yadi punar parameśvarāt anyat adṛśya tva ādi guṇakam akṣaram parikalpyeta na iyam parā vidyā syāt
para apara vibhāgaḥ hi ayam vidyayoḥ abhyudaya niḥśreyasa phala tayā parikalpyate
na ca pradhāna vidyā niḥśreyasa phalā kenacid abhyupagamyate
tisraḥ ca vidyāḥ pratijñāyeran
tvad pakṣe kṣarāt bhūtayoneḥ parasya paramātmanaḥ pratipādyamāna tvāt

original: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe /
analyzed: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe
kasmin nu bhagavaḥ vijñāte sarvam idam vijñātam bhavati muṇḍa

original: iti caikavijñānena sarvavijñānāpekṣaṇaṃ sarvātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe 'vakalpyate,
analyzed: iti ca eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna apekṣaṇam sarva ātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe
na acetana mātra eka āyatane pradhāne
bhogya vyatirikte vā bhoktari
api ca sa brahma vidyām sarva vidyā pratiṣṭhām atharvāya jyeṣṭha putrāya prāha muṇḍa

original: iti brahmavidyāṃ prādhānyenopakramya parāparavibhāgena parāṃ vidyāmakṣarādhigamanīṃ darśayaṃstayā brahmavidyātvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: iti brahma vidyām prādhānyena upakramya para apara vibhāgena parām vidyām akṣara adhigamanīm darśayan tayā brahma vidyā tvam darśayati

original: sā ca brahmavidyāsamākhyā tadadhigamyasyākṣarasyābrahmatve bādhitā syāt /
analyzed: sā ca brahma vidyā samākhyā tad adhigamyasya akṣarasya abrahmatve bādhitā syāt
aparā ṛgveda ādi lakṣaṇā karma vidyā brahma vidyā upakrame upanyasyate brahma vidyā praśaṃsāyai

original: 'plavā hyete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktamavaraṃ yeṣu karma /
analyzed: plavāḥ hi ete adṛḍhāḥ yajña rūpāḥ aṣṭādaśa uktam avaram yeṣu karma

original: etacchreyo yo 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punarevāpiyanti' (muṇḍa. 1.2.7)
analyzed: etat śreyaḥ yaḥ bhinandanti mūḍhāḥ jarā mṛtyum te punar eva apiyanti muṇḍa
iti evamādi nindā vacanāt

original: ninditvā cāparāṃ vidyāṃ tato viraktasya paravidyādhikāraṃ darśayati- 'parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena /
analyzed: ninditvā ca aparām vidyām tatas viraktasya para vidyā adhikāram darśayati parīkṣya lokān karma citān brāhmaṇaḥ nirvedam āyāt na asti akṛtaḥ kṛtena

original: tadvijñānārthaṃ sa gurumevābhigacchetsamitpāṇiḥ śretriyaṃ brahmaniṣṭham' (muṇḍa. 1.2.12) iti /
analyzed: tad vijñāna artham sa gurum eva abhigacchet samidh pāṇiḥ śretriyam brahma niṣṭham muṇḍaḥ iti
yat tu uktam acetanānām pṛthivī ādīnām dṛṣṭānta tvena upādānāt dārṣṭāntikena api acetanena bhūtayoninā bhavitavyam iti
tat ayuktam
nahi dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭāntikayoḥ atyanta sāmyena bhavitavyam iti

original: apica sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayo dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā iti na sthūla eva dārṣṭāntiko bhūtayonirabhyupagamyate /
analyzed: apica sthūlāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena upāttāḥ iti na sthūlaḥ eva dārṣṭāntikaḥ bhūtayoniḥ abhyupagamyate

original: pañcamyantākṣaraśrutyā bhūtaprakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānātprathamāntaparaśabdoktasya jagannimitteśvarasya sarvajñatvādikamityāha-atrocyata iti /
analyzed: pañcamī anta akṣara śrutyā bhūta prakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānāt prathama anta para śabda uktasya jagat nimitta īśvarasya sarvajñatva ādikam iti āha atra ucyate iti

original: 'saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt'iti nyāyena siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
analyzed: saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt iti nyāyena siddhāntayati evam prāptaḥ iti

original: cetanācetanatvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ,
analyzed: cetana acetana tvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti vākya śeṣāt īśvara tva nirṇayaḥ iti ayuktam
vākya śeṣe bhūtayoneḥ pratyabhijñāpaka abhāvāt iti śaṅkate nanu iti
jani kartṛḥ prakṛtiḥ iti sūtreṇa prakṛteḥ apādāna saṃjñāyām pañcamī smaraṇāt akṣarāt saṃbhavati iti
prakṛti tvena uktā akṣarasya bhūtayoniḥ vākyaśeṣe tasmāt iti prakṛti tva liṅgena pratyabhijñānam asti iti
samādhatte atra ucyate iti
etat kāryam brahma sūkṣma ātmakam nāma rūpam
sthūlam tatas nnam vrīhi ādi iti arthaḥ
yat uktam pañcamī anta akṣara śrutyā bhūtayoneḥ pratyabhijñāna da cetana tvam iti
tatra āha akṣarāt paratas iti
na ayam akṣara śabdaḥ bhūtayonim parāmṛśati

original: paravidyādhigamyatvenoktasyākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ 'akṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ vedā'ityakṣaraśrutyā vedyatvaliṅgavatyā pūrvameva brahmatvena parāmarśādityāha-yeneti
analyzed: para vidyā adhigamya tvena uktasya akṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ akṣaram puruṣam veda iti akṣara śrutyā vedya tva liṅgavatyā pūrvam eva brahmatvena parāmarśāt iti āha yena iti

original: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya
analyzed: yena jñānena akṣaram bhūta yonim sarvajñam puruṣam veda tām brahma vidyām yogyāya śiṣyāya
prabrūyāt iti upakramya aprāṇaḥ hi amanāḥ śubhraḥ akṣarāt paratas paraḥ iti ucyamānaḥ
paras bhūtayoniḥ iti gamyate iti arthaḥ

original: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
analyzed: tarhi pañcamī anta akṣara śabda arthaḥ kaḥ iti āśaṅkya ajñānam iti vakṣyate iti āha katham iti
para vidyā iti samākhyayā api tad viṣayasya brahma tvam iti āha api ca iti
nanu pradhāna vidyā api kāraṇa viṣaya tvāt parā iti atas āha para apara vibhāgaḥ iti

original: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anitya phalatvena apara vidyām ninditvā mukti arthine brahma vidyām provāca iti vākya śeṣa ukteḥ iti arthaḥ
astu pradhānavidyā api mukti phalatvena parā iti atas āha na ca iti
nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti agre para vidyā viṣayaḥ ucyate
adreśya vākyena tu pradhāna vidyā ucyate iti atas āha tisraḥ ca iti
itas ca bhūtayoneḥ brahmatvam iti āha kasmin iti

original: acetanamātrasyaikāyatanamupādānaṃ tajjñānātkāryajñāne 'pi tadakāryāṇāmātmanāṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: acetana mātrasya eka āyatanam upādānam tad jñānāt kārya jñāne pi tat akāryāṇām ātmanām jñānam na bhavati

original: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam jīve jñāte tat akāryasya bhogyasya jñānam na bhavati iti arthaḥ
brahmavidyā śabdāt ca bhūtayoniḥ brahma iti āha api ca iti

original: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
analyzed: sa brahma vidyām sarva vidyānām pratiṣṭhām samāpti bhūmim brahma vidyām uvāca
brahmaṇi sarva vidyānām vidyā phalānām ca antarbhāvāt brahmavidyā sarva vidyā pratiṣṭhā
nanu apara vidyā para prakaraṇe kimartham uktā iti atas āha aparā iti

original: etadeva karma śreyo nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /

athavā bhūtāgneḥ antar bahis ca avatiṣṭhamānasya eṣa nirdeśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3)
analyzed: tathā śrutam hi eva me bhagavat dṛśebhyaḥ tarati śokam ātma vid iti saḥ ham bhagavaḥ śocāmi tam mā bhagavān śokasya pāram tārayatu chām
iti prakaraṇa utthānāt paramātmā bhūmā iti api pratibhāti

original: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kasya upādanam nyāyyam kasya vā hānam iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ
kim tāvat prāptam
prāṇaḥ bhūmā iti
kasmāt
bhūyas praśna prativacana paraṃparā darśanāt

original: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti,
analyzed: yathā hi asti bhagavaḥ nāmnaḥ bhūyaḥ iti
vāc vāva nāmnaḥ bhūyasī iti
tathā asti bhagavaḥ nāmnaḥ bhūyaḥ iti

original: mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ vāva vācaḥ bhūyaḥ iti ca nāma ādibhyaḥ prāṇāt bhūyaḥ praśna prativacana pravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ

original: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
analyzed: na evam prāṇāt param bhūyaḥ praśna prativacanam dṛśyate sti bhagavaḥ prāṇāt bhūyaḥ iti adaḥ vāva prāṇāt bhūyaḥ iti

original: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān' ityādinā saprapañcamuktvā
analyzed: prāṇam eva tu nāma ādibhyaḥ āśā antebhyaḥ bhūyāsam prāṇaḥ vai āśāyāḥ bhūyān ityādinā sa prapañcam uktvā
prāṇa darśinaḥ ca ativādi tvam ativādyasi iti ativādyasmi iti brūyāt na apahnuvīta iti abhyanujñāya

original: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva
analyzed: eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti prāṇa vratam ativādi tvam anukṛṣya a parityajya eva

original: prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
analyzed: prāṇam satya ādi paramparayā bhūmānam avatārayan prāṇam eva bhūmānam manyante iti gamyate

original: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetadbhūmno lakṣaṇaparaṃ vacanaṃ vyākhyāyeteti /
analyzed: katham punar prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne yatra na anyat paśyati iti etat bhūmnaḥ lakṣaṇa param vacanam vyākhyāyeta iti

original: ucyate- suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ prāṇagrasteṣu karaṇeṣu darśanādivyavahāranivṛttidarśanātsaṃbhavati prāṇasyāpi 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetallakṣaṇam
analyzed: ucyate suṣupti avasthāyām prāṇa grasteṣu karaṇeṣu darśana ādi vyavahāra nivṛtti darśanāt saṃbhavati prāṇasya api yatra na anyat paśyati iti etat lakṣaṇam

original: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā 'prāṇāgnaya evaitasminpure jāgrati'  #
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ na śṛṇoti na paśyati ityādinā sarva karaṇa vyāpāra prati astamaya rūpām suṣupti avasthām uktvā prāṇa agnayaḥ eva etasmin pure jāgrati  /
pra

original: iti tasyāmevāvasthāyāṃ pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
analyzed: iti tasyām eva avasthāyām pañca vṛtteḥ prāṇasya jāgaraṇam bruvatī prāṇa pradhānām suṣupti avasthām darśayati

original: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23)
analyzed: yat ca etat bhūmnaḥ sukha tvam śrutam yaḥ vai bhūmā tat sukham chā
iti tat api aviruddham

original: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati' (pra. 4.6)
analyzed: atra eṣa devaḥ svapnāt na paśyati atha yat etasmin śarīre sukham bhavati pra
iti suṣupti avasthāyām eva sukha śravaṇāt
yat ca yaḥ vai bhūmā tat amṛtam chā
iti tat api prāṇasya a viruddham
prāṇaḥ vai amṛtam kau iti śruteḥ

original: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate /
analyzed: katham punar prāṇam bhūmānam manyamānasya tarati śokam ātma vid iti ātma vividiṣayā prakaraṇasya utthānam upapadyate
prāṇaḥ eva iha ātmā vivakṣitaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1)
analyzed: tathā hi prāṇaḥ ha pitā prāṇaḥ mātā prāṇaḥ bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇaḥ ācāryaḥ prāṇaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ chā
iti prāṇam eva sarva ātmānam karoti

original: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā  #
analyzed: yathā vai arāḥ nābhau samarpitāḥ evam asmin prāṇe sarvam samarpitam iti ca sarva ātma tva ara nābhi nidarśanābhyām ca saṃbhavati vaipulya ātmikā bhūma rūpa tā
prāṇasya
tasmāt prāṇaḥ bhūmā iti evam prāptam

original: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas idam ucyate paramātmā eva iha bhūmā bhavitum arhati na prāṇaḥ
kasmāt
saṃprasādāt adhyupadeśāt
saṃprasādaḥ iti suṣuptam sthānam ucyate
samyak prasīdati asmin iti nirvacanāt

original: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
analyzed: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapna jāgarita sthānābhyām saha pāṭhāt tasyām ca saṃprasāda avasthāyām prāṇaḥ jāgarti iti saṃprasādaḥ abhipreyate
prāṇāt ūrdhvam bhūmnaḥ upadiśyamāna tvāt iti arthaḥ
prāṇaḥ eva ced bhūmā āsyāt saḥ eva tasmāt ūrdhvam upadiśyeta iti aśliṣṭam eva etat syāt

original: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
analyzed: nahi nāma eva nāmnaḥ bhūyaḥ iti nāmnaḥ ūrdhvam upadiṣṭam

original: kiṃ tarhi nāmno 'nyadarthāntaramupadiṣṭaṃ vāgākhyam- 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
analyzed: kim tarhi nāmnaḥ vāc ākhyam vāc vāva nāmnaḥ bhūyasī iti
tathā vāc ādibhyaḥ prāṇāt artha antaram eva tatra tatra ūrdhvam upadiṣṭam
tadvat prāṇāt ūrdhvam upadiśyamānaḥ bhūmā prāṇāt artha antara bhūtaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti,
analyzed: nanu iha na asti praśnaḥ u sti bhagavaḥ prāṇāt bhūyaḥ iti
na api prativacanam asti prāṇāt vā ava bhūyaḥ sti iti
katham prāṇāt adhi bhūmā upadiśyate

original: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
analyzed: prāṇa viṣayam eva ca ativādi tvām uttaratra anukṛṣyamāṇam paśyāmaḥ eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti
tasmāt na asti prādadhyupadeśaḥ iti
atrā ucyate na tāvat prāṇa viṣayasya eva ativādi tvasya etat anukarṣaṇam iti śakyam vaktum
viśeṣa vādāt yaḥ satyena ativadati iti
nanu viśeṣa vādaḥ pi ayam prāṇa viṣayaḥ eva bhaviṣyati
katham

original: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
analyzed: yathā eṣaḥ gnihotrī yaḥ satyam vadati iti ukte na satya vadanena agnihotri tvam

original: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam,
analyzed: tathā eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti ukte na satya vadanena ativādi tvam
kena tarhi
prakṛtena prāṇa vijñānena eva

original: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
analyzed: satya vadanam tu prāṇa vidaḥ viśeṣaḥ vivakṣyate iti
na iti brūmaḥ
śruti artha parityāga prasaṅgāt

original: śrutyā hyatra satyavadanenātivāditvaṃ pratīyate- 'yaḥsatyenātivadati so 'tivadati' iti /
analyzed: śrutyā hi atra satya vadanena ativādi tvam pratīyate yaḥ satyena ativadati saḥ u tivadati iti
na atra prāṇa vijñānasya saṃkīrtanam asti
prakaraṇāt tu prāṇa vijñānam saṃbadhyeta
tatra prakaraṇa anurodhena śrutiḥ parityaktā syāt

original: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
analyzed: prakṛta vyāvṛtti arthaḥ ca tuśabdaḥ na saṃgacchate eṣa tu vai ativadati iti
satyam tu eva vijijñāsitavyam chā
iti ca prayatna antara karaṇam artha antara vivakṣām sūcayati

original: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam
analyzed: tasmāt yathā eka veda praśaṃsāyām prakṛtāyām eṣa tu mahā brāhmaṇaḥ yaḥ caturaḥ vedān adhītaḥ iti eka vedebhyaḥ ṛtha antara bhūtaḥ catur vedaḥ praśasyate tādṛś etat draṣṭavyam
na ca praśna prativacana rūpayā eva artha antara vivakṣayā bhavitavyam iti
prakṛta saṃbandha asaṃbhava kārita tvāt artha antara vivakṣāyāḥ

original: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
analyzed: tatra prāṇāntam anuśāsanam śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtam nāradam svayam eva sanatkumāraḥ vyutpādayati

original: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
analyzed: yat prāṇa vijñānena vikāra anṛta viṣayeṇa ativādi tvam anativādi tvam eva tat eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti
tatra satyam iti param brahma ucyate
paramārtha rūpa tvāt
satyam jñānam anantam brahma taiḥ
iti ca śruti antarāt

original: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
analyzed: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya saḥ ham bhagavaḥ satyena ativadāni iti evam pravṛttāya vijñāna ādi sādhana paramparayā bhūmānam upadiśati

original: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
analyzed: tatra yat prāṇāt adhi satyam vaktavyam pratijñātam tat eva iha bhūmā iti ucyate iti gamyate

original: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tasmāt asti prāṇāt adhi bhūmnaḥ upadeśaḥ iti atas prāṇāt anyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitum arhati
evam ca iha ātma vividiṣayā prakaraṇasya utthānam upapannam bhaviṣyati
prāṇaḥ eva iha ātmā vivakṣitaḥ iti etat api na upapadyate
nahi prāṇasya mukhyayā vṛttyā ātma tvam asti
na ca anyatra paramātma jñānāt śoka vinivṛttiḥ asti
na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate yanāya śve
iti śruti antarāt
tam mā bhagavān śokasya pāram tārayatu chā

original: iti copakramyopasaṃharati- 'tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāraṃ darśayati bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ' (chā. 7.26.2) iti /
analyzed: iti ca upakramya upasaṃharati tasmai mṛdita kaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāram darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ chā iti
tamaḥ iti śoka ādi kāraṇam avidyā ucyate

bhūmā
chāndogyam udāharati idam iti
na alpe sukham asti bhūmā eva sukham

original: tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt niratiśaya sukha arthinā bhūmā eva vicāryaḥ iti nāradam prati sanatkumāreṇa ukte sati nāradaḥ brūte bhūmānam iti
bhūmnaḥ lakṣaṇam advitīya tvam āha yatra iti
bhūma lakṣaṇam paricchinna lakṣaṇa uktyā sphuṭayati atha iti
atra saṃśaya bījam praśna pūrvakam āha kutas ityādinā

original: bahorbhāva iti vigrahe 'pṛthvādibhyā imanic'itīmanpratyaye kṛte 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya  #
analyzed: bahoḥ bhāvaḥ iti vigrahe pṛthu ādibhyāḥ imanic iti iman pratyaye kṛte bahoḥ lopaḥ bhū ca bahoḥ iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasya imanic pratyayasya ādeḥ ikārasya
lepaḥ syāt

original: bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ /
analyzed: bahoḥ sthāne bhūḥ iti ādeśaḥ ca syāt iti ukteḥ bhūman iti śabdaḥ niṣpannaḥ
tasya bhāva artha keman pratyaya anta tvāt bahu tvam vācyam
tat kindharmikam iti ākāṅkṣāyām saṃnihita prakaraṇa sthaḥ prāṇaḥ dharmaḥ bhāti

original: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vākya upakrama sthaḥ ātmā api sva pratipādana apekṣaḥ dharmi tvena bhāti iti saṃnihita vyavahita prakaraṇābhyām saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ
pūrvam ātma śabdāt dyu bhū ādi āyatanam brahma iti uktam
tat ayuktam
tarati śokam ātma vit iti a brahmaṇi api ātma śabda prayogāt iti ākṣepa saṃgatyā pūrvapakṣyati prāṇaḥ bhūmā iti
dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭavyam

original: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam /
analyzed: pūrva uttarapakṣayoḥ prāṇa upāstiḥ brahma jñānam ca phalam krameṇa mantavyam
atra adhyāye bhūyas praśna uttara bhedāt artha bhedaḥ dṛśyate

original: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna ityāha-kasmādityādinā /
analyzed: bhūmā tu prāṇāt param bhūyaḥ prakṣam vinā eva ukta liṅgena prāṇāt abhinnaḥ iti āha kasmāt ityādinā

original: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇāt bhūyaḥ iti na dṛśyate iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ

original: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo bhūmetyata āha-prāṇameveti /
analyzed: nanu eṣa tu vai ativadati iti tuśabdena prāṇa prakaraṇa vicchedāt na prāṇaḥ bhūmā iti atas āha prāṇam eva iti

original: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
analyzed: nāma ādya śāntān upāsyān atītya prāṇam śreṣṭham vadati iti ativādi prāṇa vid tam prati ativādī asi iti kenacid praśne kṛte asmi iti brūyāt
na aham ativādī iti apahnavam na kuryāt iti uktam

original: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa vidam eṣaḥ iti parāmṛśya satya vacana dhyāna manana śraddhā ādi dharma paramparām vidhāya bhūma upadeśāt na prakaraṇa vicchedaḥ
tuśabdaḥ nāma ādi upāsakasya ativādi tva nirāsa arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā /
analyzed: bhūmnaḥ lakṣaṇa vacanam sukha tvam amṛta tvam ca prāṇe praśna pūrvakam yojayati katham punar ityādinā

original: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa grasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣupta puruṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ
analyzed: gārhapatyaḥ ha vai eṣa u pānaḥ vyānaḥ nvāhāryapacanaḥ āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ iti śruteḥ prāṇāḥ agnayaḥ iha pure śarīre jāgrati sa vyāpārāḥ eva tiṣṭhanti iti arthaḥ
devaḥ jīvaḥ
atha tadā svapna adarśana kāle sukha śravaṇāt prāṇasya sukha tvam aviruddham iti anvayaḥ

original: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
analyzed: sarvam samarpitam iti ca sarva adhiṣṭhānam prāṇam svīkaroti śrutiḥ iti anvayaḥ atas ātma tvam mukhya artham darśayati saṃprasādaḥ iti

original: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /

atra sūtre iti arthaḥ

original: tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśa eva daharaśabda iti prāptam /
analyzed: tatra ākāśa śabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍha tvāt bhūtākāśaḥ eva dahara śabdaḥ iti prāptam
tasya ca dahara āyatana apekṣayā dahara tvam

original: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' iti ca bāhyāyantarabhāvakṛtabhedasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivyādi ca tasminnantaḥ samāhitaṃ,
analyzed: yāvān vai ayam ākāśaḥ tāvān eṣaḥ ntarhadayaḥ ākāśaḥ iti ca bāhya āyantara bhāva kṛta bhedasya upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivya ādi ca tasmin antar samāhitam
avakāśa ātmanā ākāśasya eka tvāt
athavā jīvaḥ daharaḥ iti prāptam
brahma pura śabdāt

bhaktyā ca tasya brahma śabda vācya tvam

original: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
analyzed: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa sva svāmi bhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sti

original: tatra purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśe 'vasthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rājñaḥ /

manaupādhikaḥ ca jīvaḥ

original: ata uttaraṃ brūmaḥ- parameśvara evātra daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo vā /
analyzed: atas uttaram brūmaḥ parameśvaraḥ eva atra daharākāśaḥ bhavitum arhati na bhūtākāśaḥ jīvaḥ vā

original: 'sa brūyādyavānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3) ityādi /

original: tatra puṇḍarīkadaharatvena prāptadaharatvasyākāśasya prasiddhākāśaupamyena daharatvaṃ nivartayanbhūtākāśatvaṃ daharasyākāśasya nivartayatīti  #
analyzed: tatra puṇḍarīka dahara tvena prāpta dahara tvasya ākāśasya prasiddha ākāśa aupamyena dahara tvam nivartayan bhūtākāśa tvam daharasya ākāśasya nivartayati iti

nanu ekasya api ākāśasya bāhya abhyantara tva kalpitena bhedena upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati iti uktam

original: 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurvīśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti cātmatvāpahatapāpmatvādayaśca guṇā na bhūtākāśe  #

original: nahyupādhiparicchinnasyārāgropamitasya jīvasya puṇḍarīkaveṣṭhanakṛtaṃ daharatvaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum /

original: yadapyuktaṃ brahmapuramiti jīvena parasyopalakṣitatvādrājña iva jīvasyaivedaṃ purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśavartitvamastviti /

original: tatrahi 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' ityapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca pratijñāya 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa
analyzed: tatra hi yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā iti apahata pāpma tva ādi guṇakam ātmānam anveṣṭavyam vijijñāsitavyam ca pratijñāya yaḥ eṣa u kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate eṣa
iti bruvan nakṣi stham draṣṭāram jīvam ātmānam nirdiśati

original: iti ca tameva punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśya 'ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaścaratyeṣa ātmā' (chā. 8.10.1)

analyzed: iti tat yatra etat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnam na vijānāti eṣaḥ ātmā iti ca jīvam eva avasthā antara gatam vyācaṣṭe
tasya eva ca apahata pāpma tva ādi darśayati etat amṛtam abhayam etat brahma iti

original: nāhaṃ khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni' (chā. 8.11.1,2)

original: iti ca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ doṣamupalabhya 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt
analyzed: iti ca suṣupta avasthāyām doṣam upalabhya etam tu eva te bhūyas nuvyākhyāsyāmi no eva anyatra etasmāt

original: ataḥ 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti jīva evokta iti cetkaścidbrūyāt,

original: yadasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma tadrūpatayainaṃ jīvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na jaivena rūpeṇa /

original: tathā dehādyupādhyaviviktasyaiva sato jīvasya śrutikṛtaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ vivekavijñānaphalaṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ kevalātmasvarūpāvagatiḥ

original: tathā dvitīye 'pi paryāye 'ya eṣaḥ svapne mahīyamānaścarati' iti na prathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭādakṣipuruṣāddraṣṭuranyo nirdiṣṭaḥ,

etam tu eva te bhūyas nuvyākhyāsyāmi iti upakramāt

original: kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamadrākṣaṃ nedānīṃ taṃ paśyāmīti dṛṣṭameva pratibuddhaḥ pratyācaṣṭe /

original: yattu tatra 'vināśamevāpīto bhavati' iti tadapi viśeṣavijñānavināśābhiprāyameva na vijñātṛvināśābhiprāyam /

na hi vijñātuḥ vijñāteḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate vināśi tvāt bṛ
iti śruti antarāt

analyzed: tathā caturthe pi paryāye etam tu eva te bhūyas nuvyākhyāsyāmi na u eva anyatra etasmāt

analyzed: saṃprasāda śabda uditam jīvam svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti brahma svarūpa āpannam darśayan na

original: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te  #

teṣām etam iti saṃnihita avalambinī sarvanāma śrutiḥ viprakṛṣyeta

original: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /

original: tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā pratipādyate,

original: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca kecit /

original: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /

original: yattvidaṃ parameśvaravākye jīvamāśaṅkhya pratiṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ - 'nāsaṃbhavāt' (bra.1.3.18) ityādinā /

deva ādi vyakti hetutvena prāk eva śabdānām sattvāt na anitya tvam iti bhāvaḥ
atra pūrva apara virodham śaṅkate nanu iti

original: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti /
analyzed: śabdasya nimitta tvena brahma sahakāri tvāt avirodhaḥ iti āśaṅkya dvitīyam kalpam utthāpayati api ca iti
anitya tvam sa ādi tvam
vyakti rūpa arthānām anitya tayā śabdānām saṃbandhasya anitya tvam durvāram
tasmāt pauruṣeya saṃbandha sāpekṣa tvāt prāmāṇya virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: naca vyaktināmanityatve 'pi ghaṭatvādijātisamavāyavacchabdasaṃbandho 'pi nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ,
analyzed: naca vyaktinām anitya tve pi ghaṭa tva ādi jāti samavāya vat śabda saṃbandhaḥ pi nityaḥ syāt iti vācyam
ubhaya āśrita saṃbandhasya anyatara abhāve sthiti ayogena dṛṣṭānta asidveḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā /
analyzed: yathā go tva ādayaḥ gavā ādi śabda vācyāḥ tathā vasu tva ādi ākṛtayaḥ vasu ādi śabda arthāḥ na vyaktyaḥ iti pariharati na ityādinā

original: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā /
analyzed: śabdānām tad arthānām jātīnām ca nitya tvāt tad saṃbandhaḥ api nityaḥ iti pratipādayati nahi ityādinā
vyakti nāma ānantyāt iti

original: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
analyzed: naca go tva avacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugrahā iti vācyam

original: gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
analyzed: go tvam śakya tā avacchedakam iti graha apekṣayā go tvam śakyam iti lāghavāt
nirūḍha ajahat lakṣaṇayā vyakteḥ lābhena anya labhya tva abhāvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ
yat vā kevala vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ atra nirasyate
vinā eva vyakteḥ śabda śakti āyatta jāti jñāna viṣaya tvena ubhaya śakteḥ āvaśyaka tvāt
tathāca nitya jāti tādātmyena vyakteḥ anādi tvāt tad saṃbandhaḥ pi anādiḥ
satkārya vādāt

original: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
analyzed: atas eva vākya vṛttau tattvamasi ādi vākye bhāga lakṣaṇa uktā yujyate
atas prabhavāt iti sūtra svārasyāt ca kevala vyakti śakti nirāsaḥ iti gamyate

original: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu
analyzed: kevala vyakti vacanāḥ khalu ḍittha ādi śabdāḥ artha anantara bhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ go ādi śabdāḥ tu

original: vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti
analyzed: vyakti prabhava hetu tvena prāk eva sandhi iti na vyakti mātra vacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūla sūkṣma bhāvena anusyūta vyakti avinābhūta sāmānya vacanāḥ iti
na ca indra ādi vyakteḥ ekatvena jāti abhāvāt ākāśa śabda vat indra candra ādi śabdaḥ kevala vyakti vacanāḥ iti sāṃpratam
atīta anāgata vyakti bhedena jāti upapatteḥ iti alam prapañcena
dṛṣṭāntam upasaṃhṛtya dārṣṭāntikam āha vyaktiṣu ityādinā ākṛtiḥ jātiḥ
nanu kā sā vyaktiḥ
yat anugata indra tva ādi jātiḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt iti atas āha ākṛti viśeṣaḥ tu iti
vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ ityādibhyaḥ iti arthaḥ
indra ādi śabdānām jātiḥ indra ādiṣu pravṛtti nimittam iti uktvā upādhi nimittam āha sthāna iti
vyakti pralaye pi sthānasya sthāyi tvāt śabda artha saṃbandha nitya tā iti atas āha tatas ca iti
uktam pūrva apara virodham pariharati na ca iti
śabdaḥ nimittam iti avirodham matvā sūtra śeṣam avatārayati katham punar iti
smṛtyā sva prāmāṇya artham mūlaśrutiḥ anumīyate iti anumānam smṛtiḥ
ete asṛgram indavaḥ tiras pavitram āśavaḥ
viśvāni asya abhisaubhagā
iti etat mantra sthaiḥ padaiḥ smṛtvā brahmā deva ādīn asṛjat
tatra ete iti padam sarvanāma tvāt devānām smārakam

original: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
analyzed: asṛj rudhiram tad pradhāne dehe ramante iti asṛj rāḥ manuṣyāḥ
candra sthānām pitṛṇām indu śabdaḥ smārakaḥ

original: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
analyzed: pavitram somam su antar tiraskurvatām grahāṇām tiras pavitra śabdaḥ
ṛcaḥ śruvatām stotrāṇām gīti rūpāṇām āśu śabdaḥ
ṛci adhyūḍham sāma eti śruteḥ
stotra anantaram prayogam viśatām śāstrāṇām viśva śabdaḥ
sarvatra saubhāgya yuktānām abhisaubhaga śabdaḥ smārakaḥ iti chandoga brāhmaṇa vākya arthaḥ

original: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
analyzed: sa prajāpatiḥ manasā vācam trayīm mithunam samabhavat manaḥ vāc rūpam mithunam saṃbhāvitavān
manasā trayī prakāśitām sṛṣṭim ālocitavān iti arthaḥ
raśmiḥ iti eva ādityam asṛjata eti ādi śrutiḥ ādi śabda arthaḥ
saṃpradāyaḥ guru śiṣya paramparā adhyayanam
saṃsthāḥ avasthāḥ
yā prajāpati sṛṣṭiḥ sā śabda pūrvikā
sṛṣṭi tvāt
pratyakṣa ghaṭa ādi vat iti pratyakṣa anumānābhyām iti asya ārta antaram āha api ca iti
atas prabhava tva prasaṅgāt śabda svarūpam vaktum uktam ākṣipati kimātmakam iti
varṇa rūpam tad atirikta sphoṭa rūpam vā iti kim śabda arthaḥ

original: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
analyzed: tatra varṇānām anitya tvāt sphoṭasya ca asattvāt na jagat hetutvam iti ākṣepe dvitīya pakṣam vaiyākaraṇaḥ gṛhṇāti sphoṭam iti

original: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
analyzed: sphuṭyate varṇaiḥ vyajyate iti sphoṭaḥ varṇa abhivyaṅgyaḥ arthaḥ tasya vyañjakaḥ gavādi śabdaḥ nityaḥ tam abhipretya idam ucyate iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ
saḥ eva ādya pakṣam dūṣayati varṇa iti

original: so 'yaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñayā varṇanityatvasiddhernānupapattirityata āha-utpanneti /
analyzed: saḥ yam gakāraḥ iti pratyabhijñayā varṇa nitya tva siddheḥ na anupapattiḥ iti atas āha utpanna iti

original: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ
analyzed: tāra tva mandra tva ādi viruddha dharmavat tvena tāraḥ gakāraḥ mandraḥ gakāraḥ iti pratīyamāna gakārasya bheda anumānāt pratyabhijñā ga tva jāti viṣayā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
analyzed: nanu viruddha dharma jñānam dhvani upādhikam bhramaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti

original: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
analyzed: tathāca varṇānām anitya tvāt na jagat hetutvam iti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣām artha bodhaka tva ayogāt sphoṭaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ iti āha na ca varṇebhyaḥ ityādinā
vyabhicārāt ekasmāt varṇāt artha pratīti adarśanāt
varṇa antara vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca iti arthaḥ

original: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa nāstītyāha-naceti /
analyzed: tarhi varṇānām samudāyaḥ bodhakaḥ iti āśaṅkya kṣaṇikānām sa na asti iti āha na ca iti

original: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti /
analyzed: varṇānām svatas sāhitya abhāve pi saṃskāra lakṣaṇa apūrva dvārā sāhityam āgneya ādi yāgānām iva iti śaṅkate pūrva iti
kim ayam saṃskāraḥ varṇaiḥ janitaḥ pūrva ākhyaḥ kaścid
uta varṇa anubhava janitaḥ bhāvanā ākhyaḥ
na ādyaḥ māna abhāvāt
kiñca ayam ajñātaḥ jñātaḥ vā artha dhī hetuḥ
na ādyaḥ iti āha tat na iti
saṃskāra sahitaḥ śabdaḥ jñātaḥ eva artha dhī hetuḥ
saṃbandha grahaṇam apekṣya bodhaka tvāt
dhūma ādi vat iti arthaḥ

original: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
analyzed: dvitīye kim pratyakṣeṇa jñātaḥ uta kārya liṅgena
na ādyaḥ iti āha na ca iti
dvitīyam śaṅkate kāryā iti

original: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti /
analyzed: kāryam artha dhīḥ tasyām jātāyām saṃskāra pratyayaḥ tasmin jāte sā iti paraspara āśrayeṇa dūṣayati na iti

original: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
analyzed: padārtha smaraṇasya api pada jñāna antara bhāvi tvāt tena saṃskāra sahita antya varṇa ātmaka padasya jñānam na yuktam iti akṣara arthaḥ
api śabdaḥ paraspara āśraya dyotana arthaḥ
etena nirastaḥ
tasya varṇa smṛti mātra hetu tvena artha dhī hetu tva ayogāt
na ca antya varṇa sāhityāt artha dhī hetu tvam
kevala saṃskārasya tu varṇa smṛti hetu tvam iti vācyam
artha dhī pūrva kāle bhāvanāyāḥ jñāna abhāvena artha dhī hetu tva ayogāt
na ca varṇa smaraṇena anumitā sā antya varṇa sahita artha dhī hetuḥ iti vācyam
tad kāryasya kramikasya varṇa smaraṇasya api antya varṇa anubhava anantara bhāvi tvena tena anumita bhāvanānām antya varṇa sāhitya abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
varṇānām artha bodhaka tva saṃbhave phalam āha tasmāt iti

original: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /
analyzed: sphoṭe pi kim mānam iti āśaṅkya ekam padam iti pratyakṣa pramāṇam iti āha sa ca iti

original: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
analyzed: yathā ratna tattvam bahubhiḥ cākṣuṣa pratyayaiḥ sphuṭam bhāsate tathā gavādi pada sphoṭaḥ

original: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
analyzed: gakāra di ekaika varṇa kṛta pratyayaiḥ sphoṭa viṣayaiḥ āhitāḥ saṃskārāḥ bījam yasmin citte
tasmin antya varṇa kṛta pratyayena janitaḥ paripākaḥ ntyaḥ saṃskāraḥ yasmin tasmin pratyayini

original: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: citte ekam gauḥ iti padam iti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tad viṣaya tayā spaṣṭam avabhāsate iti arthaḥ
anena varṇa anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sphoṭa jñāne nyathā siddhiḥ
na ca ekasmāt varṇāt samyak sphoṭa abhivyaktiḥ

original: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yena varṇa antara vaiyarthyam kintu ratna vat bahu pratyaya saṃskṛte citte samyak sphoṭa abhivyaktiḥ iti uktam bhavati
nanu eka padam ekam vākyam iti pratyayaḥ pada vākya sphoṭayoḥ na pramāṇam
tasya varṇa samūha ālambana smṛti tvāt iti āśaṅkya niṣedhati na ca iti
sphoṭasya jagat hetu tva artham nitya tvam āhatasya ca iti
nanu tat eva idam padam iti pratyabhijñā bhramaḥ
udātta ādi bheda pratyayāt iti atas āha bheda iti
ācārya saṃpradāya ukti pūrvakam siddhāntayati varṇāḥ eva iti
varṇa atirikta sphoṭa ātmaka śabdasya anubhava anārohāt iti arthaḥ
sādṛśya doṣāt iyam bhrāntiḥ iti śaṅkate sādṛśyāt iti

original: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ,
analyzed: vapana anantaram te eva ime keśāḥ iti dhīḥ bhrāntiḥ iti yuktam
bheda dhī virodhāt

original: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva,
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam varṇaḥ iti dhīḥ tu pramā eva
bādhaka abhāvāt iti āhana iti
go tva ādi pratyabhijñā vat varṇeṣu pratyabhijñā gavādi viṣayā iti śaṅkate pratyabhijñānam iti
vyakti bhede siddhe pratyabhijñāyāḥ jāti viṣaya tvam syāt

original: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
analyzed: yat tvayā pītam jalam tat eva mayā pītam iti ādau

original: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
analyzed: na tathā iha vyakti bhedaḥ siddhaḥ iti pariharati na
vyakti iti
na tu etat iti
vyakti anya tva jñānam iti arthaḥ
udātta tva ādi viruddha dharma tvāt vyakti bhedaḥ numāna siddhaḥ iti anuvadati nanu iti
bheda pratyayasya kumbha kūpa ākāśa bheda pratyaya vat aupādhika bheda viṣaya tvāt anyathā siddheḥ ananyathā siddha vyakti aikya pratyabhijñayā nirapekṣa svarūpa ālambanayā
bādhaḥ iti uttaram āha atra iti
tālu ādi deśaiḥ koṣṭha stha vāyu saṃyoga vibhāgābhyām vicitrābhyām vyaṅgya tvāt varṇeṣu vaicitrya dhīḥ iti arthaḥ
kalpanā gauravāt ca varṇeṣu svatas bhedaḥ na asti iti āha api ca iti
anantāḥ gakāra ādi vyaktayaḥ tāsu pratyabhijñāna artham ga tva ādi jātayaḥ tāsu ca udātta tva ādi bhedasya aupādhika tvam iti
kalpanāt varam varṇa vyakti bheda mātrasya aupādhika tva kalpanam iti vyakti ānantyasya jātīnām
ca kalpanam ayuktam iti arthaḥ
nanu bhedasya bādhaka abhāvāt na aupādhika tvam iti atas āha eṣaḥ iti
astu tarhi pratyaya dvaya prāmāṇyāya bheda abhedayoḥ satya tvam
tatra āha katham hi iti
ubhayoḥ eka tva virodhāt bhedaḥ aupādhikaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
analyzed: nanu vāyu saṃyoga ādeḥ atīndriya tvāt na tad gata vaicitryasya udātta tva ādeḥ varṇeṣu pratyakṣa āropaḥ saṃbhavati iti arucim vadiṣyan sva matam āha athavā iti
dhvani dharmāḥ udātta tva ādayaḥ dhvanya bheda adhyāsāt varṇeṣu bhānti iti arthaḥ
praśna pūrvakam dhvani svarūpam āhakaḥ iti
avatarati sa dhvaniḥ iti śeṣaḥ
varṇa atiriktaḥ śabdaḥ dhvaniḥ iti arthaḥ
samīpam gatasya puṃsaḥ tāra tva manda tva ādi dharmān svagatān varṇeṣu saḥ eva āropayati iti āha pratyāsīdataḥ ca iti
ādi padam vivṛṇoti tat iti
nanu avyakta varṇaḥ eva dhvaniḥ na atiriktaḥ iti atas āha varṇānām iti

original: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratyuccāraṇam varṇāḥ anuvartante dhvaniḥ vyāvartate iti bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
analyzed: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣu avyakteṣu dhvani buddhiḥ syāt

original: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
analyzed: dundubhi ādi dhvanau śabda tva mātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayam avyaktaḥ varṇaḥ iti dhīḥ syāt iti mantavyam

original: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
analyzed: evam dhvani upādhikatve sva mate guṇam vadan vāyu upādhikatve pūrva uktām arucim darśayati evam ca ityādinā
astu kaḥ doṣaḥ
tatra āha saṃyoga iti
vāyu saṃyoga ādeḥ aśrāvaṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ
tasmāt śrāvaṇa dhvaniḥ eva udātta tva ādi āropa upādhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
analyzed: evam viruddha dharmaka dhvanīnām bhede na teṣu anugatāḥ varṇāḥ bhidyante iti uktam
tat eva dṛṣṭāntena draḍhayati api ca iti

original: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā khaṇḍa muṇḍa ādi viruddha aneka vyaktiṣu abhinnam go tvam tathā dhvaniṣu varṇāḥ abhinnāḥ eva iti arthaḥ
udātta ādiḥ dhvaniḥ tad bhedena hetunā varṇānām api iti yojanā
pratyabhijñā virodhāt iti akṣara arthaḥ

original: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /

original: vidhyuddeśārthavādayostvarthavādasthāni padāni pṛthaganvayavṛttāntaviṣayaṃ pratipadyānantaraṃ kaimarthyavaśena kāmaṃ vidheḥ stāvakatvaṃ pratipadyante

original: naivaṃ 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati' ityeṣāmarthavādagatānāṃ padānām /

original: tadyatra so 'vāntaravākyārthaḥ pramāṇāntaragocaro bhavati tatra tadanuvādenarthavādaḥ pravartate /

original: idānīmiva ca nānyadapi sārvabhaumaḥ kṣatriyo 'stīti brūyāt /

asāmarthya nyāyena arthi tva ādi saṃbhava nyāyasya nirasta tvāt iti arthaḥ

śūdra śabdāt śūdrasya vidyāyām adhikāraḥ astu iti āśaṅkya saṃvarga vidyāyām adhikāram aṅgīkaroti kāmam iti
tad viṣaya tvāt tatra śruta tvāt iti arthaḥ
vastutas tu vidhi vākya stha tvāt niṣāda śabdaḥ api adhikāri samarpakaḥ
śūdra śabdaḥ tu vidyā vidhi para artha vāda sthaḥ na adhikāriṇam bodhayati
asāmarthya nyāya virodhena anya para śabdasya svārtha bodhi tva asaṃbhavāt iti matvā aṅgīkāram tyajati arthavāda iti

analyzed: yathā aśvakarṇa śabdasya varṇa samudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhiḥ evam pañcajana śabdasya rūḍhiḥ eva na avayava śakti ātmakaḥ yogaḥ iti arthaḥ
pūrva kālika prayoga abhāvāt na rūḍhiḥ iti ākṣipati katham iti
syuḥ pumāṃsaḥ pañcajanāḥ iti amarakośa ādau prayogaḥ sti eva
tad abhāvam aṅgīkṛtya api āha śakya iti

original: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā /
analyzed: jana saṃbandhāt ca iti pūrva bhāṣye nareṣu pañcajana śabdasya rūḍhim āśritya prāṇa ādiṣu lakṣaṇā uktā

original: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
analyzed: iha tu prauḍhi vādena prāṇa ādiṣu rūḍhiḥ ucyate iti mantavyam
saṃgṛhītam vivṛṇoti prasiddha ityādinā
udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti atra udbhid padam vidheya guṇa arthakam karma nāmadheyam vā iti
saṃśaye khanitra ādau udbhid padasya prasiddheḥ yāga nāma tve prasiddhi virodhāt jyotiṣṭome
guṇa vidhiḥ iti prāpte rāddhāntaḥ yajeta yāgena iṣṭam bhāvayet iti arthaḥ

original: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate,
analyzed: tatas ṭodbhidā iti aprasiddhasya tṛtīyā antasya yāgena iti anena prasiddha arthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tad nāmatvam niścīyate
udbhinatti paśūn sādhayati iti prasiddheḥ avirodhāt apeḥ akṛta jyotiṣṭome guṇa vidhi ayogāt
tad vidhau ca udbhid ākhya guṇavatā yāgena iti matu artha saṃbandha lakṣaṇā prasaṅgāt ca iti karma nāma eva udbhid padam

original: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa  #

iti gamyate

analyzed: tathā prasiddha ārtaka prāṇa ādi śabda samabhivyāhārāt pañcajana śabdaḥ prāṇa ādi arthakaḥ iti niścīyate iti arthaḥ

analyzed: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśati iti viś tayā viśā puruṣa rūpayā indrasya āhvāna artham ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ iti yat tat yuktam

original: tamajātaśatruḥ 'mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi' ityamukhya brahmavāditayāpodya tatkartāramanyaṃ veditavyatayopacikṣepa /
analyzed: tam ajātaśatruḥ mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi iti amukhya brahma vādi tayā apodya tad kartāram anyam veditavya tayā upacikṣepa
yadi saḥ u pi amukhya brahma dṛṣṭi bhāj syāt upakramaḥ bādhyeta

original: evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /

original: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /

tat na iti āha yasya iti
aneka arthakāt śabdāt anyatara arthasya prakaraṇāt upapadāt vā grahaṇam nyāyyam

original: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /

original: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /

original: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /

original: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti

original: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
analyzed: bheda abheda pakṣe jīvasya janma ādi vikāravat tvāt tad niṣedhaḥ na syāt iti āha sa vai eṣaḥ iti

original: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti /
analyzed: bhedasya satya tve tad pramayā bādhāt aham brahma iti nirvādham jñānam na syāt iti āha anyathā ca iti
abhedasya api sattvāt pramā iti āśaṅkya bheda abhedayoḥ virodhāt saṃśayaḥ syāt iti āha su niścitā iti
mā astu nirbādha jñānam iti atas āha nirapavādam iti
aham brahma iti abādhita niścayasya eva śoka ādi nivartaka tvam iti atra smṛtim api āha sthitā iti

original: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ātyantika eka tve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bheda abhedayoḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu jīva paramātmānau svatas bhinnau
a paryāya nāmavat tvāt

original: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ /
analyzed: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭa tve pi bimbasya asphuṭa tva vat kalpita bhedena viruddha dharma vyavasthā upapatteḥ
satya bhede yeṣām āgrahaḥ teṣām doṣam āhaye tu iti

original: so 'yamitivattattvamasītyakāryakāraṇadravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādatyantābhedo vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam iti vat tat tvam asi iti akārya kāraṇa dravya sāmānādhikaraṇyāt atyanta abhedaḥ vedānta arthaḥ tad bodhaḥ eva niḥśreyasa sādhanam tasya bādhaḥ na yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti,
analyzed: kiñca bhedābhadavādinaḥ jñāna karmabhyām kṛtakam mokṣam kalpayanti

analyzed: yatkāraṇam sākṣāt brahma eva kāraṇam upādāya ubhau prabhava pralayau āmnāyate sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni ākāśāt eva samutpadyante
ākāśam pratyastam yanti chā iti

original: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
analyzed: yat hi yasmāt prabhavati yasmin ca pralīyate tat tasya upādānam prasiddham
yathā vrīhi yava ādīnām pṛthivī
sākṣāt ite sākṣāt iti ca upādāna antara anupādānam darśayati ākāśāt eva iti
pratyastamayaḥ ca na upādānāt anyatra kāryasya dṛṣṭaḥ  /
abhyuccayaḥ hetvantaram
ākāśāt eva iti evakāra sūcitam upādāna antara anupādānam agrahaṇam sākṣāt iti padena sūtrakāraḥ darśayati iti yojanā

original: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
analyzed: katham punar pūrva siddhasya sataḥ kartṛ tvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇa tvam śakyam saṃpādayitum
pariṇāmāt iti brūmaḥ

original: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
analyzed: pūrva siddhaḥ pi hi sanna ātmā viśeṣeṇa vikāra ātmanā pariṇamayāmāsa ātmānam iti
vikāra ātmanā ca pariṇāmaḥ mṛd ādyāsu prakṛtiṣu upalabdhaḥ
svayam iti ca viśeṣaṇāt nimitta antara anapekṣa tvam api pratīyate
pariṇāmāt iti vā pṛthak sūtram
tasya eṣaḥ ṛthaḥ itas ca prakṛtiḥ brahma

original: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
analyzed: yatkāraṇam brahmaṇaḥ eva vikāra ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena āmnāyate sat ca tyad ca abhavat

original: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /

original: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /

original: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /

original: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kṛti karma tva upapādana artham pariṇāmāt iti padam vyākhyāya anyathā api vyācaṣṭe pṛthak sūtram iti

original: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ /

strī yoneḥ api asti eva āyava dvāreṇa garbham pratyupādāna kāraṇa tvam

original: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /

original: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
analyzed: tasya hi pakṣasya upodbalakāni kānicid liṅga ābhāsāni vedānteṣu āpātena manda matīn pratibhānti iti

tena tad pratiṣedhe yatnaḥ tīva kṛtaḥ na āṇu ādi kāraṇa vāda pratiṣedhe

teṣām api upodvalakam vaidikam kiñcid liṅgam āpātena manda matīn prati bhāyāt iti

original: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā  #

asya atideśa adhikaraṇasya tātparyam vaktum vṛttam anuvadati īkṣateḥ iti
